name: Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sweet Gourmands.Key Notes:Vanilla Infusion, Vanilla Caviar, Vanilla Absolute.Fragrance Description:This unique gourmand fragrance is made with a vegan formula led by a powerful trio of vanillas. On top, a vanilla infusion with woody tonalities, at the heart a vanilla caviar with a rich sweetness, and at the base a vanilla absolute enriched with luminous lavender..About the Bottle:Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum is encased in an elegant, square-shaped bottle designed to be refilled (refill sold separately). Pale pink packaging adorned with a gold medallion reference the brand’s rich heritage..About the Fragrance:The power within. Burberry Goddess tells a story of self-discovery. The new campaign follows Emma Mackey and a pride of lionesses. Radiating confidence, strength and kindness, Emma embodies the spirit of Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Propylene Glycol, Aqua/Water/Eau, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Coumarin, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Benzyl Cinnamate, Alcohol, Citral, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Anise Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Geraniol, Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Red 4 (CI 14700), Ext. Violet 2 (CI 60730).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray the Burberry Goddess perfume generously onto pulse points such as the neck, wrists, and décolletage to increase the longevity of this refined Burberry scent..-Gently press onto the skin to preserve the essence of the fragrance. ...Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense....Refill Instructions:.Thanks to a sustainable and innovative refill system, all Burberry Goddess bottles can be refilled with ease..|Remove the bottle cap, then unscrew the fragrance pump, and screw the refill onto the bottle’s neck. |The refill will stop automatically once the perfume bottle is filled. |Unscrew the refill, screw the fragrance pump back onto the bottle and replace the cap. |Your refilled Burberry Goddess fragrance is now ready to be used.

The base notes of vanilla, amber, and musk add warmth and depth, creating a truly addictive aroma Burberry Goddess is perfect for: Spring and summer seasons, due to its brightness

reviews.review_text: I was hoping that it was too strong and it wasn’t :) I loved this soft & warm smell… definitely worth purchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: They absolutely nailed this fragrance and it’s my daily go to or for a special occasion. Always get compliments; it’s not too overpowering, and a little spritz goes a long way! I like vanilla and floral but I find most fragrance on the market is too overpowering but this is the perfect goddess balance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love Burberry Goddess. The warm vanilla and cocoa notes feel so comforting, while the subtle floral touch adds elegance. It’s my go-to scent for both casual days and special moments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this perfume it lasts a long time, however I wish the scent was more vanilla-y as it was advertised as a vanilla perfume, however the scent smells more dry and old lady ish. That might just be a scent preference but it did last a long time and a little bit goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I typically enjoy clean or fruity perfumes because they do not cause headaches for me. I can't stand anything overtly floral; it reminds me of my grandmother and makes me ill. While shopping in Ulta, a girl next to me told me I needed to smell this perfume and raved about how amazing it smells.  However, there was no sample available to try.  On my next trip to Sephora, I tried the sample and was instantly in love.  I feel this perfume is subtle, warm, cozy, musky, and perfect for cooler weather.  It is a beautiful scent.  I later purchased the travel size, too, so I can put it on after the gym in the A.m.  Since I am in Arizona, I want to enjoy this perfume as much as I can before it gets hot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was the sent that started me on my fragrance journey, I kid you not. I was not a perfume girl before this but this scent introduced me to gorgeous non gourmand vanillas that smell classy, clean and expensive! The lavender cools this vanilla down the perfect balance for me and never feels too warm, sweet or overwhelming, even in the spring and summer! This could be a signature scent hands down. I will probably always have this in my collection from here on out ✨🙌🏽✨
This perfume smells amazing. You really smell like sweet vanilla but not in a sickly way. I feel like this will also be good for layering with other perfumes. The bottle is also really beautiful.

Honestly, not my favorite perfume. While I normally love vanilla/lavender scents this one is way too strong for me. I feel this is a very mature scent that would work well during fall/winter months. I recommend if you like strong, long lasting scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVEEE vanilla perfumes. At first, I wasn’t so sure about this one, because of the lavenders notes, but it really smells good. It’s a different sort of vanilla, nothing like Vanilla 28 (who’s actually one of my favorites). It smells more mature, less like a teenager. You can’t go wrong with Burberry perfumes

J’adore!! L’odeur est sublime et la tenue aussi! Je recommande ce produit!
this is worth all the hype, smells like heaven, get so many compliments when I wear it and it lasts for a while when you spray it on you. this is the type of perfume that you will love for a while

It’s my new favorite. I will be getting this in the travel size too now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this almost everyday. The scent is classy and not overpowering like other bougie brands and their scents. It's an addicting scent and is best for everyday wear where you can spray it once and it'll last all day and be a very soft and gentle smell on you. It is romantic and can last a long time! I use one spray for the day, go to work at Mcdonald's, and I go home smelling like vanilla which is great. I get many compliments using this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After reading several reviews, I was a little worried. Would this perfume's scent fade as quickly as they say? Thankfully, it stays! I absolutely love the scent it leaves on my skin especially once it dries. I'm super happy with this purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has definitely become a staple. It layers well with a lot of lotions/body sprays and the scent is captivating without being overly-aggressive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is so perfect! The vanilla is not too overpowering and it smells amazing. However, it doesn’t last on my skin so I won’t be repurchasing.

reviews.review_title: Feeling like a Goddess with Burberry Goddess
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging - the bottle is simple yet elegant with the gold touches. Minor flag is that the perfume wasn't filled up to the brim, which I believe is to prevent any spillage.  Scent - the vanilla smells authentic and luxurious. There is a hint of warm spice to it and it balances well with the vanilla.  Wear test - I sprayed once in the evening and the scent lasted the next morning. A little goes a long way and didn't smell overpowering.  Overall comments and review - seeing this product is an Allure 2024 Best of Beauty Award Winner, I decided to purchase this. I'm glad I did and I feel this scent is great for anyone interested in adding a vanilla scent to their collection, a scent that can be used any time of the year, or a gift to someone who wants to discover a signature scent. It is worth it for a good vanilla perfume, and Burberry Goddess is perfect. I would highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I sprayed this (and other fragrances) on when I was last in store and started to get the hype, so I bought a travel size.  The next day I sprayed in after my shower.   It smelled like coconut and buttered toast and just grew during the day and gave me such a headache.  I could not wait to take a shower and get it off.  I realize that what I probably liked in store was the mix of the five fragrances I kinda mixed together when sampling.   Whoops.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful scent! Love it so much! Warm and great for fall/winter months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess smells incredible! I love the warm, spicy scents, and Burberry delivers the spice. Although, it's definitely not overwhelmingly spicy, but it's there if that's what you're looking for. It lasts all day as well. It's a must try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great and mixes well with your body to develop, but has quite poor longevity as other reviewers mentioned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It was a good decision to buy this perfume. I returned Burberry Her because I wasn't sure if I really like it. But  when I purchased this one instead, oh my gosh the smell is amazing! It lasts longer than Burberry Her. I liked the fragrance tones of Burberry Goddess better. Don't think twice, add to cart and checkout already!! ♡

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to blind buy the biggest bottle of this perfume after watching a ton of YouTube video reviews, and I am so glad I did! It was a risky move, but this smells SO GOOD. It's a very soft and calming smell. I love the lavender and vanilla together! I don't smell much spice in this, but maybe that's just because I'm used to much spicier perfumes like Glossier You? Anyways, I would say this is 100% a safe blind buy. I think this scent would smell lovely on anyone. This smells expensive. Not like your typical cheap vanilla body spray that smells sickeningly sweet. I would say it's a more grown-up version of vanilla. Not as gourmand as I thought it would be, and I'm not mad at it tbh. I find myself constantly sniffing my wrists when I put this on. I haven't been complimented on it yet, but I work from home and hardly go anywhere, so what can you do 😂

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

I absolutely love vanilla scents, so this was a perfect choice for me. The floral note is not too overpowering either if you're not usually a huge fan of floral perfumes like I am.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review. I love the vanilla scent and lavender together with patchouli. Not too strong or overprowering. Scent lasts a long time. No need to reapply. Got some compliments on the scent. Great feminine scent for any woman.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got to try a sample of Goddess Eau de Parfum Intense for Women by Burberry.I do love the woody scent this perfume has. I applied this product on a night out with the girls and got lots of compliments about the hit of vanilla and one girl even mentioned she loved it had tiny bit if lavender smell. Not over powering. Very nice perfume for someone who likes nature smells in their perfume. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a beautiful spiced vanilla scent. This is my second purchase and I will always be in love with it! Worth the $$

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is super light but full of scent that lasts long. It reminds me of the perfume my grandma would wear and since we lost her early this year it truly melted my heart. Definitely will be one I wear when I'm in my feels.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a stunning perfume, everything from the design of the bottle to the Elegant and Sexy scent is so compelling. It is a warm and spicy vanilla scent that last all day. I always get compliments when I wear this perfume and I am almost done with bottle from how often I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Vanilla and Lavender have always been a winning combination to my nose (and in a moment of weakness I'll even admit to only ever purchasing 'Poo Pourri' in Vanilla/Lavender - a true Eau de TOILET if there ever was one!). But I'm not here to discuss eau de toilettes or toilets, this is about a magnificent Eau de Parfum which I have only just discovered. On my clothes I can often smell it even the next day. On my skin however I need to top up at least twice in order for this to last me a full day. Projection isn't extraordinary but then again I do prefer closer to skin scents. If you can pick up the lotion too and make sure to apply it before the fragrance, it definitely makes it last longer in my opinion. The ginger note gives it a subtle spicy kick and when it dries down there is a lot of Vanilla-Cocoa if that's your kind of thing (I know it's mine!). I do own a number of Vanilla's such as Guerlain's Vanilla Bosca, but overall I prefer this one! I think it's the Lavender in here that really sets this apart from other vanilla's. Cozy, elegant, not overly gourmand and definitely a compliment getter!   ~ My Top 5 Beauty must-have list ~  1. Hair Loss Treatment: ‘Divine Herbal’ - Hair Oil  2. Shampoo: 'Sephora Collection' - Deep Cleaning Shampoo 3. Face Mask: ‘Peter Thomas Roth’ – Pumpkin Enzyme Mask  4. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: ‘Divine Herbal’ - Facial Treatment Serum 5. Face Scrub: ‘Sisley' - Botanical Gentle Buffing Cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is a new favorite and has earned its place in my daily rotation! At first spray the scent is bold, with notes of smoky vanilla and wood. The bottle is gorgeous and is inspired by the sunset. The scent could almost lean towards unisex. This fragrance oozes confidence and strength. Don’t be surprised if you start feeling like a goddess after wearing this fragrance!

Not the typical cupcake/frosting vanilla. It’s more sophisticated and musky. But after a few hours, I cannot wait to wash the smell off of me. Idk if it’s my body chemistry or if I hate the dry down. But it almost smells like newspaper or old library books. Weird, but I still find myself using it pretty often.

reviews.review_title: Burberry Goddess Perfume: A Divine Scent That Comm
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As an energetic fragrance aficionado, I've experienced various aromas, however none very like Burberry Goddess. From the second I spritzed it on, I was spellbound by captivating smell easily mixes complexity with exotic nature.  The primary thing that struck me was the inebriating mix of flower and woody notes, which make an amicable orchestra that moves on the skin. With each whiff, I'm moved to a tranquil nursery blossoming with jasmine and magnolia, while inconspicuous traces of sandalwood and golden add profundity and warmth to the scent.  What genuinely separates Burberry Goddess is its capacity to bring out appreciation any place I go. It's exceptional the number of praises I that get while wearing this scent. Whether I'm going to a party or basically getting things done, individuals can't resist the urge to ask about the charming fragrance that encompasses me.  Additionally, the life span of this fragrance is unrivaled. Indeed, even following a monotonous day, the fragrance waits gently on my skin, leaving a path of charm any place I go. It resembles having my very own quality of refinement and appeal.  All in all, Burberry Goddess isn't simply a scent — it's an encounter. Its heavenly fragrance has an enduring effect, making it perhaps of the best scent I've at any point had the delight of wearing. Assuming that you're looking for a scent that radiates tastefulness and earns praises easily, look no farther than Burberry Goddess.

reviews.review_title: Changes a lot as you wear it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first spray, I don’t get any of the vanilla. It’s just a sharp floral on my skin which I can’t stand. It has minimal sillage and lasts about 6 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed, if this was a cake I'd eat it! I bought this with my own money in a Sephora store, not incentivized, and honestly wish that I bought an even bigger size or the gift set. I have never bought a perfume so fast after spritzing it on my coat at Sephora. This is such a beautiful, well-balanced, and rounded vanilla trio, with a sprinkling of lavender on top that leans more sweet and airy rather than a heavier fougere--reminds me a bit of having a nice hot creamy, milky tea, for some reason. No weird off-notes here, everything's very delicately blended imo. Projection is very mild, but when you move, others will smell you. Spraying 4-5 sprays on my clothes means I can smell it from half a room's length away, and well until the next day. I think this is one of those fragrances where you might be nose-blind faster, but definitely everyone can still smell you. Longevity is a little better, lasting for around a day. The lavender notes are more prominent at the beginning but disappear in the drydown, a little intense right now at first spray, but that will probably round itself out as my bottle oxidizes. Maceration in a dark cool space may help, as it does with all vanillas; I've only had it a few days and the vanilla's starting to smell a wee bit stronger than when I just opened the bottle and the lavender's much less sharp. The store tester was beast-mode vanilla so I expect it to smell like that in a few months and some. The vanillas eventually fade off into a warm ambery scent in the drydown, which I love. The vanillas also seem a little different--not Tahitian or island-y generally with freshness, but sort of honeyed and gourmet--they read a lot foodier and pastry-like than I expected. Might buy another bigger bottle before the sale is over, before any reformulations or batch changes occur, I like the particular bottle that I got in-store and have noticed that sometimes post-covid batches of perfume at Sephora can have a lot of variability, unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like this perfume. I've been told that it's not me wearing it but it is me! Pleasant, subtle. People say it doesn't last - but if you spray it on your clothes it will stay for days! I am always spraying under my collarbones, so it stays well and gets on my clothes too - no problem. Compared to other Vanilla perfumes, this (and Mugler Alien Goddess Intense) are my most favorites (I favor them over mainstream Tom Ford perfumes).   The thing is, it's tender and subtle and it doesn't smell perfumy - not like a signature perfume, not like obvious. So if you like perfumy smells (Libre for example, is very perfumy to me), you might get dissapointed. It is too vanilla (haha!). For me, I want to smell good and I don't care if someone recognizes my perfume or not, as long as everyone remembers that I am pleasant :) I would say that for perfumy girls - check out Alien Goddess Intense by Mugler. It seems to be that they are relatives, but Mugler smells like a signature perfume! But first, check it on your skin, don't buy it blind lol

reviews.review_title: This is literally just a basic vanilla
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally just a basic vanilla. I was given the opportunity to review this by Topbox, which I am so very appreciative of, but I have to say, Burberry Goddess is nothing but a basic vanilla. I was so excited to smell it after all the hype on social media, but when I finally did I was severely disappointed. I kept smelling my arm to make sure I wasn't going crazy. My cousin, who was also with me and smelling it had the exact same reaction. Its a fairly soft scent (unless you overspray) so the projection was decent (not a lot of sillage, but also not necessarily a skin scent). It lasted for about 3-4 hrs, turning into a skin scent at the 3hr mark. It is fairly inoffensive, so that is a plus, but it isn't very unique.  A fragrance like this will always garner compliments because people tend to like sweet smelling fragrances and vanilla helps in that area, but its honestly not even that sweet. To me, the price is abysmal for such a basic fragrance. If I am going to pay this price, it better be unique and have something special about it. Unfortunately, I don't believe this fragrance is any of those things. I have a fairly decent-sized fragrance collection, and I don't know if it is just because I have smelled a ton of fragrances, so it may seem basic to me, so that is also a possibility. But I definitely know you can find much better vanillas for a MUCH better price. So even if the smell is better to you than I am describing, the price isn't worth it, in my humble opinion; especially for a designer fragrance.... this is getting into niche territory.... ain't nobody got time fo dat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this scent after seeing reviews about this being a mature vanilla scent that fades into a nice long-lasting cozy vanilla upon dry down. Considering that I love vanilla scents but also want something that smells a bit more mature/professional than BBW warm vanilla sugar or vanilla bean noel, I was really excited about this. Upon initial spray, the scent is beautiful. I will say that I don't get much vanilla- mostly ginger to be honest. But the scent is nice, and while I was applying some my sister mentioned how good it smelled. However, I can't get more than about 2 hours out of this perfume, if that. I've tried everything- applying on top of perfume oils, applying straight after lotion, spraying clothing all over, etc. Nothing gets this scent to stay. When applying on top of the Nemat vanilla perfume oil, it initially smells amazing. By the end of the day, I can still smell the Nemat on me, but this perfume is totally gone. If this were a cheaper perfume or a body spray I'd understand, but considering how expensive this is I really wish the scent lasted longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess I received this small sample of @Burberry Goddess from @TopBoxCircle to review honestly. I love that the large bottle is both vegan and refillable. (I have yet to buy one) Responsibility matters to me. It has a combination of pure vanilla (not synthetic) and lavender. I normally am not crazy about vanilla scented perfumes but this fragrance is so luxurious and sweet. It also has staying power. Lasts all day and into the evening however I like to add just a touch more in the evening. Burberry Goddess is a winner in my book. I think this will become a true classic. So many girls ask me what I am wearing. They love this sweet fragrance as much as I do. Thank you for the opportunity to try this amazing perfume @TopBoxCircle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t purchase new fragrances frequently, something has to really stand out to me in order for me to actually buy it. I am a creature of habit and love wearing my one or two staple fragrances. Well a few weeks ago there was a paper sample of Burberry Goddess in an Ulta catalog that came. I smelled it and immediately fell in love! I purchased the travel pen spray that same day and used it for a week to make sure I still enjoyed it. I definitely do, have received so many compliments! I purchased the 3.3 oz gift set! This will definitely be my go to scent for the foreseeable future. It smells kind of similar to Sol de Janiero original bum bum cream (Cheriosa 62) but a more mature version of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s Nice but it doesn’t last long and it’s nothing different just another vanilla fragrance the travel spray will be fine for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest review.   My first impression of Burberry Goddess was “How Classy” The bottle is very stunning to look at and I believe I will buy it for my mother as a gift, as she always compliments me when I wear it.  What I love about Goddess is that wonderful woody vanilla tone with just a hint of lavender. It sets the scent off perfectly and brings attention to me throughout the day.  When I wear it, I seem to feel noticed. Maybe it’s all the compliments I receive, but I enjoy it.  I appreciate that it is not overwhelming in smell, just perfect for being noticed throughout the day.  Props to Burberry for making women feel noticed. It’s a wonderful feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i’ve gotten many compliments wearing this perfume! you can really smell the notes in this perfume as well. i love almost all burberry perfumes but this one is my new fav! i love layering it with the blue heel good girl to

reviews.review_title: Not long lasting, but an elegant vanilla
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a gift because I kept seeing glowing reviews. The smell is a mature vanilla, very elegant without smelling like old lady perfume. The gourmand classification definitely comes through. I do not think it lasts long and doesn’t project.but it is not overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Finally found my Fall/Winter scent! The three different vanilla scent profiles work wonderfully with the lavender, cacao, and ginger. Just enough spice that it isn’t overwhelming. I prefer simpler scents, my Spring/Summer are Salt Air by Skylar and Her Eau De Toilette by Burberry. Simple doesn't have to mean cheap smelling and Burberry has hit the nail on the head again for me. I agree that you need to let this dry down before you make a decision. Body chemistry is always a big factor with perfume in my experience. The scent lasts an ok amount of time, I wish it stayed a little longer. Love love love.

I'm going with Escapade Gourmand for fall because it actually lasts.  But I like Goddess better.

reviews.review_title: I've never loved a perfume more
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is liquid gold (which matches perfectly with the bottle aesthetic). It is a beautiful mature vanilla perfume, that has top, middle, and bottom notes of vanilla which makes the scent last all day. I keep on finding myself smelling my wrists, and just loving my scent as I go throughout my day. I'm not even joking, this stuff lasts 12 hours. I was never really an avid perfume wearer until I found this one. It was because I really never found a perfume that I loved. I love this one. Never discontinue this Burberry! If you love vanilla.. this is your scent.

Hardly any smell and what is there isn’t that great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the travel size before I decided to fully commit... and im going to fully commit. Very beautiful, sexy, sensual and smart scent. I wear this every day and get a ton of compliments. I always spray on my clothes and even after 8 hours I can still smell it, and to note, it's not overpowering but 1 spray is all I need.

reviews.review_title: Warm smell perfect for the holiday or night events
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you shop BBW, this smell is an elevated “Into the Night scent”. The scent itself is warm and rich and my go to scent for any night time or holiday events.

reviews.review_title: I’ve been gatekeeping this it’s so good
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I smelled it once in store and bought it right away. I haven’t found a scent that I’ve been obsessed with and want to be my “signature scent” in SO long. Such an impressive, sexy, vanilla, warm scent. Doesnt smell too mature it’s perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This elegant perfume takes vanilla to a whole other level.   It’s very aromatic and a little goes a long way.  The aromas last all day. It’s a unique scent that portrays elegance and empowerment.  It is feminine but not fruity. The scent makes me feel strong, unique and important. The bottle itself is gorgeous with its unique gold medallion. This product is worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a person who can get overwhelmed this is a calm but not so super linear scent. It does change a bit! Don’t be fooled by the two note description. It’s not super strong but I’m sure if you just spritz more it’s will help! But it’s great and very safe for office and casual date  night. I would call it fresh gourmand

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Vanilla to the core with the slightest touch of lavender to keep it fresh. A nice calming gourmand scent.  For people who like sweet scents and of course vanilla. I enjoy :) It is also not so heavy so it can be layered with another scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing fall and winter smell. It’s vanilla but not in the overtly sweet way. It’s staying power is much better on clothing than on skin but still decent.

reviews.review_title: Smells amazing and lasts for days
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m very picky with perfumes and this is my current go-to. Smells light and heavenly and gets me so many compliments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very Creamy Aroma!  The vanilla and lavender are blended beautifully!  Not a sickly sweet or heavy floral aroma.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very powdery Vanilla and the dry down smells sweet and Smokey  Lasts only a few hours on the skin, much longer on clothing

reviews.review_title: Goddess makes you feel just that.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love the smell. I had gotten so many compliments. Two sprays lasted me all day. Unfortunately, I had to return it because it was triggering my migraines.. a must have if you don’t get headaches/migraines easily.

reviews.review_title: Is more of a sexy scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the smell I went into the store looking for a new scent and left without buying it. I ended up going back the next day and buying the travel size because I could not get the smell out of me nose/head.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this one. It smells good but it’s not strong enough. You have to put on a lot of it to notice it.

reviews.review_title: My favorite vanilla scent to date
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very kindly gifted me to try by Burberry. Titled quite simple Goddess ⚜️ this is Burberry’s first refillable fragrance!  A Gourmand fragrance designed to reflect the power within, the journey of self discovery taken along a path of confidence, strength, and kindness   Crafted with 3 distinct vanillas, all collected by hand, dried in the sun for 5-7 weeks and, finally, matured in wooden boxes. These are enhanced with a luminous lavender.   ⚜️The distinct notes ~ * Top - Vanilla, Lavender, Cacao and Ginger * Middle - Vanilla Caviar  * Base - Vanilla Absolute  💭 Before I even open this bottle, can we please take a sensoral moment to appreciate the warmth, and depth of the entire package! The look of a liquid gold encased in this elegant, timeless bottle.    Now you may have heard, I’m a bit picky about my vanillas, so part of me is afraid to even try this.  What if I don’t like it? 😢🥹   Here we go ~  No need to fear, this, this is what a vanilla should always and forever be.   At first pass, just in the air, I’m transported to a timeless cafe, perhaps in France? With the doors open and the aroma from beautiful baked confections passing by me in a light breeze.  I can close my eyes and almost taste the gloriousness  When I apply it, the lightest breath of lavender pulls back the sweetness, letting it fully develop and mingle with the cacao, giving it more depth and it just matures from there. This is not your average vanilla, this is the pinnacle! It emits warmth, sensuality, power, and just raw strength  I have found my favorite gourmand fragrance. I have found my favorite vanilla fragrance, and must congratulate and thank Burberry, as well as Amandine Clerc-Marie, Master Perfumer, on a truly glorious fragrance and for allowing me to share in its beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new signature scent, probably forever. The only thing is that the smell doesn’t last the whole day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My husband & I absolutely love this perfume on me. Especially paired with a vanilla lotion. It's sophisticated & sensual all at the same time. However.....However, it only lasts half an hour (if that). So im upset I purchased the 3.3oz because it kinda feels like a waste. If Burberry comes out with an intense version with better longevity(without changing too much of the notes), I  will purchase it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is absolutely amazing. I find myself wearing it even when I’m sitting at home for the day because it smells THAT good. This is a nice warm scent that can be worn throughout the year. The smell lasts a long time as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone
reviews.review_text: SMELLS AMAZING…but it doesn’t last as long as I would like. Have to reapply throughout the day 😩

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this fragrance but it has no longevity and it doesn't project.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the travel sized because when I sprayed it in store, I thought I could smell more floral with the vanilla. I don't normally go for overly sweet fragrances so I thought it would be a nice change of pace but the dried down scent was so sickly sweet it gave me a migraine. Thank god the scent doesn't last longer than an hour otherwise I would've showered to get it off me. If you like very sweet scents like vanilla then this might be for you because there's four different types of vanilla in it. Not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you love vanilla scents, Goddess hits the mark. It’s a delightfully warm scent with layers of vanilla and a hint of lavender. Goddess is a comforting, easy, anytime scent. It’s perfect for layering if you enjoy mixing scents as I do.

reviews.review_title: Just ordered a bottle and can't wait to get it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Reminds me of the Original Burberry Classic and I absolutely love it!!!! Smells like honey on my skin. OMG. It's just divine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I do not like lavender, and I’m also not a huge vanilla lover, but I really like this. It just feels deep, sweet, slightly powdery. The lasting power is not great..about 2/3 hours I felt. Still nice though, and perfect for fall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a wonderful scent without being too much! It wears nicely!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m pretty picky on fragrances but I absolutely love the smell of this. It lasts and it’s sophisticated. I work in a cosmetic section and 100% of the customers I’ve shown this perfume to loved or liked it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a vanilla girl and this is amazing. It wasn’t what I expected when I first tried it but it grew on me very fast. I find most perfumes don’t last on me but this one I can smell on myself all day! It’s warm, cozy and unique!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While this perfume is a bit sweeter smelling than I’m used to buying on my own, I didn’t find it to be overbearing once applied. It definitely has more of a warm vanilla and lavender fragrance.   Overall, I found that the scent was softer/more subtle than expected, but still had staying power throughout the course of the day.   My favorite part about this perfume is actually the bottle itself. I generally don’t care much about this, but I will say that I’m overall very impressed with the design and function.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you are a vanilla perfume lover then I feel you will really appreciate this perfume! It is a great perfume for the fall/winter as it is very warm and sweet although sweet in a sophisticated way. It definitely is a mood elevator as well! Great for day or night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging and over all look I love. It has a very clean elegant look to it. The moment that I spray this it is strong but not in a bad way. It last about 6 hours so be very light when you spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like vanilllaaaa so my number one is black opium and that’ll forever be my favorite . But this one smells beyond amazing it’s less coffee more vanilla.not bad as a second perfume

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A sweet, fresh, softly floral, and warm smelling vanilla with just a slight clean woodsy smell! I wasn’t sure what I would think of the lavender in this one, but I find that it gives a clean and fresh smell to the vanilla! It’s sweet, but not overly so. An easy and beautiful fragrance to wear for any occasion! For me, the longevity and projection are great, I can smell it all day long! It’s a little different from the other Burberry fragrances, but as long as you like vanilla I think it’s a pretty safe blind buy! For reference, a few of my favorite vanillas are JHAG Vanilla Vibes, Ralph Lauren Beyond Romance, Alien Goddess, Kayali Utopia Vanilla Coco 21, Kayali Vanilla 28, and the 7 Virtues Vanilla Woods!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this perfume is so creamy and smooth it’s definitely perfect for the fall and winter time while also being classy and elegant for a vanilla perfume definitely a must have and a new staple in my collection

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has become one of my favorites ! The scent smells so grown and it lasts all day!

reviews.review_title: Good for an all seasons collections
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a fragrance collector. I love the subtle power of this scent and the way it dries down. I do wish it had more last power, though. All in all, I’m happy with my purchase and wear it often.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the smell of this perfume. It’s a very warm scent and it reminds me a lot of fall, cozy fire days and calm. I would say the scent is strong and has moderate lasting power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect sexy fall scent. Still smells like Burberry but it’s warm and yummy! A different for Burberry but it’s amazing! And the bottle is gorgeous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Burberry Goddess. I happened to be in my local Sephora when the bottle caught my attention - simple, elegant, weighty. The scent is absolutely vanilla, with a subtle spice - the lavender? I wore it all day before purchasing it, it lasted quite a few hours on me. To me, it smells classy & feminine, sophisticated & a touch sensual, the kind of vanilla that can be dressed up or down - I’ll wear this to work with sheath dresses & stilettos & on weekends with jeans & boots in the Fall & Winter. I love it so much I also purchased the mini spray for travel/my purse. I didn’t find it at all cloying/too sweet & it definitely didn’t smell like a candle OR an “old lady” :) Really lovely scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, notSure skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful scent but does NOT last. At all. Kinda sad

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It smells amazing but is extremely light and doesn't last at all. I test all of my perfumes by putting them on after the shower at bedtime. If I wake up and still smell them, they're a must-have if I love the scent. This one didn't even last 3 hours. It faded to almost nothing before I even fell asleep and was completely gone in the morning. I'm SO glad I bought the purse size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a wonderful product. The bottle is glass and high-end feeling and the scent compliments summer perfectly, especially with the hotter-than-normal weather we've been having. I get a lot of compliments from men when I wear this perfume, and I've never gotten compliments on my scent before.  The scent reminds me of candy, vanilla, and summer!  I definitely recommend this perfume and I will be replenishing it when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought the mini/travel size as a blind purchase and I love it! If you like Donna born in Roma you will like this as it is a deeper, sexier, night version in my opinion. Different enough though. A must in your collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used this new fragrance few times, and it smells great. You can definitely smell the vanilla. I would use this more during the fall/ winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i recieved this perfume complimentary from influenster and i wanted to wear this perfume for a full month before reviewing and WOW! i love this perfume. i get compliments every time i wear it and it lasts on my clothes as well. it’s not powdery, it’s a perfect balance between warm, earthy, floral and a tad sweet. i will definitely be purchasing this when i run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to test in exchange for my honest review. The bottle is beautiful and the scent is warm with notes of vanilla. Definitely a “special occasion” scent for me.

reviews.review_title: Smells like watered down Mon Guerlain
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had such high hopes for this scent, but after reading the notes, something seemed a little off. After smelling in store, it registered that this is just watered-down Mon Guerlain with the Burberry logo slapped on it and at a much higher price point! Makes zero sense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely scent, sweet, yet sophisticated. Packaging is also beautiful. The smell does fade and you need to reapply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not crazy about most vanilla perfumes, but this is really lovely. It's not that overly sweet bake shop type vanilla scent. It doesn't have the best longevity, but if you prep the skin it lasts much longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this for my 13 year old daughter, she likes it. However, it smells a lot like everything else on the market right now. Warm vanilla and young. Very similar to Sol de Janeiro which is on par with Victoria secret fragrance. Burberry Her is a better option, however nothing groundbreaking there either

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best smelling perfume I have ever purchased!!! Sooo sexy definitely my go to sent now!! Definitely worth every cent!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was fortunate enough to receive this gift from Burberry and a Influenster.  The first spray, you are enveloped by vanilla, gourmand, sweetness, smoothness, floral, luxury, opulence, and sophistication.  Even though I usually prefer sweet, fruity scent profiles, I love this perfume. It’s not an overwhelming sweet vanilla, and it finishes with a floral scent.  I received compliments from everyone. I even got my coworker to buy this perfume. My boyfriend can’t stop smelling me. I can’t stop smelling myself. My mom is sensitive to smell and highly critical yet she has approved this smell as well. Loved by many.  I appreciate the travel-friendly size of the bottle, especially its archive-inspired design of the bottle. Simple yet elegant like its smell. It’s also vegan if you’re clean-beauty conscious!  Burberry states: “Gourmand scent led by a trio of vanillas and enriched with luminous lavender. The vanilla is collected by hand, then the beans spend five to seven weeks drying in the sun, before being stored in wooden boxes to mature and develop their sweet, signature aroma.”   There’s even a slight disclaimer that the color will change because the perfume contains vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum and I absolutely love it. Perfect for the days I’m channeling my inner Goddess without being too overpowering. This scent makes me feel, confident, in control but yet very feminine. A perfect warm and sultry vanilla scent. Exquisite!

reviews.review_title: Not heavy and overpowering at all!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this perfume! Smells very good and lasts for a very long time!  I'm not usually a fan of vanilla scents but this has the perfect amount of vanilla, not heavy and overpowering at all. It  smells sweet and sexy! I highly recommended

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this perfume! I typically don’t like vanillas because they’re often too sweet a perfume, but this has a decadent, rich and layered aroma that keeps people coming back to smell me again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess Perfume smells like a luxurious warm vanilla with a hint of woodsy lavender. This bottle will last - you only need a small amount - and the scent will last all day. I received this product from Influencer in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! I received this for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. To me, it smells warm and just so so delicious and ambery. It’s smells like the most delicious, syrupy dessert. I love Burberry fragrances and this is another triumph. I wear it every day and it lasts throughout the entire day. I think I’d buy this again, and if I hadn’t gotten it for free I would’ve bought it anyways.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess perfume has prominent notes of vanilla creating an inviting and elegant fragrance that lingers throughout the day, making it a luxurious choice for any occasion. I’ve gotten compliments every time I’ve used Burberry Goddess perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Eau de Parfum is designed to be layered. It is the perfect amount of vanilla; not sweet, not obnoxious. The flaw, it only last hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My new go to perfume! This is not your average vanilla perfume and I feel like it would work for so many people. And bonus points that it lasts so long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect amount of vanilla, doesn't smell too mature just sweet enough for day time and sexy enough for night. Love layering it with some of my other perfumes. It lasts awhile on my clothing but I do notice on my skin it fades within a few hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My first impression of this scent was that it’s just another basic vanilla fragrance. An instant like but nothing special to invest in. Boy was I wrong! After testing it out a full day I kept gravitating towards it. It’s an each reach for sure. This is a warm sultry vanilla that is great by itself but also layers well with many fragrances and or body care. Innovative? No. Are there other fragrances out there similar in DNA? Absolutely, but there is something about this fragrance that is captivating. It’s a love for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume from influenster in return for my honest review. It smelled like laundry that you forgot in the washer and days later when you put it in the dryer but still has that moldy smell. Sorry but it’s a no.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m reaching for this scent most often lately! It’s gorgeous, deep and sensual vanilla with a lovely spicy aspect. It lasts all day long upon application as well. I will absolutely be buying this again and adding it to my regular collection. The packaging and color fit the bill as well with the god accents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this perfume. It has a very strong vanilla scent, with some musk added in. The scent lasts forever and makes me so happy every single time I catch a whiff. I would 100% recommend this to anybody, especially if you enjoy vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review.  Burberry Goddess is a warm and sweet scent that is so comforting. The lavender note adds a fresh and soothing element. It’s a cozy perfume with a hint of relaxation. Wear time is about 4 hours however it last all day on clothing items.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume! It has become one of my favorite perfumes. The smell is a little sweet but it’s still smells sexy. I would recommend and even buy it for other people as a gift

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product for free by influenster for an honest review. This scent is absolutely wonderful if you like a more vanilla fragrance. I did enjoy this fragrance! Highly recommend this one! It lasts all day as well. 🥰

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Reminds me of a grownup version of Vera Wang’s Princess. A great summer to fall transition scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this wonderful perfume for free for testing purposes from influenster. I love the fragrance, and it has become my go-to perfume. It has a long-lasting smell that goes well with every occasion. I highly recommend it, too. I would buy it repeatedly and keep it in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Burberry and Influenster for my honest review. Burberry Goddess is very vanilla forward with a nice subtle hint of lavender. It does last a very long time on the hair skin and clothes.This perfume is very versatile in that you can wear it day or night, as well as any season, making it a perfume that anyone could use in their daily routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influencer and Burberry in exchange for my honest review. This perfume has become my new favorite. I love the vanilla scent, that’s my overall take out from the fragrance. It’s warming, enticing and feminine without being sweet. It is pretty long lasting and I enjoy the scent throughout the day. It has a warming, elegant feel to it. The bottle suits the scent well; it is classic looking and since the perfume is quite crowd-pleasing, could make a nice gift.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: FAVORITE BEW SCENT! It’s hard to describe but it smells expensive if that makes sense? I am always a fan of scents that can border on almost being masculine and this seems to be the perfect amount of that. I feel like when I put this on if I’m going out for the evening it lasts. My husband has made multiple comments since I’ve been wearing it that he really likes it as well. Definitely worth a try if you’re looking to switch things up I don’t think there’s necessarily a dupe or something similar to this.

reviews.review_title: Captivating Elegance in a Golden Bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is a total winner! It comes in a gorgeous golden bottle that screams luxury. The scent is all about sweet vanilla, and it sticks around for hours, which my boyfriend absolutely loves.  But what makes it extra special is how intimate it feels. It's like a beautiful secret you can share with someone special. When you smell it, you can't help but feel closer to them.  At first, it's simple and inviting, but as time goes on, it turns into this complex mix of scents. There's a hint of lavender that makes it interesting.  My partner adores it, and honestly, so do I. It's not just a perfume; it's an experience and a feeling. It's like capturing a special moment with every spritz.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product i discover this cause i was buying the Burberry elixir my god the goddess its so sweet like wow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m really loving this fragrance! It’s subtle and sultry - not heavy and overpowering at all.  Perfect for day or night.  The lavender and vanilla notes don’t weigh down the scent but instead give it really nice body.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. I am super happy to receive such a high quality perfume! I love the packaging, it makes it look fancy and makes me want to use it. I sometimes feel nauseous with the smell of certain perfumes but this one didn’t make me feel sick. The smell is definitely present but it is light and not too overwhelming. I think this is a good neutral perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m in love with this new scent from Burberry. It’s perfect. Warm and spicy with a beautiful vanilla mixed in. The bottle is a nice size and gorgeous as well. Scent last for hours too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this new perfume! I'm not usually a fan of vanilla scents but this has the lightest touch of vanilla so that it is not overpowering. The vanilla in addition to the lavender smells so clean. This will definitely be my go-to scent for fall/winter (although it’s versatile enough to be used year-round as well!)

reviews.review_title: Smells beautiful but doesn't last long
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I smelled this I immediately had to buy it because it's such a beautiful, sweet vanilla which I love, but it lasted 2-3 hrs tops before I could not longer smell it unless my nose was on my skin. I noticed it lasts much longer on my clothing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are a perfume connoisseur or just a perfume lover in general the Burberry Goddess is a must. The three vanilla levels and touch of lavender is a perfect mixture that excites the nose and soothes the soul. It is soft and classy. Perfect for the office, night out or even going shopping. The staying power last around 6 hours. I have been complimented several times and asked what I have on while wearing this perfume. My husband who usually doesn’t care for perfume loves the scent of the Burberry goddess. Even my 22 year old son loves it and bought a bottle for his girlfriend. The bottle is a beautiful classy glass. This unique gourmand fragrance is made with a vegan formula led by a powerful trio of vanillas. On top, a vanilla infusion with woody tonalities, at the heart a vanilla caviar with a rich sweetness, and at the base a vanilla absolute enriched with luminous lavender. I would recommend this perfume to anyone that is looking for a beautiful true vanilla scent.

reviews.review_title: Want to be sophisticatedly edible? This is it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous, upscale, delicious vanilla.  The projection dies down for me between 5-6 hours, but the scent lasts all day.  Warm, but not too warm for spring or summer.  For me this is more of a daytime scent.  Very good purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was selected to test and review Burberry Goddess perfume for my honest opinion.  The bottle is so elegant and looks fancy on my dresser. The scent is of Vanilla up front. Then woody and sweet notes. Also a soft hint of lavender. The Vanillas used are a Vegan formula from Madagascar, so fancy. I have received many compliments on what fragrance I was wearing. My Husband loves it and my teenage daughter is always sneaking a few spritz when I'm not around lol. The scent is strong, but smells luxurious. It lasts for a few hours on skin, on clothing if you mist from afar, it lasts forever. Definitely recommend! I also feel it's a scent that can be worn year round, not just summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I feel so elegant when I wear this perfume…it’s sensual and classy. I like that it is not offensive and it does not smell cheap. The perfume has a very smooth note of vanilla and a tint splash of lavender. I love it! This is the perfect perfume for the fall/ winter time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A perfectly sweet vanilla scent! Not overpowering and super sophisticated - bought the 30 mL size to try it out and will definitely be purchasing full size when it runs out!! My most complimented scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favorite Burberry perfume to date! At first spray, it has the best warm vanilla sweet and spicy scent that has a touch of woods. Not too warm and not too spicy, just perfect enough to wear in the daytime. This could really be worn year round, day or night. The words that come to mind is golden goddess so they done a great job with the name! My favorite perfume is ysl libre intense so if you're a fan of that line, you will also like this one. The only complaint I have is that it doesn't last as long as you would expect a parfum to last, which seems to be par for the course for most perfumes nowadays. You have to spray every couple of hours on the skin but it stays much longer on clothing although faint. This would make a fabulous gift! I'll definitely be repurchasing when I run out!

reviews.review_title: Adding this to my list of favorites!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying out this product now for a good month I can say that I really really liked it!!! It smells so nice, it has a strong but subtle sweet & spicy vanilla scent to it that blends out lovely! It seems like the scent doesn’t last much, but if I go back to the clothes I wore the days I used the perfume I can still smell it even after several days later and it smells even better.  The bottle is beautiful! I get many compliments from the public

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A nice soft scent with a strong vanilla dominance. Easy for day to day wear as it is not too strong or overpowering. The vanilla makes it quite youthful in my opinion.   Classic clean Burberry packaging would make a great gift!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so excited about this new perfume from Burberry!  It has an nice, elegant smell and is not overwhelming like other perfume.  My aunt has already purchased her own because she loves the smell so much.  The hint of vanilla is just right and gives off a ladylike scent with the other ingredients.   I highly recommend for anyone who loves vanilla notes!

reviews.review_title: Long Lasting, Very Complimentary, Must Have!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I recieved Blurberry Goddess Eau de Perfume I was really excited. The bottle is gold, square, beautiful and luxury looking. It has a refill ability which is not common in most perfumes. The scent is warm and sweet with hints of vanilla and a little lavender. Definitely not over powering and when I'm out, I get so many compliments which is a confidence booster. You don't need much either! Definitely a house favorite. We can't leave the house without my children spraying themselves either. After a long day and I come home, most of the time I can still smell it on me. After using it for a few weeks, I must say- I'm still in love with it! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Makes you smell so good. Like mouth watering.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had strangers telling me I smell amazing and it lasted all day long. I have a new favorite perfume. I smelled good enough to eat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This had a different scent than what I normally go for but I love it. The scent is kind of spicy and floral. It isn't too overpowering and can be layered if you want a stronger scent. I enjoyed that the bottle was also easy to use and the cap seals the product in well. All in all I am satisfied with a new scent for my collection. I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

I love this perfume. It has an elegant scent. It’s not to sweet, not woody and it’s not overbearing. Every time I smell it I think of an elegantly dressed lady at a dinner party. If you like elegant and beautiful fragrances, this is the one you should have. I love it and it’s now in my fragrance repertoire. Plus, I love the compliments I get when I wear it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells amazing! I can't really describe the scent nor can I compare it to anything else I usually wear. I'm not a big fan of vanilla scents so I was surprised I liked this one...then again to me it doesn't smell like vanilla till the end of the day. Literally the only Burberry perfume I like, not a fan of their others. Had to give it three stars though because it does not last on skin. If you spritz your clothes you're fine and by the end of the day you'll smell like vanilla because although it doesn't initially smell like vanilla it does when it dries down. I sprayed this on my elbow pits, neck, and behind my ears...drove 40 minutes to see a friend asked her how I smelled and she couldn't even tell I was wearing perfume that's how bad the staying power of this perfume is. I then went to a sephora with her to show her the perfume...sprayed myself again in store and within an hour I smelled like I wasn't wearing anything. I truly love the way it smells but I don't think I'll repurchase because it doesn't stay on. I think I'd rather wear sol de janeiro 40...it smells like gentle fluidity gold by MFK (another vanilla scent...again I swear I don't usually like vanilla) because all though it doesn't smell the same (beautiful in its own way) at least by the time I get ready for bed I still smell like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was provided to me by Influenster in exchange for a review. First of all and the most important to me is that this smell lasted throughout the day for me, which is something that I always look for in my perfumes. The smell is a nice woodsy smell with what I believe are some citrus and floral notes. It’s a little more woodsy than I would prefer usually but I’m loving it so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess is beautiful. I received the 50mL bottle for free from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest review. The bottle is simple yet luxe. I love the gold detailing that complements the ambery/golden color of both the glass bottle and the intoxicating juice inside. I think there's a good amount of perfume oil in the bottle because there's a glow it gives the skin after it dries down. This is lovely to wear all year round but will be great in the fall--- as all gourmands are. This is not cloyingly sweet though. This is a sexy, feminine, comfy warm hug. It's vanilla on vanilla on vanilla, which I  love...but it's more complex---expensive vanilla. It's aromatic with so much depth. The vanilla is spicy. The lavender is gentle instead of masculine. I prefer to spray it on about an hour before stepping out so as to allow it to settle into my skin and clothing. I also like to spray a little of it on before bed. Top notes are vanilla infusion, cacao, ginger, and lavender; middle note is vanilla caviar, and base note vanilla absolute—A great gift for a gourmand lover! It’s also vegan.

reviews.review_title: For all the vanilla based fragrance lovers
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When speaking on this product think rich, dense, and sweet. Vanilla based fragrances have been a part of the fragrancelines for forever, and they can be hit or miss. This Burberry Goddess fragrance exceeded my expectations. This is not your basic vanilla fragrance. You get the warm, rich, characteristics of the vanilla with the faint bitter and almost buttery smooth smell of caramel. Paired with this rich sweetness is the elegant notes of flowers that tone down the the vanilla that can be over bearing in other products that are vanilla based.  There are the perfect combinations of aromas in this perfume that make it super feminine and also alluring. I have worn this almost daily since receiving it and have had many compliments. Overall, it  is an elegant, classy fragrance that is suitable for daytime or nighttime and lasts up to 10 hours without having to reapply. I am very pleased with this fragrance and would definitelyrecommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was told this was similar to YSL Libre. No, it’s better! It is familiar… maybe Born in Roma or a blend of both! It’s cozy, sweet, not overly floral, everyday type of scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so nice and would rate higher except that I find it wears off really fast.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item through Influenster but after smelling it, it’s made me want to keep repurchasing it! It has a nice vanilla smell but not too strong. I love pairing it with a cashmere type of body mist because they compliment each other so well

I’ve been using this for almost 4 weeks in the summer heat in California. I have found that it’s long lasting however I have noticed that some days last more than others but I am not sure why. I have received many compliments whenever I wear it. I think that it’s smells delicious and mature if that makes sense

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion. I absolutely adore this fragrance. It has deep notes of vanilla and the dry down is amazing with a long lasting scent. I feel that it’s very transitional from one season to the next and can be layered with other scents that compliment it and the season. I’ve received several compliments while wearing it as well which I think just speaks volumes about it. The packaging feels luxurious and heavy and what you would expect from Burberry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Burberry Goddess complimentary from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest review.   This is a gorgeous Fragrance!! If you love Vanilla...this one's for you!! Burberry Goddess has Top notes of Vanilla, Lavender, Ginger and Cacao with a Middle note of Vanilla Caviar and a base note of Vanilla Absolute. The combination of these notes creates this warm, gourmand, enticing, deliciously soft scent that can make any woman feel like a Goddess!  I, personally, smell mostly warm Vanilla with a tiny little hint of Lavender...and maybe a barely there hint of Cacao. When I wear this fragrance, it makes me feel so pretty, sexy and Feminine! This alluring scent is absolutely perfect for all year round and great for work, date night or even just running errands. Goddess's beautiful, classy and timeless scent will never go out of style!  Burberry Goddess's intoxicating scent is housed in an eye-catching square clear glass bottle with a gold Burberry medallion in the center and topped with a gold cap. The fragrance itself is a golden liquid, which pulls the entire gorgeously golden Luxe packaging together! The box is just as beautiful as the bottle, a pale pinkish-champagne colored box with a golden label in the center. The presentation of Burberry Goddess is stunning!  If you love Vanilla, then definitely try the Brand New Burberry Goddess! This will definitely be a repurchase for me once it's gone!!  #Burberry  #BurberryGoddess #Influenster #VoxBox #Goddess

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a few Burberry fragrances and this one is now my new favorite! The packaging itself is very beautiful and simple with the gold Burberry Goddess emblem attached to the clear front of the bottle and has it a decorative gold top to it as well. The fragrance is described to have the top notes as: vanilla infusion and lavender; the middle notes are: vanilla caviar; and the base notes: vanilla absolute. When I first applied it on the it sits a little intense and then it settle down but I smell mostly the vanilla notes, I can't quite smell any of the lavender notes. The fragrance is very beautiful and sultry and get compliments on it all the time when I wear it. The fragrance wears pretty well throughout the day for me I get subtle bits of the fragrance all day long. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love love this perfume! I wanted a perfume like this one but without orange and any kind of white floral. It's my dream perfume and my husband love it very much. Usually I don't like lavender too much but this one is just perfect. Hard to describe I just adore it 😍 ❤️ and I don't think it similar to Libre at all. I don't like Libre it gives me headaches.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has quickly become a staple in my perfume collection. It’s got beautiful vanilla, amber, and lavender notes that make me feel like cozy sweaters and crackling fires. Influenster and Burberry gave me this to give an honest review, and I’m so glad they did. This is going to be a perfect fragrance for fall and winter. The only downside is that the scent feels like it wears off a bit early, after about 3-4 hours. I have gotten so many compliments when I wear this fragrance. The bottle is beautiful too, with a heavy, luxurious feel. This is one I will definitely be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The bottle is gorgeous, and I am a huge Burberry perfume fan; however, this one isn’t my favorite. I didn’t find it to be very long lasting. Also, the scent is similar to other vanilla-forward rich scented perfumes.

reviews.review_title: Vanilla lovers will be very happy with this scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving the combination of the three different types of vanilla. Instead of a sweet vanilla, it is a warm vanilla with different depths as the perfume begins to dry down. A warm scent that would be perfect for autumn and cold weather. This scent reminds me of sitting on the sofa all cozy under a blanket on a freezing winter day. The lavender and vanilla work in tandem to truly bring forth a unique and intoxicating scent. Lastly, the bottle itself is so attractive and classy. The heavy glass with gold accents looks too pretty sitting on top of my vanity with the rest of my perfume collection. I bought the 50 ml and will be purchasing the 100 ml when this bottle gets to the halfway mark. Just buy it. If you love vanilla, buy it. You will not regret it. Thank me later!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Burberry Goddess perfum will have you feeling just like a goddess. This scent isn't over powering, it's very light, but it lasts all day. It smells very elegant, and I highly recommend it. I wear this everyday, and I always get compliments.

reviews.review_title: The vanilla I've been waiting for!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I understand the high reviews, I'm in love with this fragrance. Sampled it in store and I liked it but wasn't 100% because I was nose blind from smelling so many perfumes. Decided to buy the travel size as a start, and I've worn it all week. This is hands down my favourite vanilla/gourmand scent to date - it isn't obvious vanilla to me, especially when first sprayed.
