I definitely get the warmth of the vanilla but then also something else, which I assume is the floral/lavender component. As it dries down it does get a bit more vanilla-y but never cloying, never in-your-face vanilla. There's always something else that balances it perfectly and makes it a sophisticated fragrance instead of I just poured vanilla extract all over myself, if that makes sense. I'm definitely going to be wearing this all fall and winter (though I think it could be worn all year), just ordered the full sized bottle. The only negative I have to say is that it only lasts about 4-5 hours on me, which is about average. I do find spraying it on my clothes helps.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this scent! It's so calming yet romantic, sexy but subtle. Definitely signature scent worthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very picky when it comes to vanilla perfumes because while I love vanilla scent some brands do it poorly. This one is perfect. It's vanilla but not nauseating vanilla . Its perfect to wear alone or to layer it. I also love the packaging .I was thrilled that the bottle is refillable. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: You really have to smell perfumes for yourself, reviews can be pointers to fragrances you may like. I tried this one in the store and my impressions are: sweet; vanilla; hint of something floral. The scent lasted several hours on my wrist. However,  I've had body lotions which smelt pretty much like this perfume. It's not bad, but I wouldn't call it a special fragrance either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Burberry Goddess Parfum smells amazing. It's based on different vanilla notes. The scent is not overly sweet, which makes this one of my favorite vanilla perfumes. The bottle itself looks very luxurious. And the scent is long-lasting.

reviews.review_title: A sophisticated take on a 2000s scent?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Quick Note: I received this product for free from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest review.   Are you a millennial looking for a sophisticated take on your nostalgic scent by Britney? Probably not, but this candy-sweet Burberry scent might remind you of your beloved Curious just the same. It’s long-lasting playful fragrance that has warm notes of vanilla and baking spices but with a more-than-subtle impression of cotton candy. Look for me wearing this fragrance while browsing Claire’s for the cutest butterfly clips.

I hate to say it, but honestly, I’m not sure I’m a fan of this. I’ll start off by saying that I received this product for free from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest review. For the good stuff: I LOVE Burberry as a brand- so I was absolutely ecstatic to receive this. The bottle is gorgeous! I’m a huge fan of perfumes and I love to collect them and display them beautifully on my vanity. This bottle stands out- minimalistic yet gorgeous! The scent is what throws me off a bit. I won’t say it smells bad, because it definitely does have a captivating scent to it and it smells expensive and of wonderful quality. That being said, I personally feel that it has too strong of a caramel/vanilla scent. Upon spraying, I immediately noticed a sweet vanilla smell. After a few moments, all that I could smell was pure caramel. I’m not sure why, as I don’t believe this has any notes of caramel in it. I know others love the smell, and I even got compliments while wearing it, so I know it smells great to some! But on a personal level, I couldn’t get past the super sweet caramel smell, as I felt like I was a walking candy display. I know that every scent reacts differently with every persons skin, so this may not be the case for others. While I wouldn’t reach for this often, I can see certain occasions where this may work well. Would I recommend? Yes, as I think others may absolutely love this perfume. Would I personally purchase? Unfortunately, no, as I don’t feel this scent suits me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess is not your run of the mill vanilla. It is a beautiful, mature fragrance that warms up your senses the moment it hits your nose. I was excited about the lavender, but on me it smells more like an amber note. This is a great every day cozy vanilla, and it layers well with other fragrances. It’s a keeper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My boyfriend is a bit of a cologne, perfume enthusiast- when I wore this for date night, instantly upon getting into the car, he eyed me and asked what I was wearing. I asked him if he liked it or not, and he said it was a different in a good way, since I tend to gravitate toward more floral and clean scents. I like the sweetness of it, and can smell it for many hours afterwards. It’s a win!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Every year on my birthday, I pick out a new scent to be my perfume for the year. This is my new favorite scent. It is a very romantic, warm, scent, heavy on the vanilla (which is one of my favorites). I have been wearing it for a few weeks now and I am always getting complimented on the smell. It’s not too overpowering either and is a great scent to layer with your other perfumes at home!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume free from Influenster. As a love of warm, musky, sweet perfumes this was right up my alley. When I put this on the first time, I couldn’t shake the thought that it smelled so familiar to me. I realized that it’s very similar, in my opinion, to Bath and Body Works Gingham a heart of Gold, which has since been discontinued. However, it was MUCH stronger. This was a little too strong and long lasting for me, but if you love statement perfumes, it will be just right for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume from Burberry smells amazing and the bottle is beautiful. Looks so nice in my room and used it for special occasions and received compliments!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall it smelled nice and I got compliments on it however it didn’t last as long as I would’ve liked it to but other than that it was a good perfume

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume! I was a bit hesitant at first becuse I feel like it’s hard to find a good scent but this one is great. It definitely has vanilla in it but it’s not too overpowering I’d say it’s sweet and warm. I wear it daily and get compliments on how good I smell. I highly recommend and it would be great for fall too.

reviews.review_title: Become a firm fave in my perfume rotation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this perfume! It’s a relatively sweet vanilla scent - it felt familiar to me but I can’t exactly place which perfume it reminded me of. Being honest, I received this perfume as a free sample, but as soon as I wore it once, I started wearing it every day. Genuinely went and bought a bottle! It lasts well, the scent stays throughout the day without becoming stale. Even after I wore it for a couple of weeks in a row, I could still catch hints of it through the day, it didn’t fade into the background like many perfumes do. For reference, other perfumes I like are j’adore Dior and YSL black opium.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is very similar to the original Burberry scent but a touch sweeter with the vanilla but not as sweet as other vanilla fragrances can be. The scent lasts for a very long time - a couple sprays goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A very warm scented vanilla. I personally like a cooler depth to my sweeter scented perfumes to make it feel less girly so I gave it 4 stars. However, if you truly enjoy a very sweet perfume, this will be perfect for you. Very long lasting and nice packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the warm ambery vanilla scent that Burberry has crafted. It's the perfect daytime fragrance to have in your collection! I received this product as a free sample courtesy of Influenster and  I was sent the 1.6oz bottle. I love it so much!
After using his product for a few weeks I love it I know I smell the hands of musk very beautiful scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complementary to test out. My thoughts:  First impression-Packaging looks luxurious. There’s a heavy weight to the bottle. It looks beautiful.  It smells VERY sweet. Too sweet for my liking, HOWEVER, it does smell like luxury. If you want to have a signature scent that will command a room, then this will be your bestie. It is strong and will stay on your skin all day. So that’s a plus. Very overwhelming and overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I sampled this perfume for a month and it a beautiful gourmand fragrance with strong notes of vanilla. It is warm and lingers well throughout the day. I would say this would be great for the Fall and Winter months, but if you like a warm and sweet fragrance this is definitely a top contender.

reviews.review_title: She's slow burn, all day winner
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: She's a slow build that packs a punch. I have been wearing this almost everyday since I received it and I fall more & more in love with it. It's long lasting,  intense, that lingers around you as if you're wearing a halo. I have received so many compliments from wearing this fragrance. Uber drivers, ppl standing next to at concerts. She's smells like money & I am obsessed.

If you have also been on an inane and increasingly weary quest to dupe bbw “dreamy vanilla woods” since 2011, i can tell you that this is that but the more sophisticated and more perfect version! Best vanilla perfume ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing, classic vanilla scent. It’s long lasting, and very pleasant. It’s fragrant without being too overpowering. It does smell different on the body than it does smelling it from the bottle. Smelling the bottle gives almost a peppery vanilla scent, but I found it wears like a classic, warm vanilla- much nicer on the body.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My first Burberry scent and I’m so excited to have it in my collection! The bottle is stunning to display and the scent is long lasting but in a good way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical because I’m not usually a fan of vanilla but idk how this is sweet but not overpoweringly sweet like other vanilla heavy scents. I really love the combo. Definitely in my goddess area wearing this. My only issue is that, on the skin, it doesn’t last more than 5hrs. Other than that is delicious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this perfume for a few weeks I have really enjoyed it! The warm vanilla scent mixed with the flowery lavender scent is a great combination. Usually I shy away from florals so that’s why I gave it 4 stars, but overall I think this is an attractive scent and the bottle is stunning as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not the typical smell I like but this is very nice. It’s light, feminine and last a long time. Will definitely keep this is my rotation of good scents

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has a vanilla scent, but it’s not overly sweet like other vanilla perfumes. I wouldn’t necessarily classify it as a gourmand scent. It has other notes that give it complexity and richness. I like it for daytime but it could also work for date night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m obsessed with this perfume! I’m a big vanilla fan and this perfume smells amazing! It’s not too strong but it’s strong enough to last all day. Ever since I’ve been wearing it I get a lot of compliments

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such a gorgeous scent! Typically vanilla is too sweet for me but since it is paired with the lavender this doesn’t have that issue. It’s a very warm and rich scent, it feels luxurious! The bottle is absolutely stunning, this would be the perfect gift. I think this is a perfect daily wear, highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this scent free from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest opinion. really loved this scent. It reminded me of Ralph Lauren's Tender Romance but with more citrus. It does unfortunately wear faster than other Burberry scents I use like Brit. I only got about two hours out of this consistently. It is pleasant and not overpowering, and it really works nicely for a subtle everyday scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For now on, this is going to be my to go perfume. I fell in love with the vanilla scent on this perfume. It smells warm and sweet. It has a very subtle lavender scent, but the vanilla overpowers it. The best part is that the scent lingers in the body and really does last all day. This is a very wearable perfume to use all year round.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this perfume and instantly fell in love. It's a delightful blend of vanilla and wood, making it one of my top 3 choices for nighttime scents. The alluring and sophisticated aroma gives it an elegant vibe. Its uniqueness stands out from my previous experiences, and that's what I adore most about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells so rich and cozy. Love the vanilla - this will be my go to for fall although I’ve already been using it because it’s too good to wait! Perfect for those that love a warm scent that lasts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is definitely getting added to my rotation. It smells warm and sweet and is perfect for everyday wear. The vanilla and lavender pair together perfectly. The scent is warm vanilla right away and then fades into hints of Lavender and spice. The bottle is beautiful and is packaged well. A little went a long way so I feel like the bottle will last a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just got this yesterday and I looove it. And the dry down is warm and just beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite perfume!! It smells warm and sweet and is perfect for everyday. The vanilla and lavender pair together perfectly. The best part is that it lasts all day long! You can’t go wrong with this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is really really good and the smell lasts a long time. Wore it to ly event and the smell never quit once.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This frangrance lists so many forms of vanilla as notes abs ingredients. It’s much more than that. The first wave of scent is very amber. Next comes a very clean, almost masculine scent. Then comes the vanilla. Not just a single note but different types of vanilla to form a complex warmness. Personally on me, the vanilla becomes a warm, powdery, sweet that is very clean and versatile. Definitely a fall/winter scent dominantly but could also be a daily wear if that is your style. Not overpowering after everything settles. I do wish it lasted longer for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a huge fan of sweet scent but this is exceptional. It seamlessly blends a subtly warm and luxurious vanilla with the calming essence of lavender. Over time, the fragrance evolves into a cozy, woody aroma. The remarkable part is its longevity, lingering on me from 8am until the end of the day . I must confess, I’m enamored by this scent, making it an ideal choice for winter days. Additionally, the bottle carries an air of femininity and opulence. All things considered, this fragrance is one-of-a-kind and exceptionally delightful to the senses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this perfume. Initially, this perfume goes on very strong. The vanilla is extremely apparent, it lingers as you wear it. If you can get past the initial spray, you may like it! And if you love vanilla, I think you should give it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I despise Lavender in a fragrance. I prefer it in the form of aromatherapy. This has changed my mind! It Is well blended, and the the vanilla is so refined to me. I appreciate this fragrance so much!💕

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the smell of this, beautiful vanilla scent but its such a skin scent. I ended up returning. After an hour I couldnt smell it. Very disappointed. I like a fragrance that has a nice scent trail and she was not it. For the price point it should have more silage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: An elegant and simple designed bottle from Burberry in gold. This fragrance is led by a powerful trio of vanillas, with a touch of lavender. Burberry Goddess is a a perfect perfume for those who loves warm, sweet scent. On a side note, it is the first refillable perfume by Burberry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love warm scents — my favorite is YSL black opium. I’d say this is a bit more vanilla and sweet rather than spicy, but I love how it smells. I do notice that it fades quicker than some other perfumes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Initially, i honestly thought that this perfume smelled alot like black opium. But after a while i noticed it has a huge vanilla tone to it which im not super fond of... as far as staying power, id say it was about average if not a little bit quick to fade.

reviews.review_title: A must have in your fragrance collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Always receive compliments when I wear it. The Vanilla in the perfume makes you smell like a literal goddess

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sold when i saw the notes, I love vanilla in a fragrance but with a couple perfumes i can think of with the lavender and vanilla combo, i wasn't sure what to expect. At first spray, I get ginger and vanilla, not too sweet with a hint of spice. About 5-10 minutes in, the lavender comes through and the vanilla gets sweeter but not cloyingly sweet. You can smell the vanilla the whole time. This fragrance projects fairly well once sprayed but becomes a skin scent in about an hour, but sticks around for hours on clothes. It is much sweeter on paper to me, so try on skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new fall/winter scent! This perfume is soft, classy and sophisticated. The scent is warm vanilla right away and then fades into hints of Lavender and spice. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance exudes an elegant and sophisticated clean vanilla aroma that I find appealing. Initially, there's a slightly chilly and almost edible quality when sprayed, but it gradually becomes sweeter and more feminine. Later, I detect gentle wafts of airy vanilla, with a subtle almost-cardamom-like element present (even though it's not officially listed). This note adds a touch of unisex character. However, the final stages of drydown, when the fragrance settles on the skin, might be somewhat uninteresting. I reapplied it a few hours later, and it turned out to be decently good. If you're a vanilla enthusiast, you'll likely enjoy it, especially if you're not looking for an overly sugary gourmand vanilla fragrance.

reviews.review_title: Must have scent for any vanilla lovers!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are a huge fan of all this vanilla then this is the perfume for you. I love that the scent not overpowering yet I get asked what scent I am wearing. It last a long time also. I sprayed it on early morning and could still smell it by the end of the day. I was surprised it lasted through the heat of a day out in Atlanta. The bottle it aesthetically pleasing as well and easy to spray considering I have joint issues with my hands. I recommend giving this scent a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered a travel size after testing in store. It’s my new favourite vanilla perfume. Similar to YSL Libre but more vanilla forward. It’s a gorgeous vanilla lavender. Mature and classy. All season type of scent and day/evening wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this perfume! The warm, vanilla scent is so romantic and powerful. Wearing this perfume makes me feel so classy and confident. Some scents do give me a headache, and I am pleased to report this one definitely does not! I enjoy the luxe packaging as well, it is beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this fragrance, it smells luxurious without feeling too heavy. I appreciate it’s not just a night time or night out fragrance. It’s great for all day wear too. It has a deep Vanilla and light musk smell. Would continues to use for sure

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I first read the perfume box and saw all the different notes of vanilla, I cringed. I am not the biggest vanilla scent fan. The bottle is beautiful. Thankfully, the perfume is not as bad as I was expecting. It is sweet and a touch smoky, and the scent lasts a good while on skin but did not give me a headache. This perfume would make a great gift for anyone who loves vanilla scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Se supone que tenía que probar este perfume pero nunca me llegó, servicio técnico nunca me respondió algo conciso, así que no tengo nada que decir

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as PR a couple of weeks ago, I was a little skeptical bc I’m vvvvv picky on smells. I typically wear Light Blue or Black Opium, those two are my tried and trues. As soon as I got it I sprayed a couple spritz and immediately fell in love. It’s a perfect year around smell. I will def be coming back to purchase once I’m done with this bottle. It also lasts alllll day, even in the Texas heat!!

reviews.review_title: I want to gatekeep this so bad but can’t
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely going to be my new signature scent. I have been looking for a vanilla perfume that doesn’t smell fake and that blends into skin more and this is the perfect one. I will be buying a full size of this for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells heavenly, it’s my new daily perfume. It’s a warm vanilla scent with a sweet and slightly floral undertone. It’s very long lasting but not overpowering on first application. It has a very subtle lavender scent, but the vanilla overpowers. It’s a great every day scent for every season.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice perfume. The bottle is very pretty. Its light and smells like vanilla. I gave it 3 stars because it isnt a scent that I would want to wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this!! I feel like it’s similar, but better than YSL Black Opium. It smells amazing and has a strong scent that lasts all day. Very vanilla though, so if you don’t like vanilla, you will likely not like this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I Never and I mean NEVER write reviews, but let me tell you OH MY GOD YOU NEED THIS IN YOUR LIFE. I’m a perfume collector and I trust me when I say I HAVE A LOT. But this one goes straight up to my top three. It’s a sexier version of vanilla. It says oh I’m innocent but with a sexy side. I’m sweet but flirt. It’s a vanilla dream. Burberry absolutely killed it with this one! GO BUY IT

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sweet smelling vanilla perfume that belongs in the warm and spicy fragrance family. It lasts the entire day and turns into a subtle vanilla scent. I like that it doesn’t have a musky scent which worked out well because I don’t like musk. Not the best summer scent but I think it’ll be great for winter! The design of the bottle is also very elegant.

reviews.review_title: Vanilla lovers, y’all are gonna love this.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is so simple yet so beautiful. I have a lot of perfumes with a prominent vanilla note, but majority of them are suitable for the winter. But the ginger and lavender in this make it super wearable in the summer and year around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never wear gourmand scents. But before the crazy amount of reviews, I still thought I needed to try it. After all, we’re all goddess right? I did the purse spray and I’ll be returning for the FULL bottle. Love at first spritz. It’s true, the scent doesn’t last long at all. The tricks I follow are - use an oil first, then spray and do NOT rub, let it dry. I’ve used MYTH by Ellis for a while - layering them is absolutely amazing. I use MYTH as a base scent, I don’t love it alone. Together it was an absolute dream! It makes this last longer and takes this luxury to the next level. I hope you get to give it a chance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm sorry, but I have better smelling perfumes than this. This smells like soap!! I don't understand why people raving over this and comparing the smells to Valentino Born. Nope that's not even close. The Valetino Born is exquisite!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this perfume for some weeks now and I live it but not love it just because for me it’s extremely sweet and for this hot weather is a no go maybe winter I will wait maybe I will change my mind about it I can pick the vanilla instantly and for me it’s not the most lasting fragance I own but it last a pretty decent amount of time I think for somebody that love sweet vanilla fragrances they will love it, The bottle is my favorite think it’s super gorgeous an luxurious overall I will keep using it because i think it’s not a bad fragance at all is just about preferences

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this for the past few weeks i definitely need to share some thoughts, let me start off with usually I am not a “sweet” fragrance kind of gal. Personally when I read “vanilla” notes I usually avoid even smelling. Therefor, when I received this I was not really expecting to love this as much as I actually do. It definitely has the perfect amount of vanilla (it’s very much there too) with very subtle fresh herby smell. This is perfect for business attire, date nights or night outs, it’s a very “mature” smell if that makes sense. I felt super confident and extremely happy with the long wear. Let alone the endless compliments I received! It’s lightweight yet very bold ✨ highly recommend if you are trying/wanting a sweet fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume reminds me exactly of Jessica Simpson’s first perfume Fancy! But way better. My boyfriend loves this one too and usually isn’t big on any fragrance. It lasts forever too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first the smell was very strong to me. Not to long after I really started to like it. Scent last all day. Has a nice vanilla smell. Get compliments often. Don't need to use a lot so the bottle should last a long time. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, love the smell but ZERO lasting power. I’ve found with previous Burberry parfums that there is just no staying power. Disappointed because it is a lovely scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells really good I love it but it smell’s exactly like ariana grandes mod vanilla perfume just a little less sweet. Will be returning, its a more expensive dupe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is sooo good!! The longevity is so much better when sprayed on clothes vs the actual skin. On the skin it lasts 4-5 hours but on clothes it lasts all day! The sweet vanilla dry down is my favorite. It also pairs well with other fragrances. I love pairing this with parfumerie de Marley delina de la rose. That rose and vanilla combo is amazing! Will repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Ebony skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product over the past couple of weeks I'd say it's a great vanilla based fragrance. But it doesn't last long at all. especially for a parfum. I expected more. it's a beautiful compact bottle and pretty sturdy. I've tried spritzing in the hair clothes and everything.   I hope they come out with an intense version of it. at least it should last longer.

reviews.review_title: A Surprise from Burberry’s Vanilla Fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I surprisingly like this perfume since I am usually not into sweet perfume. The vanilla smells pretty nice at the beginning with a decent sweetness, but I noticed it soon turned into a warm woody smell with a very delicate sweet scent. Not too much sweet to make me headache which I really appreciate it. I think this can be wear all seasons and any occasions, and I can tell it would serves to a large age group too. Plus, it lasts a decent amount of time. I sprayed on clothes in my closet and I can still smell it from my clothes after a week. Maybe it won’t last that long when I wear them outside, but I’m pretty happy with it anyway.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume was fabulous. I literally have nothing bad to say about it. It has a nice warm, flowery, yet sophisticated scent to it, and it is a great perfume for everyday use. Ive gotten several compliments on it. Light, yet still strong enough to last all day. Id highly reccomend it. My new favorite by far !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a warm, tangy kind of smell.  I wish it did stay longer though.  So glad I got to sample this perfume offer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I thought it smelled like bananas. I was excited for my boyfriend to smell it on me and he said it smells like CIGARETTES. Now I have to return it. He said it smells like a casino…… He prefers fruity fragrances. Hepres

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Upon application, I noticed a stunning vanilla scent with this Burberry Goddess EDP. It's very beautiful!! This fragrance has hints of lavender which I am partial to also!! Burberry Goddess comes encased in a nice glass bottle that is perfect for gifting. I highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really fell in love with this perfume. It was strong and lasted me all day which makes me love this even more. Received a lot of compliments on this. I’ve already made a purchase so I could stock up. Lol  I’ve noticed others say it doesn’t last but I clearly beg to differ. I don’t spray on my clothes. Instead I put a little oil on my skin where I go to spray and never have issues with it lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging is gorgeous. A great scent that lasted all day long. Who loved vanilla scents, and this is a wonderful option. I like that it isn’t too young of a scent, especially with the uniqueness of the warmth of vanilla and fresh floral notes, so there’s versatility. It works for both day and night. It smooth and powerful, without being overwhelming. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: Best vanilla! My new signature scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this vanilla scent! It’s warm and not overwhelming. It’s like an amber oil and warm vanilla scent. Low key not in your face smell and not super sweet, very earthy. This will be my new everyday signature scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the way it smells on my skin.  At first, I get a small dose of lavender, but the dry down in warm and sweet vanilla. I would rate it higher but the scent is gone in an hour. Zero staying power. Haven’t seen a lot of reviews mention that so maybe it’s just me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess is heavenly! I tried it for the first time before bed and the scent lasted until the next day! It starts off with a lavender and has a beautifully soft vanilla finish.. perfect for day to day and just sweet enough for a night out. You can even layer it with another scent and it layers wonderfully! This will be my new go-to for a daily perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: get a tester first ...smell is great but absolutely does not last..I would say max 2 hrs if that! sprayed on my daughter as well and could barely smell it on her after 30 mins.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smell really good but it kinda remind me of Valentino born in Roma.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the way this perfume smells. It reminds me a bit of Jean Paul Gautier’s Classique scent which I used to love. My husband said it smelled a bit like my bathroom air freshener which is Bath & Body Works lavender vanilla so it definitely presents the scents it claims haha! I wish it lasted a little longer on me but that is an issue I tend to have with many scents. I’d buy this one again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess starts off with heavy, heavy vanilla tones. It reminded me of a certain deodorant all the teenage girls used to wear in early 2000s. But then the scent starts to mellow out and after about 30mins, you start to get delicious wood notes. The perfume is extremely long lasting, my husband commented that I leave a trail of perfume as I walk even after an 8-hour day outside. I personally prefer the more balanced vanilla-wood mixture after about 3 hours of wear. The initial heaviness of the vanilla makes me think this scent is more suitable to fall/winter. I think this one will make it into my regular rotation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This new Burberry perfume was far too vanilla scented for me. It’s also very very sweet smelling. I received this from Influenster in exchange for my honest review and unfortunately it just isn’t my taste! On the plus side, the bottle is beautiful :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The combination of vanilla and lavender strikes a perfect balance between warmth and freshness. This makes it suitable for many occasions. I’m a fan of the vanilla notes, although I wish the fragrance lasted a bit longer on my skin. The initial spritz is beautiful, but tends to fade within a few hours. If you love sweet and inviting scents with a touch of florals, this is worth adding to your collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally find vanilla perfumes to be too cloying, but I really like this one. It is relatively simple, which lets the vanilla really shine. It’s not too sweet and I think it will be really nice in the fall and when the weather starts to get cold.

reviews.review_title: A good perfume, pretty bottle, could be stronger
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good perfume! I am a big Burberry fan (my normal go to perfume is from them) so I was excited to try this one. While I still prefer my default scent, I think the smell of this perfume is really lovely and the bottle is very cute. After using it now for a few weeks, I will say that it has far better lasting power if sprayed onto clothing than your skin - I found myself reapplying it after a few hours. This is fine if you’re okay with that but if you don’t have the time/don’t want to carry a bottle all day it could be a problem. It did work wonders on my shirt, however - I’m not sure how it binds to the fabric but my clothing kept the smell for days. Overall, would recommend if you love the scent, but if not then I would recommend their other perfumes over this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing! Great new edition to the Burberry collection of fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: 3.5 stars   three types of vanilla packed into one perfume. I do pick up on the lavender unlike some reviewers have mentioned and I find that it’s enough to give the perfume some kind of uniqueness. I wouldn’t say this is an incredibly sweet sugary vanilla perfume (surprisingly) which I like because i’m not a goirmand lover. however, this perfume doesn’t last too long (around 5 hours on me) and although the lavender is a nice touch, I dont

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Stop what you’re doing, then the car towards the nearest Sephora and pick up Burberry Goddess! This fragrance has all the notes I love most, leaning heavily on the sweet vanilla side, but with a hint of something a bit more special. Soft notes of lavender peek through the deliciously sweet vanilla to make for a sophisticated and complex fragrance that I have loved wearing every day (and evening) since receiving it! It is sophisticated enough to be your Girl Boss fragrance for work, and just sultry enough for date night with hubby. I have never worn a more beautiful fragrance or felt more elegant wearing one (even my Chanel!).   The bottle is gorgeous, and as a HUGE plus, refillable! So when my favorite bottle starts to run on empty, I can leave it out for hubby to refill as a gift he knows I’ll love!   Burberry, you’ve made vanilla magic with Goddess!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is amazing, even for those that don’t enjoy vanilla fragrances. It customizes to your essence and is long lasting. I can’t see anyone not liking this perfume. It has a rich fragrance that is equally as strong in lavender as it is in vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really loved this fragrance! It’s classic yet not overpowering. Delicate but not too floral. I’d recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My first time trying out a Burberry fragrance and the Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum didn’t disappoint! It’s packaged in a cute peach colored box with gold accents and bottled in a very sleek/modern bottle trimmed with gold. My initial reaction was that the fragrance was extremely intense. However, after about 5 minutes, it faded just enough to a much more pleasant level. It’s a very warm vanilla scent. It reminded me of baking in the fall. Definitely a great addition to my fall fragrance collection.

reviews.review_title: Love it! If you like vanilla, this is a go!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this in the Orlando airport before it was sold at Sephora. I love it! Initially, I only sprayed it on my arm and neck then left the shop only to return within 30 minutes to buy it. I’m so happy Sephora sells it now too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all let’s just look at how sparkling and stunning the bottle is! It perfectly depicts its name “Goddess”. This gourmand perfume is perfect for spring and summer. The note of vanilla makes this perfume sweet and warm from top to end. Lavender and ginger balance out a little bit of the sweetness to make it not overpowering. The fragrance doesn’t last well but still leaves a faint warm sweet fragrance on skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A sexy fragrance !!!! People will literally stop you to ask what you’re wearing I get it almost everyday!!! If you like vanilla warm sexy date night fragrances this is the one for you! Burberry fragrances are 🔥

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not normally the hugest fan of gormand fragrances. I normally prefer fragrances with fresh, fruity, floral, woody, and green notes for the most part, so when I was given this fragrance in exchange for my honest review by Influenster and Burberry, I did not expect all that much. However, I have to say that it may have changed my opinion on at least vanilla heavy fragrances because I did really enjoy this one after wearing it a few times. I didn't get too much lavender, and it mostly came at first spritz. After a bit, I got a pretty rich and decadent, almost chocolatey vanilla which then dried down to be a little bit more boozy. On my skin, this lasted quite a while. I'd say about 7 hours later and people around me were still commenting on it. And, I got so many compliments on this one. I am big on fragrance and I wear a nice perfume every day, but I have never gotten so many compliments as I did with this one. It seems like it's a real crowd pleaser and would probably be a great gift. So although it's something a little different than my usual jam, I still think this one deserves 5 stars. I will note though that the name could have been more original, especially given the fact that Mugler already has an Alien Goddess that is also vanilla heavy, and the packaging in my opinion could be better. It looks like something Versace should have released maybe 10 years ago. However, that doesn't change the juice inside and it's what's inside that counts, right?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: ** I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review **  I am in love with this fragrance! It is so fresh yet warm and oozes of vanilla musk. I love Burberry fragrances and this one has made it to my TOP! Don’t run, walk straight to the store and grab a bottle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice light vanilla. Not getting lavender or much complexity but it’s not cloying either. Its actually quite light in a good way, It’s a nice scent for transition from summer to fall but it’s nothing special. It’s gone quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far one of my favorite purchases this year. It smells amazing and the vanilla is not overwhelming. The only downside to it is that the longevity is just not there. It was gone in a few hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My lord this perfume has me hooked!! The layers of scent is incredible!  I get soooooo many compliments when I wear it, which has been daily at this point because I cannot picture a day without smelling it.  The only drawback I’d say would be it doesn’t last as long as I would like…I apply in the morning and by 1pm I can’t smell it anymore and unless someone is directly on my neck they can’t smell it either.  If I have plans In The evening will do a quick reapply.  But just an excuse to smell it again and be complimented again…HA

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this first time and liked it, then throughout the night I kept getting a sniff of it constantly and it smelled better and better each time!! I couldnt stop smelling myself!! LOVE IT!!! Haha My usual scents are Chanel Chance and CoCo Mademoiselle and V&R Flowerbomb if that helps! My Burberry is a great winter scent for sure!!! Very clean and soft smell.

reviews.review_title: The perfect gift that you could give!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received from influentster for free in exchange for my review. This perfume is literal perfection. From the beautiful bottle with its intricate details, to the scent and longevity of the perfume. I have received so many compliments already. The price asked for the perfume is worth it in every sense. This is a high quality fragrance in a big bottle with strong staying power and a beautiful scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in return for my honest review. I have always been a Burberry fan so I was excited to try this perfume out. The scent notes are all smells that I love and enjoy. I will say this perfume is very strong for me personally. I used one little squirt and it does give me a bit of a headache. I do like the smell I just kinda wish it wasn’t too strong. I feel like this bottle will last forever since you don’t need a ton of squirts to make you smell good. I am going to continue to keep trying it and maybe it will lighten up on me but I do love the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Burberry perfumes but this one was a little too sweet more me. The wear time is good and my friends who tried it really liked it so it’s just a personal preference. I prefer more fresh and floral scents so will give this to a friend who enjoys more sweet and vanilla scents

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received from influentster for free in exchange for my review. This fragrance is great! I wasn’t sure about 3 types of vanilla but it is almost smoky to me? The dry down seems a bit..floral? I’m unsure where that comes from but it’s definitely a more mature vanilla than others I’ve smelled. Definitely warm. My everyday scent is Burberry Her and this is a lot less fruity and more for winter to me. Will be wearing then!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent does NOT disappoint!  I purchased the 1.6 oz. today, however I do plan to exchange for the bigger bottle.  At an additional $39 it is so worth the extra money.  Definitely give this one a 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Personally I’m not the biggest fan of vanilla scents so I wouldn’t repurchase this. The packaging is beautiful but also the lid feels cheap and makes a squeaky sound when moved around. I would like to see better construction considering the price point is on the high end. I think the scent smells nice and sophisticated but I think there are probably other fragrances out there that smell similar and are more affordable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am so happy I took a chance and bought this perfume it smells so good it’s such a beautiful and unique Fragrance and it lasts all day I get so many compliments this is my New Favorite Perfume I definitely recommend I will be repurchasing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is such a win from Burberry. The scent is long lasting and is a perfect combination of vanilla, floral and fresh. I’d say it had the strongest vanilla notes but not in an overpowering or sweet way, more of a fresh and exhilarating way. I love this scent and it has good staying power as I have been complimented on it at work and still smell it at the end of the day. 10/10 would recommend.

reviews.review_title: Must if you like Lavender or Vanilla.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in awe with how just amazing this is! Better than I could’ve imagined. It is delicious. It does remind me of Mon Guerlain, but better imho. Guerlain has this slight powerdy note on dry down that this does NOT have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells so good! Not too heavy but definitely a lasting smell. Burberry fragrances always have a soft finish that’s lasts all day.  I receive so many compliments every time I wear this fragrance and would highly recommend. Thanks Influenster for sending this to me to try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest review. First off, I LOVE vanilla fragrances, so I was thrilled to try this one. It’s not overly sweet, but more warm cozy with a slight woodsy undertone. It lasted on my skin about 8 hours or so before fading. If you like warm full bodied vanilla you’ll love this. My only teeny tiny complaint is the touch of lavender which I don’t enjoy, it’s faint, but still there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. I love this scent. Perfect for everyday or into the night. It doesn’t last super long which kind of stinks but it last for a good amount of time. The scent isn’t too floral just a nice classy scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume. The scent is strong but not overbearing. It lingers all day. The packaging is perfect not to “out there” fits the scent. It’s not just a one kinda perfume , it can be used to be for a nice dinner to just hanging out with friends. It’s hard for me to find anything I like , this just fell into my hands worth every bit. I will defiantly continue to use and buy.

I’ve been wearing this perfume for every day for about three weeks, and I look forward to using it. It has a sensual type of fragrance with notes of musky vanilla, and the staying power is amazing. I spritz it on my wrists in the morning and I can still smell it around 6 hours later. This is my new go-to scent and I feel like it works well for both day and night! I love the smell of vanilla, and this really ticks all the boxes off everything I want in a perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful scent. Vanilla forward, but not candy like. Very gourmand and somewhat spicy notes. Scent changes on the skin nicely and lasts quite awhile. I received this product as part of a promotion and I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very picky when it comes to scents so when I picked this scent up in July, I knew it would be one of the best fragrances I’ve purchased in a long time. I love it on its own, or layered underneath Kay Ali Pistachio Gelato - I swear I smell like a soft cloud! It’s such an intimate scent & I swoon every time I wear it. Definitely a staple in my scent collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say I was hesitant to try something new but the scent was long lasting but not overwhelming and powerful something about it made me want to keep trying it and now I’m in love with it even my teenage daughter fell in love with it!!!  I’d have to say YES I recommend it even if you are used to something else give it a try it won’t disappoint you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This scent reminds me so much of the Prada Candy perfume. Smells so good and fresh it’s not an overly warm scent where it’ll give headaches. Smells clean and rich !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tested this Burberry Goddess perfume for two weeks before leaving this review. The moment I spray it, I pick up the scents of warm vanilla and floral musk. It smells so good. I have received several compliments and people are continuously asking me for the brand name. And I don’t have to use a touch up spray. I can clearly smell it after getting home from a long day. I love this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this scent, it definitely reminds me of Valentino: born in Roma. This is perfect for an everyday scent. It doesn’t have a strong lavender, which I smell more vanilla but a subtle vanilla.

reviews.review_title: Makes you feel like a goddess for sure!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells so luxurious, has great sillage and lasts at least 8 hours on the skin. This was a very pricy blind purchase for me but I immediately regretted not getting the 3oz bottle when I smelled it. Definitely signature scent worthy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This reminds me of the Billie Eilish perfume! It is not as heavy on the gourmand note like Billie’s, but it is just as good. This is perfect if you like a soft and sexy vanilla scented fragrance. It is intoxicating and leaves you wanting to smell it over and over.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Is this a unique scent I’ve never smelled before? No. But it’s got 5 stars for me. The staying power is there, I can wear this is any season (not too spicy for summer), it’s feminine and not overpowering. It’s also buildable which I love too. Worth the purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The fragrance is sexy and sultry. Definitely a great date night scent definitely worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When it comes to packing and scent- I absolutely love this product. My only complaint is that it doesn’t last long. After an hour or two it fades off completely

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start off by saying simply, this scent is everything I could ever want in a fragrance.  It’s beautiful!  It has notes of vanilla and lavender and are perfect for a nice night out of a beautiful fall day.  I love woodsy scents and this definitely falls right into that category!  It’s feminine but not in a floral way which is perfect for me!  It has a sweet yet strong undertone that lasts all day.  I’m in love!!  100 percent recommend!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a super fan of vanilla but am not a hater either. For me Burberry Goddess has vanilla done just right. It's very spicy and warm and melts into a sweet caramel type scent then it dries to a slightly musky vanilla. For the most part it is not a skin scent until the very last which I'm guessing was at about six hours. I haven't cared for Burberry fragrances in the past and they've somewhat been nose tweakers but they've really stepped up their fragrance game in my opinion and their recent releases have been enjoyable. I think Goddess is one to purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is an impeccable choice, maintaining its allure throughout the entire day without becoming overpowering. The initial impression is a delightful essence of vanilla, followed by subtle hints of lavender that gracefully emerge. I opt for a delicate spritz on my wrist and a gentle touch on my neck. The glass bottle design is not only elegant but also eco-friendly with its refillable feature, adding convenience as the fragrance gradually depletes. It has swiftly earned the status of my newfound adored aroma.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow i can't explain how much this was love at first spray. Im completely in love. The longevity is outstanding but not overbearing. Another new scent for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess is the perfect summer fragrance. It’s feminine, delicate, inviting, mysterious, and memorable . I don’t typically gravitate towards vanilla, gourmand, or sweet scents. I prefer more of a floral, spicy, or fresh fragrance, but this perfume isn’t your typical cloyingly sweet, vanilla candy type of fragrance. It’s a more grown up, refined, if you will, vanilla fragrance. It has hints of vanilla in every layer, but it’s also floral, creamy, delicate and fresh. I think this perfume is perfect for day or night and while it may be a safe fragrance, it’s definitely not boring. I keep catching myself taking whiffs of my wrists all day. It’s addicting and delicious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the smell of this perfume. It smells classy if that makes sense. With lingering scents of vanilla it lasts SO LONG! It's not overbearing at all, it smells very light on me all while staying on almost all day. 10/10 I love it. And the bottle is so pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Burberry Goddess perfume smells wonderful! It has a warm and sweet with vanilla infused scent. It’s strong but not overwhelming and lasts all day. Two sprays is all you really need. I get many compliments and ask what scent am I wearing. Indeed it does smell like a goddess. Thank you Influenster for allowing me to test this Burberry Goddess perfume. If you like vanilla scent, I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this sample as an gift for influenster to give mu opinion or test and scent so good and smell like vanilla i really enjoy using this and bottle or packaging so cutw

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the initial spray of this...the warm vanilla and subtle hints of white flowers but it does tend to lose scent very quickly.  I'm curious to know if the scent works better in the winter.  Even though it doesn't last long the scent truly is heavenly and I recommend to at least try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely the very best fragrance I’ve tried in a LONG TIME! I get nothing but compliments on it every time I wear it (which is many times per week, I absolutely love it) the bottle has a nice  heft to it and feels good in your hand. It has a permanent place on my perfume tray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this scent, and I can be super picky! I think this is the perfect summer perfume, although you could wear it all year round! Has amazing lasting power as well:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful scent! My husband loves it. He said he could smell me from the other room!!! I had my doubts about the lavender in this, but it is beautiful,  I'm so happy with my purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this fragrance as a sample from influencer. I was hesitant, as I always am, about a new fragrance especially if the focus is on vanilla. I've been wearing it consistently since I received it (a little over a week ago) and I like it more and more everyday. It does have a vanilla but not a fake, sweet vanilla. If you've ever cut open a fresh vanilla bean, that is what it smells like.  It's strong but not overwhelming too. I've gotten a lot of compliments on it at work. As a side note, I work at a truck driving school so this has to compete with a lot of smells but it always comes out on top.  I would definitely recommend this scent, especially if you like to change fragrance depending on the season. This is the perfect fall/winter scent.

reviews.review_title: I received this product for free from Influenster
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest review. First, let’s start with the lovely bottle that this heavenly Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum is bottled in, nice and elegant. The delicious vanilla and sweet tones of this perfume makes it a great go getter for your summer days. The scent is long lasting and not overbearing. Burberry Goddess perfume would make a great gift to any special lady in your life. I will definitely be wearing this perfume for the rest of the year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the most BEAUTIFUL fragrance I have ever tried…. In every sense of the word. The top notes, the dry-down, the bottle, everything. The name Goddess does it no justice. It is primarily a vanilla scent at every stage. It is also the most long lasting fragrance I’ve ever tried. This stuff does not quit until it’s washed off. I have received so many compliments in the short amount of time I’ve used it. I can’t imagine ever purchasing any other fragrance besides this one from now on. It is my new signature scent. Light enough for summer and warm and spicy enough for fall and winter. I cant recommend this fragrance enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell. a true vanilla parfum but doesn't last long :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing elegant scent. I was lucky run to be asked to review this perfume. It reminds me a lot of the warm vanilla body fantasies spray from the 90s. Nice nostalgic vibes. My absolute favorite to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you love vanillas this is a must in your collection! This is by far the best most amazing perfume i have ever purchased! No floral or aquatic, all gourmand ! I can definitely get that vanilla caviar scent along with something reminiscent to vanilla bourbon which can be the vanilla cacao scent inside! Three vanillas this lasts so long on the skin one little spray lasts forever! Will keep repurchasing new signature smell! Perfect for vanilla gourmand lovers!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is soft and luxe..nice sent. My only complaint is the longevity isn’t there. I feel this fragrance is best in the fall and winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this perfume! I was lucky enough to test this product out and I am so thankful I was! I have received compliments, without even mentioning using a new perfume. It is long lasting and the notes of vanillas used there’s no words to fully describe it. I will be having to get a refill soon with how much I use it. Luckily, the inventors of this bottle made it refillable. Their team definitely knew what they were doing with the design of this bottle as well as the notes inside it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve always loved vanilla scents, and this is a wonderful option. I like that it isn’t too young of a scent, especially with the uniqueness of the warmth of vanilla and fresh floral notes, so there’s versatility. It works for both day and night. It is very smooth and powerful, without being overwhelming. It lasts for hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wearing this since I received it. I generally am a vanilla girl! I love the bottle, and it’s elegant looking. The scent is nice as well. I love the blend of vanilla’s! My only downfall for this product is the scent doesn’t last very long. I adore my commodity fragrances in expressive I can spray it and still smell it on my sweater the next day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfume to hold on for a long time. for those who love sweet smell. it was worthy for me to use them once to ask everyone: what do you smell like?  The packaging looks expensive and looks beautiful on the shelf. perfume has taken a place in my heart. i love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first the scent can be a little overpowering, but once it settles down, it leaves a very nice warm vanilla and caramel smell. Especially once the weather starts cooling down, I’ll be wearing it all the time. Overall, I found the scent to last several hours. The bottle design is subtle, which is fine, the perfume speaks for itself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product was gifted to me for an honest review this perfume is AMAZING, I have been wearing it non stop since I got it, Im pretty loyal to 2 perfumes and I havent found one to replace those two (I have worn them for years) but this burberry one can easily replace them, I love it, it has a sweet vanilla smell and I have gotten tons of compliments on it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I wear it, I feel as though I'm wrapping a warm, SWEET hug in cashmere around those around me. With notes of Vanilla, Lavender, Cacao and Caviar, this is a grown-up, sophisticated scent.  It’s a year-round scent, but I will especially wear it during the holidays. One spray goes a LONG way, so worth it.

reviews.review_title: A must have in your fragrance collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was shocked how much I loved this perfume! I’m picky when it comes to fragrance. I like have sweet smells but nothing too overpowering. This perfume is the perfect balance. It definitely gives off that “goddess” smell. The packaging & bottle is also very cute! Would recommend this fragrance! Especially if you want your boyfriend to compliment how good you smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been wearing Goddess for 2 weeks now and I’m so love with the way it smells on me. I get a lot of compliments and people always ask what I’m wearing. The downside is this does not last as long as i would like. The initial spray is so strong so I was expecting at least 6 hours but I don’t smell it anymore around hour 3. I still think if you love vanilla scents you should try this just use body butter and/ or to help the longevity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Burberry Goddess Perfume for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review.  First off, the packaging and design of this perfume bottle is beautiful! The defined square shape with the gold Burberry emblem and cap give you goddess vibes! Initially, I thought that this scent was much too sweet for my liking…I’m usually not a fan of vanilla scents.  But once I sprayed this on my skin and let it dry and combine with my natural skin oil/scent, IT WAS AMAZING!!! I have never had so many compliments! You definitely get the warm vanilla scent, but then the lavender really comes out when it dries. This will definitely be my go-to fall/winter perfume!  Also, this is the first time that I can actually say a perfume lasts ALL DAY! I will definitely be buying more when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely obsessed with this scent! I received complimentary for my honest review. All I can say is I have definitely found my new scent. It’s subtle and reminds me of the original Black Opium scent from when it was first released but a bit more subtle and femme. Or perhaps I’m telling myself that to convince me this is my new scent over YSL. I have it stopped wearing it since I received it and it actually lasts which I love and appreciate for a fragrance at this price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For reference, scents that I love are Burberry HER, Carolina Herrera Good Girl, YSL Black Opium and such... I like the sweet but sexy scents. My signature scent for a few years has been HER by Burberry. I was in Sephora the other day and saw this new one and decided to give it a try..... Loved it at first, didn't purchase... A few minutes later it smelt even better on my skin... Long story short, the way it progressively smely better the longer it was on my skin was just amazing. This smell is so so beautiful. It even beats my signature Burberry scent. This will be my go-to from now on. Not to mention the bottle is absolutely beautiful and the longevity is SO much better than HER. This lasted me around 8 hours till I noticed it wore off. LOVE LOVE LOVE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells incredible! You get the vanilla note which is lovely but also the lavender which makes it unique. It lasts around 5-7 hours on me and it fades beautifully. I’ve received so many compliments as well. I would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed this perfume, however I read another review that compared it to YSL Libre, which I agree, it’s spicy in the same way, but I also found it to be very similar to Valentino Donna. Not as much of a vanilla scent as I thought.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this perfume. This is my favorite vanilla perfume. It's light, not overpowering, it is sweet but not too much. It stays on for a long time. And most importantly it gets rid of the smokers smell. Super highly Recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unique and absolutely delicious- this scent surprised me. It's just gorgeous- and incredibly different from your average vanilla scent. I typically dislike sweet scents, but this is unlike anything I have ever owned. And it LASTS!

reviews.review_title: Must have for summer and fall!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Burberry Goddess is a real marvel! In the top note vanilla & lavender bring a soft and sensual side and light floral. Also, vanilla is not strong. It is a sweet and present fragrance that brings a summer vacation feeling even at home. I like it immediately! it smells very good all day long, it has excellent staying power. In short, I am absolutely in love with the Goddess perfume from Burberry. To offer yourself or to offer, it is really the perfume to have this summer and fall!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this perfume multiple times over the last few weeks, I would highly recommend it. The scent is warm and spicy with vanilla being the most predominant smell. As I wore this, I found I only needed one or two sprays and it lasted all day! I was really impressed by its longevity and lovely scent. The bottle is also beautiful!! I received this product for free through an incentive program in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First the bottle is gorgeous, next the scent notes are mostly vanilla and nothing else. The scent space is very limited. Only people who are close to you can smell it. It doesn't give me headaches.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this, such a soft long lasting scent vanilla scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is warm and inviting. The notes of vanilla are very warm on the skin. It’s long lasting, about 6 hours I would say before needing to re-apply. The bottle has a classic design and looks beautiful on my vanity. You could definitely layer this fragrance with another fragrance for an even longer lasting scent. I would definitely recommend this. I did receive this product free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review.

Smells so good and pretty but it doesn’t last at all which is disappointing especially for $188 dollars! Love the smell though just wished it last longer sprayed it this morning at 8am I stopped smelling it on myself by 10 am.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This warm vanilla scent is EVERYTHING! Great for Fall transitioning into Winter. I wish it lasted longer. For me it lasted about 6 hours. I just reapply it though because I truly love it so much! Makes you feel like a goddess!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After consistently wearing this scent the past few weeks I can say I’m truly in love.  It has a unique and luxurious scent, that can also be translated to everyday wear. The notes of vanilla are delectable and it has just the slightest hint of lavender.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume had me in a choke hold 😭😭😍. I was so inloveeee i knew it was the best thing to buy so im definitely going to buy the bigger bottle soon

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful fragrance, got several compliments the first time I wore out.

reviews.review_title: Must have for a special day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m in love with this perfume. It smells like fresh vanilla. It is long lasting and the bottle design is super cute and classy. Perfect for special occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
