reviews.review_text: It smells warm, sweet and not overwhelming at first. After a couple of hours the luxurious smell reminded me of Chanel Chance I used to wear when I was younger. I can still smell it after work, so it’s pretty long lasting.  The warm tone, floral and creamy smell make it a good touch for fall and winter (more chill) weather. It’s also a great fragrance to use for some formal events since it gives a elegant and welcoming feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this perfume. It smells like vanilla without being boring. I have received so many compliments since wearing this, and my husband can’t stop smelling me. Sweet vanilla sent with a a hint of spice. You cannot pick up the lavender notes, but I think that’s what elevates it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite perfume and fav perfume by Burberry thus far. This is the perfect musky vanilla that is mature without being sickly sweet or too masculine. If you like YSL libre intense you need this in your collection.

reviews.review_title: A more wearable, more vanilla By The Fireplace
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Reminds me of a more wearable, less smoky By The Fireplace by Maison Margiela. I didn’t get the vanilla right away, but over time it developed into a really nice, sophisticated vanilla - not like that buttery frosting smell. This would make a pretty safe gift, I can’t see the smell offending anyone. That said, it also doesn’t blow my mind. But definitely a really lovely scent that I’m going to wear for the rest of summer!

reviews.review_title: Nice but not a go to for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like it but it's a little too heavy on the vanilla notes for my personal preference. I usually lean more towards floral scents. It would be a nice gift, it is a sweet and mature smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not typically a vanilla scent kind of girl but this is soft and beautiful with a hint of lavender. I absolutely love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a good vanilla scent, but I usually associate them with cooler months. This vanilla perfume is a fresher vanilla, likely due to the lavender in it.  I didn’t really smell lavender, just a freshness to the vanilla when you spray it on that dries down to a warmer vanilla. Vanilla scents can sometimes be too sweet and gourmand, but this perfume gets it right. I’m enjoying wearing it in the summer as it is a vanilla scent for all seasons. The bottle is very luxe looking as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am floored at the price of this, considering it smells like a cheap, fake vanilla. I got this for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest opinion and review. This scent is awful. You could buy the same thing at Kmart for $10. Very very cheap fake vanilla scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this perfume. It is a beautiful vanilla scent with a hint of lavender. At first glance, it seems like a cool weather scent, but it’s light enough to wear year round. I know I will reach for it often!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Burberry in exchange of my honest review. Burberry Goddess smells divine with a lasting power of 5 hours. I can smell the vanilla throughout the life of the fragrance. The lavender notes adds a calming effect which balances the sweetness. This is a perfect transitional fall fragrance due to the warmth it radiates, it gives you a feeling of coziness. The refillable bottle is luxurious with gold hardware and apple pink hue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is perfect and long lasting all day without being overwhelming. It has a sweet vanilla scent as the first note you smell then the light undertones of the lavender peek through. I apply a small spray on my wrist and dab my neck lightly. I love that the bottle is glass and also refillable, making it more convenient when I start running low. It has quickly became my new favorite scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a perfect summer transitioning into fall scent. The main scent is vanilla but it’s not overpowering. It blends so nice with a hint of lavender. It’s long lasting which is great. The bottle is beautiful. I will definitely be continuing to use this into fall. Also perfect for work since it’s not an overpowering scent. It’s sweet and fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: a very airy light vanilla. I definitely get a juicy couture vibe from it. Would be a great signature scent, inoffensive and not super sweet. I don't get a straight lavender note but a beautiful light blended floral with the ginger and cocao notes. It's nothing really groundbreaking or inspired but it's a nice fragrance, not the vanilla bomb i thought it'd be but I can see it being a crowd pleaser overall

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume from Influencer, for free, in exchange for my unbiased opinion. I’ve been using Burberry Goddess for a little over a week everyday and I really love it. I’ve never been a huge vanilla fan but this has such a nice scent. It smells very feminine with deep but soft vanilla notes and slightly sweet . The scent on me lasts about 4 hours which is why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5. I’ve received a few compliments from strangers since I’ve been wearing it and my husband says it’s his favorite new scent on me ( and I have a lot of fragrances.). The bottle is also really pretty

reviews.review_title: Will continue to be my go too.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: YOU GUYS!! This one is it guys!!! I’ve tried every fragrance know to man. I’m a bit of a snob when it comes to fragrances. I absolutely loathe lavender like won’t even try something that has lavender in it. I would not have bought this myself, but I got it to sample from Influenster and I’m so glad I did. It pulled me straight out of my comfort zone. It blends so well with all the other vanillas that you don’t even notice the lavender. It’s there but it’s blended perfectly 10/10 for me and that’s saying a lot. It lasts all day too, and that’s something that’s hard to find now days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I ever used a vanilla, lavender and ginger scent and I was impressed. The scent is so warm, light and still in my body after long day. I’ve never a fan of ginger before but the mixing is so good that I cannot stop using it in daily!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Blueberry Goddess is such a warm and inviting scent, I absolutely adore it. I love gourmand scents and this one did not disappoint. It's heavy on the vanilla but in a sophisticated way. It's not cloyingly sweet, which is great for more mature women. I love how it mellows into the skin, leaving such a light warm musk. It does not wear strongly or overpowering, as some scents can give me migraines. However, this one might need to be reapplied for it to last the entire day. The bottle design is so pretty and I love the fact that it's refillable. Overall, a gorgeous product. ** I received a complimentary sample from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for an honest review.**

This is the first Burberry perfume I’ve ever tried and I absolutely love it. I’ve been a fan of vanilla notes all my life and this one is beautiful, complex, and long lasting. It’s mature without being overly mature and perfect to wear everyday or paired with something a bit muskier for a night out scent. The wearability of the perfume is around 5 hours without touch up and after a second spritz it lasted me the rest of the night after work.   Highly suggest if you’re a fan of gourmand fragrances!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s good. Super light vanilla. It just doesn’t last more than 10 minutes. It smells really good layered with sol de janeiro 62.

reviews.review_title: Mini bottle logo is a sticker…Sephora got me again
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like whatever that vanilla perfume was from Kayali, I also hated that one. This one is maybe a little bit less obnoxious. I got excited to get the mini bottle w the travel size, sold out real quick. Thought the Burberry goddess logo would be metal…and it’s a Frickin sticker…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent reminds me of Tom Ford Lost Cherry but a lighter summer version! I’m liking it so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells good but if you have YSL Libre it’s the same thing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is amazing! It’s in the same family as Flowerbomb which was a previous favorite of mine. It’s sweet/floral/feminine and my husband couldn’t stop commenting on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I super picky about fragrance. This is it though. Such a unique and beautiful smell I started out with a .33 and returned the next day for a full size that’s how much luved it<3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this new scent. It's versatile enough to wear from day to night and even work to date Night. Love the subtle notes of vanilla and lavender. Long lasting fragrance that will stay with you all day. *incentavised post.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can not get enough of this scent. The only thing I can compare it to would be to think of Dolce and Gabanna light blue only it has warmer and spicier undertones. This is hands down my new favourite scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using my Burberry Goddess perfume for a few weeks now and the complements are still coming in. It never fails people are always asking me what perfume I’m wearing. The scent is has a warm inviting vibe to it with a twist of spice that makes it feel more interesting. It’s the perfect balance. A great transitional scent Can wear during the day but also interesting enough to wear in the evening on a date night. You also don’t need much as it will last throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is delightful a sweet vanilla warm & spicy scent I can put it on in the morning and can still smell it 8 hours later it’s perfect for any occasion. My new favorite perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this new launch from Influenster and Burberry for my honest review. Upon opening the package, the bottle looked regal with a golden cap and name plate. The size of the bottle is comfortable to hold and the sprayer works smoothly. The scent is very lovely. It’s something between a deja vu and a new scent. The scent lasted a long time. It’s very sweet at first. I can smell strong vanilla right away, but then a new scent appears, more gentle. Towards the end I can definitely feel the lavender linger. It’s very calming. The parfum didn’t give me a headache . I wouldn’t wear it on a hot summer day. I would say it’s more for the cooler days and nights. It will be amazing in the colder months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells sooooo good.  The lavender and ginger gives this vanilla fragrance a bright note but the vanilla really pulls through after an hour of wear and is delicious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The box is pretty, the perfume bottle is beautiful. I like the shape, the warm color, and the weight of the bottle. Looks very luxurious. At first spray the scent smells lighter, but it settles and gets quite strong and musky. I like the scent as it is a bold, sexy scent, but it is a little too strong overall. The Vanilla notes are very heavy. I like that this is a vegan formula and this bottle is refillable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: About me: not a Burberry perfume user, fan of rose damask and deep scents with floral notes   Pros: this was my first experience with a scent from this brand. I like the packaging and the spray is a fine mist with a lot of product. The wear is very long for this scent - smelled it most of the day.   Cons: it was a bit strong for me, a bit heady. Possibly caused by spraying twice and the spray being heavier than I’m used to. I found the scent quite sweet, cotton candy notes. Reminded me of a Britney Spears perfume everyone had in the 90s. Not a bad scent, but quite strong and not to my taste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg all I can say I seen this on social media and had to order it within 3 min !!! This by far is the best sexy smell !!!!

reviews.review_title: A must have in your collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all wow. I barely got this about a week ago and I’m so glad. It smells amazing. This might be my favorite perfume. Theres a sweet smell to it. Packaging is cute and the bottle is perfect. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this perfume. This by far is my favorite vanilla perfume. It is light, not too overpowering, it is sweet but not too much. It stays on for a long time. And most importantly it does not give me headaches. Recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I live this perfume! I feel so elegant eating it. The vanilla scent really stands out and you can tell it’s a high quality vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a cozy vanilla that has a present but not overwhelming floral note this is for you. It is a powerhouse so one spray is all you need. It’s unique and a nice mature take on vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: smells good, vanilla but also sexy and warm. but the smell does go away quickly it doesn't last

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and when i smelled it... i was sooooo sooo happy because its smells too good! It's nice mild, subtle, sweet, florally scent, didn't make my head hurt or made me dizzy. I looooved it as soon as I smelled it. It's long lasting too and that's important. I'm wearing as my to go perfume. I spray all over, my body hair, clothes, can't get enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love gourmand scents and any scents with vanilla and this perfume is so good! It’s not an overly sweet or artificial vanilla scent at all, it’s a sophisticated and sexy vanilla scent. It’s a long lasting scent and I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_title: Very Unique Addition to my Collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I know that the triple vanilla can seem a little scary, but it actually isn’t a sickly sweet gourmand like you might think. It IS sweet… but in an expensive way. The floral notes make it elegant. Like a goddess (lol).  I’m normally a skin scent girly so I didn’t like this at first, because it DOES have good projection. But now I really appreciate it. On a night out, I want to turn heads of people who pass by. This is the scent to do that. Longevity is decent. I’d say this is more of a autumn/winter scent, but I’ve been wearing it this summer regardless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely, sweet, very long lasting perfume with wonderful notes of vanilla. Before I first sprayed it, I actually thought I would not enjoy it, as the scent coming from the bottle was unusual. But once I tried it in various ways and times, I loved it from the first spray. It smells lovely on, and lasts all day. If anything it’s almost too strong! One spray goes a long way. I also tried it on paper, as your own personal skin chemistry can change the way perfumes smell, and it smelled great on the paper as well, and literally lasted so strong for days. My mom even sprayed it in her laundry room and it smelled so good for days! I’ve had other nice perfumes in the past, and this definitely compares in both scent and longevity.

reviews.review_title: If you love vanilla scents, this one is for you!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you love vanilla scents, this one is for you! The fragrance itself is warm and delicious. The vanilla is the main smell, but it's not overpowering and the lavender is very subtle.  It lasts for 6+ hours on skin and 12+ hours when sprayed directly on clothes.   The bottle is simple, but luxurious and the gold touches look great on a vanity.  As a vanilla fragrance lover, this is my new signature scent. Love love love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess is a timeless and classic fragrance, that captures the essence of sophistication and elegance. Opening with a blend of fresh and fruity notes, it immediately intrigues the senses. The heart reveals a well-balanced combination of floral and woody accords, creating a sense of depth and complexity. As the scent settles, a warm and comforting base of musk and vanilla emerges, leaving a lingering trail of refinement. Burberry is a versatile fragrance suitable for both daytime and evening wear, making it a staple in any perfume collection. Its longevity and sillage ensure that you'll be enveloped in its captivating aura throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the smell as it sprays but it quickly dissipates on my skin. No matter how many times I spray I can hardly smell it.

I got this perfume a few weeks ago and I really love it! I usually don’t wear perfume super often because a lot of perfume has too strong of a scent that it overpowers my nose, but this perfume doesn’t do that. It is a sweet, vanilla-y scent that is subtle, yes amazing enough to use as an everyday perfume! It stays on for a long time and absolutely makes me feel like a goddess😍

reviews.review_title: Heavenly Ginger Vanilla- Lasts All Day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gingery soft vanilla. Heavenly. Extremely long lasting. I almost want to gate keep it. Feels familiar but new. A confidence builder. Very versatile. A new signature scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Similar to YSL Black Opium but better. Seems to last much longer. Nice packaging. Recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like a GROWN WOMAN-bougie version of Burberry Her. It’s Burberry Her upgraded! I love it, it smells sweet, but like an expensive sweet!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first smell this is GORGEOUS! It smells like luxurious vanilla with a spicier twist. It’s got good lasting power on the body — but the long lasting scent is a little weird. By the end of the day it smells almost…. Bready??

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume. On me it smells like juicy couture gold but a little more vanilla and grown up. I’m in love because I do love juicy couture gold. I feel it projects a little more than gold as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest review.                                              I am loving the wonderful vanilla scent of Burberry Goddess Eau De Parfum. It smells great without being too sweet or overpowering. I put some on in the morning and the scent lingers all day. The bottle is aesthetically pleasing and looks nice sitting on my vanity. I love that this bottle is refillable, so there’s less waste. I will definitely be buying a refill when this bottle is empty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you love vanilla, you’re gonna love this!! This is what I describe as a fresh vanilla scent. It smells, sweet like vanilla but the floral lavender mixes in and stays with you the entire day. Lovely for all seasons!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample from Influencer. This scent is nice, like a warm vanilla sugar. Lasts awhile. Not my favorite perfume, but not bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like a GROWN WOMAN-bougie version of Burberry Her. It’s Burberry Her upgraded! I love it, it smells sweet, but like an expensive sweet!

reviews.review_text: I love this perfume. On me it smells like juicy couture gold but a little more vanilla and grown up. I’m in love because I do love juicy couture gold. I feel it projects a little more than gold as well.

reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest review. reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample from Influencer. This scent is nice, like a warm vanilla sugar. Lasts awhile. Not my favorite perfume, but not bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely an everyday fragrance! Initially, it comes off as a sun-kissed vanilla. But as the scent dries down, the lavender and vanilla caviar notes pop out, making the fragrance sexy! I’ve been wearing this to work daily & it's a compliment-getter for sure! But there's something about the notes that truly remind me of dinner by the beach on vacation as it settles. The longevity is about 5-6 hours. I am impressed & can’t wait to pair it with perfume oils!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's feminine fresh and sweet smell. It last long and you don't have to reapply. After it settle in my skin the smell is lovely, I get a lot of compliment when I'm wearing it every time.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my collection!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume Burberry Goddess offers a warm and comforting scent with sweet undertones. It's versatile and can be worn daily or for special occasions. Overall, if you enjoy the soothing aroma of vanilla, this perfume could be a delightful addition to your collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is absolutely beautiful, the smell is very rich and last for a long time. It has a slightly sweet floral smell without being overpowering, it became my favorite
I loved it! It smells very grown and delectable. The scent lasts hours and stays just as potent. I would buy it and the packaging is very cute as wel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very comforting scent. Warm and cozy and the smell lasts for several hours, I have received multiple compliments.

reviews.review_title: sweet things for you...I love it..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry is a famous and successful brand of high-end fashion, founded in 1856 in England. Besides the gorgeous outfits, Burberry women's perfume also stormed the review forums.  So far, Burberry women's perfume has many different product lines. So choosing for myself a suitable scent is very difficult. And now by accident I was given a perfume bottle from this brand that was just launched in early August 2023, with a very luxurious name. Burberry Goddess ... not only the name but the design is also really eye-catching. Square perfume bottle. With transparent glass design to reveal the juice. The juice is light yellow in color. The lid and the sticker are all gilded to create a luxurious feeling, symbolizing the noble sophistication, honoring the woman with the name of the goddess... A really great gift for boyfriends, husband gift to his wife or girlfriend....The next thing when I lightly spray the perfume on my hands I feel a warm and sweet aroma combined with the freshness and purity of vanilla and lavender. fragrance, creating a gentle and refreshing melody from the first moment.. The scent lasts a very long time, can keep from 8 hours to 12 hours after I sprayed it on my hands, after 4 times of hand washing it still remains. the scent is faint...I really appreciate this new product...Once it's over, I will consider buying it again and will be a gift that you and I can buy for your loved ones on Christmas. next...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells amazing on.  It has a complex vanilla scent that is not overwhelmingly sweet.  It has some floral and woody notes but the heart of this scent is really vanilla.  The scent lingers softly on my skin for a long time.  It is a great scent for work or even casual date nights.  The bottle's design is so classic and elegant.  It looks great on top of my dresser.  This scent is one of my new favorites!

reviews.review_title: Add this to your perfume collection!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume scent is amazing!! It reminds me of Dolce & Gabbana The One, but with floral added to it almost like Coco Channel Mademoiselle. It’s the perfect everyday wear perfume & I will 100% be purchasing this perfume in the future.

reviews.review_title: Can't put my finger on it....
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like something, and you probably already have it, too.  As soon as I put this on, I immediately thought it smelled like a cologne or a perfume that I already have.  I'm thinking it's YSL black opium, but I did a side-by-side and the YSL is better.  I did receive the full size in the #voxbox courtesy of @influenster, but I'm definitely not going to keep it.  I'm so glad that I did receive this in an incentivized campaign because the scent profile would have intrigued me, but no.  I'll keep buying YSL.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not being a fan of Burberry Her I was very hesitant and skeptical about this perfume. But this is actually a beautiful scent. Nothing like Burberry Her. At first spray, it's a little sharp and not quite to my liking. But after two to four hours it warms up to my skin and smells lovely, and I love that it lasts until the next morning. Sometimes even after my shower.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample from Influencer.  This fragrance is wow. It is sweet, floral and woody at the same time. When you just spray it feels a bit heavy, but you need to give some time the scent to calm and open up. Then it becomes such a feminine, beautiful scent. Very long lasting. I would advice to start with very small portions if you prefer fresh scents. There is freshness in this scent, but it requires time to get to that layer. Perfect for autumn and winter. When you wear this perfume you really feel likie Goddess as the name says.   The bottle is a piece of art. So elegant, and laconic in style of Burberry. As a gift it would be just perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum is a captivating fragrance that exudes the essence of self-discovery and empowerment. The new campaign, featuring Emma Mackey and a pride of lionesses, beautifully captures the fragrance's theme of confidence, strength, and kindness.  The use of a vegan formula in this gourmand fragrance sets Burberry Goddess apart, showcasing the brand's commitment to both quality and ethical considerations. The trio of vanillas at the heart of this fragrance creates a harmonious symphony of scents, starting with a woody-toned vanilla infusion at the top, followed by the rich sweetness of vanilla caviar at its heart, and finally, the luminous lavender-enriched vanilla absolute at its base.  Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum is a testament to the art of perfumery, skillfully blending different elements to create a truly unique olfactory experience. Its alluring aroma evokes a sense of elegance and sophistication, making it a perfect choice for any occasion. For those seeking a fragrance that not only captivates the senses but also represents a journey of self-discovery, Burberry Goddess is an excellent choice that will undoubtedly leave a lasting impression.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess is pure elegance. This perfume is the perfect choice to wear to a wedding, gala, or a formal night out. Quiet confidence is a personality trait that the notes of vanilla and lavender bring to mind. The scent is long lasting and brings warm memories of peaceful Christmas nights and preparing for winter weddings.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely an amazing gourmand scent. Lasted hours on my skin, and wears to a soft vanilla scent- on clothing though it stayed all day and kept the original fresh, full scent the whole day. Impressed by its staying power and more impressed by the crispness and complexity of the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging for this fragrance is beautiful and substantial. The scent itself is really refreshing. Very floral with undertones of vanilla. I've worn this in high heat and it has lasted all day even with my sweat.

I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review.  This is a gorgeous warm vanilla fragrance that I feel suits all seasons. It's not overly sweet or dense but it's substantial. I get vanilla with a sprinkling of cocoa, lavender and ginger. It smells gourmand with a light airiness to it that makes it easy to wear.   A couple of sprays gave me solid longevity and a nice scent bubble. Such an easy to wear, pleasant fragrance. It is familiar and comfortable but still feels luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this perfume. I was so excited to get it from Influenster to try out! It smells absolutely magical and has a hint of seduction as well. It radiates sexiness and makes me feel like a million bucks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My first impression is wow, I’ve been wearing this daily. The freshness of the vanilla and lavender is amazing. I did 2 sprays and it lasted my full 8 hour work day. The esthetic of the bottle is beautiful and it is currently on display in my room!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this gourmand vanilla scent. Typically sweeter scents don’t last very long on me but this one did. The scent profile is not extremely complex so I prefer this for daytime and summer use. Perfect for hot summer days with a cute sundress!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s too strong for me for every day but it’s good for winter time when the musk notes are not to noticeable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t usually like perfume with a scent of vanilla but this perfume just has enough of it that makes me enjoy it on my body. A hint of lavender makes it very more ambery. It smells casual, not luxury as how it is names. It's strong at first but AMAZING when it's dried down. It lasts about 5-6 hours on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a perfume people will stop you to ask you about when you walk by! It’s sweet, it’s feminine and it doesn’t have that intense lingering scent that I’ve seen with Burberry in the past. I love layering it but I’ll even wear it solo and let it shine 🫶

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Reviewing after receiving free product from Influenster.  As a lover of vanilla I love this perfume! Strong Vanilla scent without being heavy. I don’t pick up on the lavender very much. It can cause a headache if you wear too much.  If you love vanilla that isn’t heavy this is your girl!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster.  Usually I don’t gravitate towards vanilla scented perfumes but this perfume is truly lovely and not an overpowering scent. This can transition from day to night very easily and I received many compliments on the scent. The bottle also is very beautiful and looks great sitting on the counter. I would definitely try this perfume if you are looking for one to add to your collection. Don’t let the vanilla scent scare you away as you will be pleasantly surprised!

reviews.review_title: Must buy perfume; changed my life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is EVERYTHINGGGG!! It smells so amazing, it is my absolute dream scent. The bottle is cute and I enjoy having it on my vanity. I usually use Alien by Mugler, but this perfume has been my every day wear since I got it. You won’t be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells like Dubai summers! The vanilla scent is strong but sweet. Definitely a summer/spring staple to add to your collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first the sent is really strong and smells like a fragrance aisle at a department store. However, as the sent wears off throughout the day, it is a very lovely smell. It has a nice vanilla sent that seems very warm. Lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is absolutely beautiful. It’s a great transitional scent that can carry you from summer to fall. It is warm, and reminds me of a more sophisticated Burberry Brit. The scent was long lasting and carried me from work to dinner out after. Lovely parfum!
I am not a fan of vanilla scents but I love this one! It is not overwhelming. The scent lasted really long and I got compliments. This will definitely be a staple for the fall season!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent. It isn’t too musky, but definitely a nicer evening, expensive type smell. I find the smell fades while I wear it, but then can still smell it on my clothes days later.

reviews.review_title: Good for the crisp cold months
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good scent and perfect for fall fragrance. Long lasting warmth smell with a vanilla / lavender combination.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great and is my new daily perfume! I wish the smell lasted longer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Before using the product, I didn’t think I was going to like this perfume. After spraying it, I did in fact like the scent! It’s long lasting and a little bit goes a long way. One or two sprays will last you all day long

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free through Influenster.  This is a very vanilla-forward scent. I do not find it very complex as I really only smell vanilla. I typically prefer floral scents, so this is not a perfume I would typically reach for. However, I do think it will be a good winter perfume. The packaging is very classy and the scent lasted a long time on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this and have added it to my few daily perfumes. I find that the lavender notes wear off quickly and I am left with a wonderful vanilla. This doesn't have the candy sweet vanilla but a deeper more developed tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this fragrance. I love that it is not overly floral and that the vanilla really comes through. It smells so good that I went out and found the matching body lotion. I got the lotion in hopes that it will project a little more. Also, the price is a little steep but I would purchase again because it smells that good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is so beautiful. I love the the clean light powder smell with a lingering smell of nag champa. This perfume smells like a very luxurious hippy lol. The bottle is beautiful and would look good on anyone's vanity. I would repurchase and recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Finally a Sophisticated vanilla forward fragrance! Hints of lavender and vanilla leave you smelling so delicious for hours! Very nice and can be worn daily! In my opinion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the fall release we needed from Burberry. A vanilla that isn’t overly sweet & foodie. I’m a fan of YSL Libre and all of the flankers, so I was excited for a different take on lavender/vanilla. Thankfully, this one is very feminine and less masculine than Libre. The ginger is a nice addition, you can definitely reach for this all year. Fresh for warm weather, sweet enough for cold weather. I’m excited to try this one again after it’s macerated for a month or two and it’s 60 degrees outside. On the other hand, the pricing is a little steep. $100 for a 30ml is a little ridiculous, especially for a regular edp with iffy longevity. Designers shouldn’t be asking for more than $89 for a 1 oz, especially when strong fragrances with amazing performance like Good Girl and La Belle are at $73. Will I still purchase it? Yes, because I'm a collector and it’s a beautiful scent.

reviews.review_title: If you love vanilla scent, this is for you
reviews.review_text: Elegant vanilla scent not too sweet. Suitable for everyday use, not over powering. It last for a little over 5 hours which is very good for me. The bottle is so beautiful and luxury, perfect to be a gift for your loved one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't write many reviews but this perfume deserves one! This is absolutely gorgeous! A sweet, cool vanilla, with pretty good longevity. It's perfect for every season! It's not a spicy warm vanilla like Eilish at all IMO. It has a light lavender and I normally dislike lavender but in this it's beautiful. Very well blended with the strong vanilla. I don't see a comparison to Libre at all because I don't like that scent. This will definitely be my new signature scent for fall!! I'll definitely be picking up the refill bottle when my 3.4oz runs out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a sweet, feminine scent! I love the elegant look of the bottle as well. It’s beautiful for summer—it is a long-lasting floral scent with strong notes of vanilla. Highly recommend to anyone who doesn’t shy away from sweet fragrances!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the bottle it gives off an expensive and bougie vibe. The whole presentation is a vibe. The scent is absolutely amazing and has blown me away.  Most high end fragrances smell similar to me but this one is quite different. Goddess is the perfect name for this fragrance.  This is what you would imagine a true goddess to smell like, beautiful and sexy.  This is not a basic perfume at all.  It has three different variations of vanilla that are unique.  It also has musk, ginger and lavender that gives off a very sexy scent. The lavender is not overpowering it’s very light. It smell is very luxurious.  I absolutely adore this fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Influenster sent this to me to try. Burberry Goddess came in a pink box with Burberry and all written details in gold. All I could see when I took out the bottle was gold - smooth clear bottle with a gold cap containing liquid gold. Packaging alone made me think that this perfume was going to be feminine, elegant and powerful. As someone who personally loves vanilla scents, one spray on my wrist was all it took for me to fall in love with this gourmand fragrance! I sprayed it on both wrists and behind the ears, wore it to work the whole day and got compliments. I definitely felt beautiful and confident wearing this scent. It can come off strong though to someone with a sensitive nose. A little goes a long way with this scent. The bottle was designed to be refillable, which I think is really conscientious. I'm really glad I got this to try for free.

Upon opening the box I was captured by the bottle. It’s simple yet pleasing to the eye. I love the gold.  I sprayed it and my first thought was this is going to be my new favorite. I wore it and after a few hours I could no longer smell it on my wrist or anywhere. It smells amazing but is light and doesn’t last as long as I would like. This still just might be one of my new favorites even though the scent doesn’t last as long as I would like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A very soft vanilla scent , giving it 3 stars because the longevity is poor but it's definitely close to the skin.  Not a bad fragrance, very simple vanilla with a touch of floral spice.  It's like if Billie eilish edp mixed with Bath and body warm vanilla sugar 's drydown.  It's nice but nothing I will rush to get.  I definitely was perplexed on the price for this.  If your looking for something ground breaking, this is not that.  It's just ok.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful perfume with strong, sweet scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells delicious! I personally love perfumes that are sweet and strong and this perfume checks both boxes. It has strong vanilla scent notes and it’s long lasting (longetivity is a must for me). As for the design of the bottle, it is a beautiful design that looks great on display. It’s also a heavy bottle so it feels luxurious. I definitely feel like this perfume will be a favorite of mine for years to come.   Disclaimer: This review is incentivized as I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry goddess edp is a long lasting sweet and woodsy fragrance. I like how it smells, it reminds me of juicy couture viva la juicy but with more woodsy notes. I find the bottle a little bit too plain with the design of an empty golden circle in the middle, the cap also could have been better with a heavier magnetic cap. I appreciate that the fragrance is vegan but I wish it were cruelty-free as well.  [incentivized]

reviews.review_title: Hints of Vanilla Fill the Senses
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I first tried the product on my skin, I didn’t know what to think. After I tried it a few more times I really liked it. I’m not usually a fan of anything straight vanilla and only vanilla. But this blend that Burberry came out with is stellar with a combination of Vanilla, Lavender, Cacao and Ginger. There is also a main note of Vanilla Caviar with a base of Vanilla Absolute.   I have worn this fragrance for work, casual outings, and date nights.  I love it. I recommend giving it a try yourself.

reviews.review_title: Deep sugary smell - definitely worth a try
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This post is incentivized, I received the product for free in exchange for my review.   So let me start by saying wow- this is nothing like the other Burberry (Her) perfume. It’s really surprising because the scent initially gives citrusy and floral notes, but quickly develops into a deep vanilla/dark sugar scent. I think I like it, and the hubs definitely does - he’s usually super sensitive to smells but told me to keep wearing this. Overall, 4 stars because I loved the initial scent, but after that fades the scent is nice but a bit strong. 4/5

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a vanilla lover and this fragrance did not disappoint! This is a vanilla dominant fragrance for sure, and the low notes of lavender gives a nice, aromatic freshness to the blend!  It smells divine without being overpowering; I truly feel like I exude feminine energy when I wear this! The scent is classy, yet sultry making it versatile for date night or everyday wear. The bottle is simple, yet very elegant and I love that it is refillable and also a vegan formula. Projection and longevity is very good, I could still smell it on me at the end of an 8 hour work day. This is quickly becoming my new favorite fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE Burberry perfumes!! Another great one after Body by Burberry. It’s really long lasting and the combination of vanilla and lavender is simply exquisite!! This is a must-have and is great for dinner and dates!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was worried that I was going to end up smelling like an old fuddy duddy. That floral, heavy, back of the throat kicker. I was absolutely pleasantly surprised when I took a wiff of this perfume. First note of vanilla, a sporty vanilla. Very warm and lingers like a hug, all day. Two spritz on my wrists have me all set for about 5 hours. I can not get enough of this scent and love MYSELF for stepping out of my comfort zone!  This is a sophisticated, active scent that ANYONE can confidently wear! Thank you Burberry!

reviews.review_title: Amazing vanilla scent for everyday use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After the first spray, I was in love with this vanilla scent right away. The smell is amazing and lasts all day long. I felt the warmness and softness that the scent brings. Definitely, its a great choice for the cold seasons. It was super comforting and relaxing. The bottle looks gorgeous, giving a high-end feeling. What captured my attention was designed for refilling. To me, I think this perfume can be use for any occasions. Im already addicted to it, so I dont care about the price, Im gonna wear it everyday

I love this perfume! The base is strongly vanilla with top notes of lavender. It has a dark and mysterious vibe to me that is beautiful. It’s professional enough to wear to work, but sexy enough for a night out. I think it would be a perfect fall scent, but I won’t hesitate to wear it during any season. My only critique is that I wish it lasted longer and had a bit more sillage, but I will strongly consider repurchasing when this bottle runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: gifted from influenster ,  I absolutely love this perfume so much  I smell more of the lavender then I do the vanilla & it's pretty too & the bottle is gorgeous to keep on display

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So after my first whiff, i was like WOW....Such a bold, warm vanilla scent. Smells like a sweet dessert on my skin. I feel like it stood out more on the warmer days vs the cooler evenings. However, the scent doesnt last long and begins to fade within the first 4 hours, give or take. The bottle is beautiful, definitely golden goddess. It's a great gift for a vanilla lover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent reminds me of YSL’s Libre but heavier on the vanilla. I love how warm it is. Makes me feel almost edible when I wear it.  I received this product for free to review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume from influenster in exchange for an honest opinion. I absolutely love the product and it smells so amazing. I get so much compliments from my family, friends, coworkers and colleagues. At first I thought it might be my usual type of the perfume but now I absolutely love it and looking forward to buying more in the future. The scent is so heavenly, warming and long lasting than the ones I usually use! This perfume is my NEW FAVORITE ONE!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this scent! It lasts all day and it’s warm notes of vanilla are super subtle and smell incredible! I received this perfume in exchange for my honest review on influencester!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: well well well y'all!!!!! This my new favorite for my Burberry collection!!!! It has very bold classic scent together with vanilla which altogether creating very unique Burberry scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first sprayed this I did not initially love it. It felt too strong for my liking. After the dry down it proved to be a mature, sexy, vanilla scent. First day wearing it I got several compliments at work. It feels like more of a nighttime scent but I wanted to see how long it would last and it lasted all day for me! If you like vanilla notes I recommend! The bottle is also elegant and beautiful and will look great on your scent display! Added plus for this being a vegan formula also!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I opened the packaging and noticed the bottle gives off a classic vibe which I like. When I pulled off the cap for the bottle, it was very easy. My first impression of the scent was pleasant. The perfume has three layers of vanilla with a slight hint of lavender. I enjoy the smell of vanilla, it smelled warm. I would say the scent lasts about 5-6 hours, and longer if sprayed onto clothing. This scent is great for layering with other scents if you want to add vanilla or warmth. Definitely great for both winter and summer evenings. I think this would be a lovely gift for anyone who enjoys a vanilla scented perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this fragrance from influencer. I personally love this fragrance as a layering piece. It’s great to add to any fragrance that needs warmth. Because the vanilla is an absolute it doesn’t smell cheap at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is just beautiful. I love the vanilla trio and the lavender is well blended and not overwhelming. I can also faintly pick up on the ginger which just adds a little brightness. This is an easy reach for me and lasted me an entire workday. Bonus is that the bottle is gorgeous and refillable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in love with this new fragrance.   it smells so good and yummy

reviews.review_title: Burberry you’ve done it again with this gem!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After receiving this fragrance in the mail I could not be more pleased with this beauty! I love the elegant packaging down to the design of the bottle. I wore this to work and gotten so many compliments from my coworkers and patients. It’s a warm and spicy scent. I would personally recommend for dinner night with your husband/boyfriend. He’s gonna want to eat you right on up haha! Must try 10/10 product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an elegant scent. I’m not typically a vanilla scent girl but it is the perfect balance of vanilla and florals. Great for daywear or a scent for work because it’s subtle and not overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful fragrance. When I sprayed it on my skin, I smelled a sweet vanilla scent, not overwhelmingly sweet but just right. When I sprayed it on clothing I definitely noticed more of the lavender note, but it was not an overpowering lavender as I could still smell the vanilla. Somehow a perfect balance! I was super impressed with the lasting power of this fragrance, as most fragrances do not lost on me. This fragrance lasted on both my skin and my clothing through a whole day! I feel like this is going to be my go to summer and fall fragrance, as it made me feel warm but still had the sweet notes that I like. The bottle design is also classy , it reminds me of a vintage perfume bottle. I think this would be a great gift, as the scent works for any age group and gives off beautiful notes with amazing lasting power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is so comforting and relaxing, it's like a cozy hug. The three types of vanilla infused with lavender makes this a perfect scent for the upcoming fall weather. This is a floral vanilla scent and it's not overwhelming it's very simple. If you like sweet simple scents this perfume is for you. I adore it and the wear is great too but it's not going to stay on your clothes for days if that's what you're looking for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. The bottle is beautiful and it smells amazing.I usually don't buy pricey perfume but this is honestly worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells amazing. It has warm vanilla notes with some floral. It wears really well. I have received several compliments while wearing this perfume. It is a must have if you are a vanilla fan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was lucky enough to get this perfume for free in my voxbox for my honest review and i am so great full! This scent smells amazing! I don’t normally wear a fragrance with a vanilla smell but this one smells amazing! it lasts all day -land i get countless compliments everywhere i go!! i will define be buying this small again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Goddess! What a perfect word to describe how this perfume makes you feel! From the moment you receive the beautiful box, open it and find the gorgeous bottle with the giant golden medallion, to the very first spritz, you instantly transform into a goddess. The bottle is amazing! It looks so beautiful sitting out and I love the fact that it is refillable so it’s not wasteful! The scent is divine! There hasn’t been a day since I’ve worn it that I’ve passed by someone that they haven’t stopped me and complimented how I smell and asked me what I’m wearing and where to find it. The layers of vanilla are amazing! If you are a vanilla lover, this is definitely for you! The way the different notes hit, yet they are all vanilla, is so intriguing and intricate. I’ve never smelled anything like it and cannot get enough of it! I even spritz a little in my hair. Normally I am very sensitive to scents and get headaches from strong perfumes. This is not one of those. It has lasting power without being overwhelming. If you are on the fence, I would say get it. If you are considering this as a gift, I would say get it. You cannot go wrong. This is a scent anyone will love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a love for me! I very much smell the lavender in the opening of this fragrance. I'm usually not too much of a fan of lavender. However, this is a very sweet, almost candied lavender. This, along with the vanilla pairs, is so well together because it is so well blended and smooth. There's nothing sharp about it. It definitely develops much sweeter and heavier on the vanilla over the course of the wear. The lavender subsides a bit into a subtle sweet spice. This fragrance lasted about 6 hours on me and projected well. I kept getting beautiful whiffs of an almost syrupy, apple pie, sweet vanilla in the air. This would be absolutely beautiful in the fall and winter or during the rain. The bottle is beautiful and heavy glass.  Im so excited to have this in my collection and will repurchase it! I received a sample for my honest feedback.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is unique and made me remember special moments of my life. The vanilla scent, together with some sweetness makes it perfect for a fancy event. I applied during the morning and I could still sense it at night. The box is simple yet elegant, and the bottle is perfect for people with a refined taste. That would be a perfect present for anyone that loves attractive scents and exquisite packaging.

reviews.review_title: Burberry Goddess has become my daily routine :-))
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest review.    First, the  Packaging: the bottle is in gold tone, which give me a classy yet luxurious feeling. It is also designed to be refilled. Although I haven’t tried the refill yet but this is definitely an economical feature to have.   The fragrance: I have been using the Burberry Goddess for more than a week now and loving it.  My first impression when I opened the bottle was a warm, summery and sweet scent. The vanilla was stand out with a hint of lavender and woodsy note. It was very well balanced and not overpowering at all, and very long lasting as well (over 8+ hours). I usually love  to spray some perfume on my hair, and surprisingly, my husband kept on sniffing my hair which he has never done before. I will definitely repurchase the Burberry Goddess and add it to one of my perfume collection :-)

reviews.review_title: Perfect for everyday wear in the summer or fall!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 1. The Scent This has a wonderful vanilla scent. The woody note balances out the sweetness. It also has a slight floral note possibly from the lavender they mentioned. Overall, a very pleasing and not overwhelming scent. This is vegan and the vanilla is sourced from Madagascar!   2. The Wear The first spray seems intense but after a few minutes it softens. I honestly like how it smells as a fades through the day. If you like a heavier wear, you do need to respray every few hours.   3. Design & Packaging  As a beauty packaging designer, I think the bottle design is well elevated. It looks rich and expensive in a simple sleek style. There’s a lot of details in the cap, spray nozzle and logo. The gold and warm color bottle matches the scent well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is amazing!! If you are a vanilla lover you willl absolutely love this! This fragrance is totally outside of the traditional Burberry DNA. The lavender add depth but is not overpowering. Great sillage and last 6-8 hours

reviews.review_title: Goddess - Sophistication for the rest of us
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m pretty finicky when it comes to fragrance.  I’m less discerning with what other people choose to wear, but if I’m going to put perfume on, it has to be perfect.  Burberry Goddess, the newest edition to the esteemed Burberry fragrance lineup, is as close to perfect as it gets.  Its layers of vanilla are comfortable and cozy, but the hint of lavender keep it from being seasonal.  This is truly a year round scent.  Goddess is sophisticated, but not stuffy. Judging from the range of people I received compliments from while wearing it, this perfume is ageless too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. The first impression of the perfume is ELEGANT. The design of the bottle with golden cap and details makes me feel like a goddess. The second impression is the strong note of VANILLA. It smells elegant, powerful and confident. The scent lasts quite long as it is an EDP.   This fragrance stays by your side, from morning meetings to late-night soirees , leaving a trail of elegance wherever you go.   This is also the first refillable perfume by Burberry. The exquisite refillable design allows you to indulge in luxury without contributing to excess waste.Thanks for the brand's dedication to the environment!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this smells really good! it's vanilla with a whisper of lavender. I see references to Eilish and though this is definitely vanilla I think Eilish is a bit syrupy vanilla a younger crowd pleaser. This is a yummy vanilla but not nauseating or too youthful. once dried down there's something I can't place that makes it more wearable than the sugary heavy vanillas on the market today.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this parfum because it makes me feel elegant. I have received many compliments and people asking what I'm wearing. It makes me feel so good when I spray myself with this luxurious bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: An absolutely stunning and sexy scent, it is sweet and gourmand. If you love vanilla fragrances you will love this although it is a sweet scent it is not overpowering. The bottle is beautiful, I love the gold and clear aesthetic look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess smells absolutely delicious, and makes me feel like a Goddess every time I use it. The different notes of vanilla are warm and sweet without being overpowering, and the scent lasts all day long. Plus the bottle and packaging are beautiful - the simplicity of the design is sleek and elegant, and would make a wonderful gift for someone. Burberry Goddess has definitely become my go-to perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this fragrance! Not at all like any of the previous Burberry releases, I love the vanilla in this. The lavender in here is not at all overpowering and doesn’t clash with the vanilla. There’s almost a powdery softness in here, that’s really pretty. I think think is a beautiful release!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: At first, it smells like Burberry beat for those who know that smell. A little stronger and woody and it’s not until it settles that you smell its sweet aroma. Definitely subtle and romantic with a hint of vanilla. It’s a light fragrance but lasts a long time. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Omg omg soooo good. It’s very simple and somewhat linear but still powerful especially if you love sweet vanilla fragrances. It’s kind of reminds me of skylar vanilla and the Kayali silk santal. Not identical but in the same family.

reviews.review_title: A subtle but sweet mixture of pleasant smells…
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised by the seeming mixed smell of musk, powder and flowers wrapped in one. The smell was not too heavy but mild and long lasting. Burberry Brit has always been one of my favorite perfumes but this might have beat my Brit! Lol! I’m definitely getting this and I recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used the product for a few days now, and it will forever be my new fragrance. The warmth of the vanilla gives it a little bit of spice while the lavender softens it and makes it the most delicious scent. My husband is obsessed too. The scent last long enough for me to make it through most of my day, but has usually worn off by the evening. The packaging feels so luxurious and looks timeless sitting in my counter. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is lovely! It is vanilla-scented, but not overbearing, which I like. I have gotten several compliments wearing it and am honestly thinking of getting my mom a bottle for the holidays! Plus, the bottle looks beautiful on my vanity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super happy with this scent. It smells beautiful and has a luxuriousness to it. I wear both to work and nights out. It’s a vanilla lavender scent with Amber undertones. Not super sweet. And the packaging is gorgeous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the warm hug of fragrance. It’s a nostalgic scent that will hold your hand on a new adventure. The packaging is timeless and elegant. The scent lasts all day. I love the warmth of this, it’s like a cup of too old tea.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After seeing this product in stores I knew I had to get it. It lasts for a long time and the price is very reasonable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so glad I was able to try this product. I’ll definitely be buying this in the future and would recommend others to as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this perfume, it's something incredible. It has a very refined, sweet aroma. If, like me, you like perfumes with a sweet smell, then this perfume is definitely for you. I felt special when I wore this perfume. This is now my favorite scent. And I also liked the bottle, it is beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is AMAZING. The smell I CANNOT get enough of it and constatntly am spraying it on. BUT, that is why I didn't rate it with 5 stars. It just doesnt seem to last like the other Burberry products I have used in the past. So in order for me to smell it on me, I'm constatntly having to spray more. Now with that said, I am not sure if this is just me being nose blind or if others can still smell on it on me. I am a major perfume addic, so I could see it just being me. But again, I do get compliments when I first put it on, never gotten one after its's been on for awhile though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how wearable this vanilla is. I’d say the lavender is very light. The vanilla is pretty linear but it is fresh and light  enough that it can be worn even when it’s hot out. I also don’t find it too sweet or cloying at all. I will be reaching for this again.

reviews.review_title: Gorgeous bottle and LONG LONG lasting
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Long lasting is an understatement ! When I say this is long lasting, I literally mean it was still prominent 12 hours after application ! The bottle is gorgeous & the packaging was great. It is a warm vanilla scent. The reason for my 4 star review is because I prefer a lighter scent. Overall, it is great & I would recommend ! Oh & it is vegan which is wonderful !  I received this product for free from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_title: A new must have for sure!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this perfume for a few weeks now... My man can not keep his hands to himself!!! The scent lasts a long time, even out in this hot summer heat! This is definitely my new signature scent!  I am really hard to please usually too!

reviews.review_title: Warm and comfy but also sexy!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first perfume I owned when I was 13 was Burberry Brit. This felt like the 33 year old version- sexy and grown up, but still comfy and approachable. Sometimes vanilla can read a little chemical to me, but this felt more organic. I’ve worn it every day since I received it, and look forward to cooler days where it will really shine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The way I’m obsessed with this fragrance. It reminds me of Flowerbomb, but sexier. It’s got major deep notes of vanilla and lavender, which I love. It also has staying power. Shh, but next day I still smell of it. It’s so sexy and seductive. Definitely a fall/winter scent IMO, but I am loving it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this perfume! The scent is very long lasting as I would expect from a high quality fragrance. The vanilla scent is very nice as it is not overpowering. This is my new go to scent for special occasions as I am not an everyday scent wearer.

Burberry Goddess is my new favorite scent.  I have literally gotten so many compliments on this since I started wearing it.  It smells absolutely heavenly.  You know the perfume you save for special occasions?  Mine used to be Gucci Rush, now it is Burberry Goddess.  The name is perfect!!

reviews.review_title: Perfect combination of sweet and sexy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a big sucker for fragrances and this one now have become my new favorite vanilla perfume. This fragrance is perfect combination of sweet and sexy. It lasted on me for more that eight hours and got me tons of compliments. The bottle is also very Pretty and sophisticated and will make a perfect gift. This is the perfect date night perfume and will make you feel like goddess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First glance you can see the bottle is elegantly designed, easy to hold and spray. The spray nozzle works well and npt messy at all. First impression is that it has a sweet vanilla note with a bit of lavender note. Just within a few minutes I can feel the perfume sticks to my skin really well (applied to wrist and neck area). The scent does not have that strong sweet scent as I thought, an in fact it's this lingering sweet vanilla scent and it feels so soothing and comfortable.  I highly recommend this product for daily use or when you go to events. The perfume is also very lasting (12 hours and I can still smell a bit on my wrist after a full night sleep + how many times I wash my hands throughout the day).  Overall, an amazing product that you want to but!
This perfume is very long lasting. I personally would wear it more in the colder months because I think it has a caramel fall vibes scent to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion from Influenster. Overall I think this was pretty good !! Even with 3 vanilla tones it was not overly sweet at all, definitely a more mellow and nuanced scent which I would expect at the price point. Longevity wasn’t great but I was only using two sprays so maybe with more it would last longer. Overall if it’s in alignment with your budget I would recommend but not something I would break the bank for 🤷🏼‍♀️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was doubtful I’d like this when I read the notes. I’m pretty particular about fragrances and generally wear citrusy, light, clean fragrances (Diptyque Eau Des sens, Le Labo Matcha), so the vanilla notes—which get top billing—made me think it would be too creamy and rich. But this is a vibrant, bright vanilla. While vanilla is the star of the show, it’s not cloying or sweet but layered nicely with floral notes that make it more effervescent than one might expect. And it dries down into a scent that blends nicely with the skin while also being prominent enough to get wafts all day. I am a fan. I still prefer bright, more clean fragrances for everyday but will be wearing this for special occasions, since it feels a little more special and romantic. But I think if you gravitate towards vanilla fragrances you’d have no problem using this as a daily wear. It’s inoffensive and bright enough not to overwhelm (and only a couple small sprays go a long way!).   Full disclosure, I got this as an incentivized review but as someone who is VERY picky with fragrances this is my very honest opinion. Pleasantly impressed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is stunning!! And the scent is absolutely beautiful! I had it on the other day and somebody stopped me and I asked what it was! You can smell the vanilla and a hint of lavender, but not the regular kind of vanilla scent, it was more of a boujie vanilla haha. My man lovesss it too so it’s def good. However I don’t feel it’s as long lasting. But still lasts a good amount of time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely a compliment getter!! This opens beautifully aromatic and woody. Then, she dries down to a golden vanilla with lavender to keep her interesting! Goddess lasts on skin with a nice silage for about 3-4 hours. Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks to Burberry and Influenster, I received the newest fragrance release called Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum in exchange for my honest review.  The scent is categorized as an Aromatic. I was surprised that it wasn’t a gourmand with all that vanilla but once I smelled it, I understood. The opening when I first sprayed reminded me of YSL’s Libre. It wasn’t the sweet, typical vanilla you might imagine. It’s deeper and more like the actual vanilla plant. That makes sense since vanilla caviar is the seeds and pulp that are scraped from the inside of the pod. This was a heavier, warm scent but it wore more lightly than I expected. Overall, this is a great addition to my collection. It works great when layered with a variety of other fragrances. I liked how it really focused on vanilla in a unique way. While in the bottle, you might think this smells like a traditional more heavy, perfume-y mature scent, but I suggest wearing it to really experience the nuances because as I said, it didn’t wear heavy at all on me. The projection and longevity were both on the low end; I personally prefer stronger scents that last forever. I’d love to see other similar scents that show different sides of an ingredient. I’m dreaming of a chocolatey cacao scent, which I think would be amazing as a set with this perfume!
