I have been using this perfume for a couple weeks and absolutely love it! The scent is so light and has hints of vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I say I am obsessed with this scent! Burberry really did their big one on this one. The Vanilla notes are superior, not too strong and the scent lasts all day long. It gives off a night time scent to wear on dates but for me I’ll wear it any time of day or season I enjoy it that much. If you are looking for a new scent that’s versatile for outings with the girls or date night, or you can wear to bed this is one I recommend. 10 out of 10!!! Oh and the packaging is so beautiful 😍

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After the first spray, I was in love with this vanilla scent right away. The smell is amazing and lasts all day long. I felt the warmness and softness that the scent brings. Definitely, it’s a great choice for the cold seasons. It was super comforting and relaxing. The bottle looks gorgeous, giving a high-end feeling. What captured my attention was designed for refilling. To me , I think this perfume can be use for any occasions. I’m already addicted to it, so I don’t care about the price, I’m gonna wear it everyday 😆.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very subtle fragrance. It is not overpowering. I can smell the vanilla prominently, but it has some floral notes — possibly lavender. My husband commented on the scent without any prompting. He said that he really liked it. The scent lingers for a couple of hours. You may need to use it again after 3-4 hours. This scent is sophisticated, and would be perfect for a formal function or dinner date.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful fragrance in such a lovely bottle by Burberry in Burberry Goddess- so fresh yet enticing. This perfume leaves a scent so divine that I promise you will get many compliments once you wear it. I gave it a review after multiple full days of wear and yes it does last! The vanilla notes linger in a very complex way that throw out this sexy, feminine, I can take over if I want vibe that I just fell in love! I am a fan of some very classic perfumes but I am happy to say that this new one has earned a spot on my perfume shelf.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. I havent even purchased this for myself yet but I sprayed it on myself in the store and I still smell it from yesterday. It’s such a sophisticated young vanilla smell. It’s not outdated or overly sweet. Reminds me of Bacarat Rouge

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest review.    I was looking forward to trying this perfume because fragrances with Vanilla can be a hit or miss at times.   I like the bottle’s design, classic but luxurious and can see this sitting on top of my dresser. I like that the bottle can be refilled.  The scent at first can smell intense once sprayed but with time the scent tones down in intensity which I like. I don’t enjoy an overpowering Vanilla scent and at first was worried this would be the case.  The description for the perfume mentions Top: Vanilla Infusion, Lavender; Middle: Vanilla Caviar; Base: Vanilla Absolute but I cannot smell anything Lavender in it.   The scent is long lasting. I tested it out in different times and each time I could still smell the perfume lingering by the end of the night.   I received the 1.6 bottle and see that it is priced at $129 so I do find it to be  a bit pricey. So if you are not a fan of the Vanilla smell then this would definitely be something to pass on.  If you love the Vanilla scent or Burberry brand then I would say this is definitely worth trying.  I would personally prefer to use this during the Fall/Winter time instead of summertime. So I think I will use it more during those times.
This perfume has such a nice deep depth vanilla smell. The lavender isn’t super strong either so there’s a nice balance of smell. It’s very warm, a little spicy and sweet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this parfum for free in exchange for my honest review. Burberry Goddess’s scent is nothing new but a very likable scent. It feels like a lighter, sweeter vanilla version of YSL libre minus the orange blossom.  The opening gives a deep lavender/woody vanilla then it fades to a lighter vanilla.  Notes: Top: Vanilla Infusion, Lavender Middle:  Vanilla Caviar Base: Vanilla Absolute  I heard that this is the first time that Firgood TM aka vanilla caviar has been used in a fragance!  Cons Scent is nothing innovative for fragrance fanatics Performance really declines after 1-2 hours  Pros Non-offensive scent Leaves a light sweet vanilla scent on the skin Perfect gourmand for summer Elegant & simplistic bottle design Refillable bottle  Other notes: Since this is a vanilla scent, liquid might change color over time.  I see this as a perfect gift for a recent collect graduate or anyone’s first designer perfume. Scent is strong but still light enough to wear in the summer heat (just don’t over spray it). Perfect for summer nights . Overall a non-offensive scent that can be worn every day and any season, I quite enjoyed wearing it and will definitely be reaching out for it frequently.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Goddess by Burberry is seriously love at first whiff. This new scent from Burberry is just on point! First of all, can we talk about that stunning bottle? It's all fancy with its gorgeous glass and gold, and the vintage-style closure is just so cool. Way better than the plain and boring bottles I've got.  It's very long lasting (~5 hours) and the smell, oh my! It's got this deep vanilla and musky, kinda spicy vibe going on. It's like pure richness, you know? The spicy notes aren't too strong, and they blend perfectly with the sweet vanilla. I'm telling you, this scent is all about those old money vibes, classy and sophisticated.  If this fragrance was a person, it'd totally be Jessica Pearson from Suits - you know, the accomplished, determined, and ambitious woman. It's got that boss lady energy, and I'm here for it! Goddess by Burberry is seriously a showstopper, and I can't get enough of it.

reviews.review_title: Amazing Long Lasting Vanilla Dreamy Scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a truly incredible vanilla scent. Even though the scent is so vanilla heavy it’s not overwhelming. The scent is very light, but lasts all day. I definitely pick up the notes of lavender and I even get a bit of citrus that keeps it fresh. This is a no-brainer fragrance for anyone. This will make the perfect gift for women of all ages

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A vanilla scent is not something I'd pick for myself normally, but I was pleasantly surprised by this one. It smells lovely - fruity and very feminine. Not overpowering at all and lasts a long time. The bottle itself is a very beautiful golden color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is so unique and beautiful. The packaging is very luxurious and the perfume is very high-end. When you first spray the perfume it smells very light and clean. There are hints of lavender, sweetness and vanilla. It tries down to a beautiful vanilla that is not overly sweet or musky. It is a very complex fragrance that is perfect on its own or layered with another fragrance. It is extremely long lasting but is not strong. It is very light making it perfect for summer or for someone that wants a more subtle fragrance.

reviews.review_title: I am in Love, I am Goddess!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say Burberry outdid themselves!  This fragrance is AMAZING. It is luscious on the vanilla, which is my ultimate fave, and has hints of lavender. They complement each other so well!   The bottle is beautiful and has a luxurious feel, it is also the first refillable perfume, woohoo!  Wear it with caution, you WILL smell and feel like a Goddess... other humans may randomly follow you ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Buy if you're in love with rich vanilla fragrances! Received the 50 mls size of this and wish it was the full 100 mls! Wearing this scent made me feel elegant and special. The design is beautiful with the gold tone detailing. Would recommend for a gift if vanilla is their scent of choice. Will be wearing this out on repeat! 5/5 stars!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Indeed the vanilla caviar of scents! The strength and longevity of BURBERRY Goddess is absolutely wonderful! My fiancé hates vanilla scents, but he can’t keep his hands away from me when I wear this one ! Haha, definitely a favorite! Highly recommend:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Upon first spray you smell a warm amber with a deep rich vanilla, it reminds me a bit of grand soir by MKJ which is gourmand but unisex, it’s not overly feminine as there are no floral notes but it warm and sexy, perfect for an evening out especially because it does begin to fade after about 5 hours. While the scent profile is rich, it’s not complex so it’s perfect for layering and would appeal to anyone. The bottle is substantial, simple but luxe and would make a great gift

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this fragrance! The bottle is absolutely beautiful and looks gorgeous on my vanity and the scent is to die for! I’ve never gotten so many compliments on a perfume before, this is definitely my new favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells good when it dries down, but I’m not big on vanilla scents. I feel like this one might be a little too mature for me, but it does last a really long time! The bottle is also very nice. Perfect fragrance for those cold winter night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Right off the bat, the bottle for this perfume is nice, yet simple. The scent is lovely with notes of amber, musk, and vanilla. It’s not an overpowering scent, just very subtle. As soon as I put it on, my boyfriend said “yum!” Perfumes don’t typically last more than a few hours on my skin and I find the same for this. After about 4 hours, I can’t really smell it anymore, maybe just faintly. Overall I think this is a great perfume.

reviews.review_title: It’s nice but it’s not unique
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice perfume. The bottle feels luxurious and the scent lasts a long time. This does, however, smell very similar to other perfumes. If you have YSL’s Mon Paris, Lancôme’s La Vie Est Belle or Idole, this may be a repeat for you. The scent is very sweet but has a slightly mature, musky undertone that makes it very versatile. Any age group can wear this perfume.   I tend to be somewhat sensitive to perfumes when I first use them but had no issues with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wore this scent on a date and brunch weekend. My biggest gripe with most scents is that they don't last long, and can be extremely overpowering. This was not the case AT ALL with this product. The scent was soft (Vanilla) and I swear, I put this on at 10am and the smell lasted over 10 hours. And thats in the Texas heat!  My only concern was that at SOME moments, my nose would be slightly itchy and I would sneeze. BUT I'm a sensitive person, I don't think that would be an issue for others.

reviews.review_title: Sweet, Spicy, Seductive, and Long Lasting💛✨
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was immediately drawn to the name “goddess” and the shiny gold packaging. I tried it on in the Sephora store and I fell in love. It is sweet and spicy at same time - smells like warm vanilla, 24K gold, subtle lavender, black pepper, and pure luxury. I knew I couldn’t walk out of the store without it so I bought the beautiful travel box for $40. Now as I am writing this review, it is 10 am, and I tried this on YESTERDAY afternoon at 2 pm. I still smell it in my hair and on my wrists (plus my hair elastics on my wrists absorbed it very strongly). Most delicious and long lasting perfume ever!! Love Goddess💛✨

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the vanilla scent in this. It’s sweet but the lavender keeps it from feeling like I smell like a candy store! It also lasted all day long, which I have found to be my biggest struggle with perfumes. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you love vanilla, this perfume is definitely for you! It’s a very mature scene, and has the same feel all Burberry scents have. It lasted all day, I could still even smell it on my seatbelt the next day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so in love with this heavenly smelling perfume. I smells the warms hints of vanilla all in this perfume. It reminds me of a cool fall night. This perfume lasts all day long from morning to late night. I am absolutely in love with this perfume!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Goddess by Burberry Eau de Parfum is the first incentivized product I have received for free from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest review, and I truly could not have asked for a better starting VoxBox! This perfume smells like the feeling of falling in love next to a fireplace: warm, romantic, and lingering in the air for hours and hours. My first impression was a woodsy musk, but spraying it on my skin revealed layers of sweet vanilla that give off a sense of softness. However, this perfume is anything BUT soft in terms of potency: it comes on strong and stays on long. I tried one spray on my neck and one on each wrist, but in the future I would be more likely to do a half spray on my neck and one spray rubbed between my wrists since it has such an intense initial application. Hours into wearing it the fragrance is still definitely noticeable but has turned into an elegant sweet musk and I must honestly say I LOVE it! I’ve never had a perfume stay on this well or make me feel so empowered, and I’m extremely picky with my perfumes. Nevertheless, Goddess by Burberry is so mesmerizing that I’m looking forward to wearing it out just to show it off!
This perfume is lovely! It has a strong sweet scent with a floral undertone. One thing to note is that it is very strong! One spritz and you are good for the entire day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful vanilla fragrance. If you love vanilla this is for you. Although the notes aren’t complex, this fragrance is very sophisticated.  This fragrance lasted on me approximately 6 hours.  You have to get your nose on this oneIt’s so warm and cozy. I can’t wait to wear it in the cooler months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free product from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest review. There are 3 different kinds of vanilla in this perfume with a little lavender. Vanilla is the most prominent scent and I couldn’t really pick up lavender notes or it just smells mild to me. It smells woodsy, classy, sophisticated, and elegant, just like the glass container and packaging. I like vanilla perfumes but I prefer it mixed in equally with other scents and not as the main scent. This perfume lasts for about 6 hours or so then becomes a mild scent at the end of the day. I just did one spray on my inner elbow since it smells overpowering in the beginning. This perfume will do well in the fall/winter. It’s pricey but give it a try and see if it’s worth it for your preference/taste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange of my honest opinion. I love everything about the scent. It is pretty strong and will last you the whole day. It has vanilla and lavender scent. I like how ít packaging. Plain and simple

reviews.review_title: Adding this to the rotation of scents!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was thrilled to receive this perfume from Burberry. I was instantly please with the scent. The warm notes of vanilla filled the room and I knew it was going to be my new go to scent for the fall. I was also happy to see they used a vegan formula. Bottle design has a very elegant look to it and I’m happy to display with my collection of perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This review is written as part of a promotional giveaway. Because scent is subjective, I rated this perfume a three. I would not have bought this perfume had I smelled it in the store first. You definitely get the smell of vanilla underneath some musk and other darker scents. It is not a floral scent whatsoever or a sweet scent. I would say this is a perfume for night time or the fall/winter seasons because it is a heavier perfume. The scent will last about a half a day on the skin or clothing before you would need to reapply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum smells so good! It’s vegan warm vanilla notes are elegant, soft and made for a goddess.

reviews.review_title: If you want to feel like a Goddess
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest review. Whether you're going out or staying in, this versatile fragrance will be your new best friend, bringing joy and admiration wherever you go. The perfume opens with a burst of vanilla notes that instantly bring a sense of warmth and indulgence. With its elegant packaging, it's a must-have addition to your collection. I also found that it is completely refillable which is a nice touch. Wearing this made me feel like a Goddess (hence the name)!  Its longevity is exceptional, as it lasted about four hours and I couldn't help but receive an abundance of compliments whenever I wore it. Love it!! I think it would be a fantastic gift, and will be purchasing one at Christmas for my sister, mom, and self(haha)!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item in exchange for my honest opinion. I've used this for about a week and i'm absolutely in love with it. It's vanilla with a slight lavender underneath. I usually don't prefer gourmand scents, however this one is a wonderful balance of freshness and sweetness. The vanilla isn't too sweet and the lavender doesn't smell musty. Great wear time, and great for any time of day. A perfect summer scent and will work perfectly well for the Fall season too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfume scent is really amazing it last all day and I still smell it in my clothes. It is the longest longevity from that I ever had. The packaging is good  and impressive it’s only enough to spray just once and you all the smells fabulous all the day. Definitely recommend it. It is my new favorite my sister birthday will be soon. I will gift her. Burberry goddes perfume

reviews.review_title: Run, don't walk and buy this perfume!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My first thoughts on the bottle design was that it looked elegant. Next once I sprayed it I completely fell in love! The scent is vanilla which is a plus for me because I love vanilla scents. I also received so many compliments and many people inquiring what perfume I was wearing. The scent lasted all day and that was a major plus for me. I received this complimentary from influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is very sweet. It smells like honey and vanilla combined. If you like flowery/sweet scent then you will love this. I like how it last very long through out the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this scent. Nice notes of vanilla and cinnamon mixed with lavender but not overwhelming. Others could smell it and enjoyed it too. Great lasting power on this one. Overall very pleased.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t wait to try & review this perfume. It smells super good, warm, delicious, and incredibly sophisticated. I was looking for a vanilla citrus scent and this was it but even more luxurious than I expected. I can wear it anytime, anywhere. not oberpowering, but very long lasting. 8-10 hours later i can still smell it. That is the reason to love it. It lasts for days on my clothes and it smells amazing! This is my new favorite. I always receive so many nice compliments when I wear it. I love the smell of this perfume I would recommend it to anyone the smell stays on all day. This scent is a long lasting, beautiful scent. 10/10 recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m absolutely in love with this perfume. It smells so good. Smells like a more mature vanilla scent. I used to use daisy love, but will only use this from now on. In love!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume exceeded my expectations. Sometimes classic designer name brands have outdated scents but this smells so good I can't keep my husband off of me. It has a sweet, romantic smell and it is my new favorite. I currently own several designer perfumes and this one just topped the list for date night. This is an honest review of a free item.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great warm and woodsy vanilla scent with floral notes to lighten the composition. Lasts a few hours on the skin. Would be great for a date night or everyday wear. Could be layered with another complimentary scent for different occasions making this a very versatile perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Omg I’m usually VERY picky when it comes to vanilla scented perfumes. Most smell very overstimulating, tacky & childish, but Goddess by Burberry really elevated the standard by providing the perfect mixtures of vanilla. This is NOT your stereotypical vanilla perfume & I am in love!  Goddess has an elegant hint of vanilla lavender, hint of a sexy woody version of vanilla and lavish sweet & rich vanilla.  The lavender note definitely makes this perfume unique by adding a fresh scent to the sweetness, so it’s not too overpowering.  Another reason why I adore this perfume is because it’s refillable. Yes, once you spray away to an empty bottle, it allows you to refill it with its unique design. (The refill is of course sold separately).   Since it’s a perfume, it’s oil-based which lasts longer on the skin. I’d say this perfume is very loud, so one spray goes a long way… which I LOVE. It’s a sprinkle of fun, flirty, sexy & elegance. So run, don’t walk & grab yourself one... It will absolutely be worth your while!

reviews.review_title: Must have if you love vanilla
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After one week of using this, I would like to recommend it to my friends and my family. This perfume lasts over 6 hours. The scent is so warm and sexy. It's also fresh for use every day. Thanks influence.  mind when

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells a lot like the Sol de Janeiro Bum Bum cream!The scent really last all day and more.It fades a bit but fades in a good way!Will be repurchasing again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is chewy but not overpowering, keep quiet but still love and remember forever. The degree of incense retention is off the table, it must be around 7-12 hours. There are days when you lightly apply the shirt but still enjoy it for the next few days. Gentle, feminine, yet sweet, warm like musk and iris. Make it simple enough that reproduces in parts. Do you have a line of fruity fragrances that are so excellent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess perfume is luxury scent, the smell have some lavender flowers and sweetness vanilla, it’s the one seductive perfume I have. You should to try it.

reviews.review_title: Goddess is the perfect name for this perfume!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After receiving this product as a gift, I am obsessed. It is the perfect blend of warm vanilla but very sexy. It is a luxurious smell and instantly makes me happy when I spray it on. My husband loves it on me. It is a light scent but lasts a while. The bottle is gorgeous and looks beautiful on my vanity. The word “goddess” is exactly how it makes me feel! I would absolutely recommend to anyone who loves the sexy vanilla scent. I think even people who don’t love vanilla would still like this scent so it would make a nice gift.

I recently had the pleasure of trying the Burberry Goddess perfume from Sephora, and I must say, it's an absolute delight. From the moment I sprayed it on, I was captivated by its alluring and elegant aroma.  The fragrance opens with a burst of fresh and fruity notes that instantly uplift the senses. As it settles, the heart of the scent reveals a delicate floral bouquet, which adds a touch of femininity and sophistication. What sets this perfume apart is the warm and sensuous base, featuring hints of musk and amber that linger beautifully throughout the day.  What I love about Burberry Goddess is its versatility. It's perfect for both daytime wear, adding a subtle aura of luxury to any occasion, and also transitions effortlessly into evening events, exuding an air of confidence and allure.  One of the best aspects of this perfume is its longevity. I found that a few spritzes in the morning lasted well into the evening, keeping me enveloped in its enchanting essence without overpowering others around me.  The packaging is also worth mentioning. The elegant bottle with the iconic Burberry check pattern adds a touch of class to any vanity or handbag.  In conclusion, Burberry Goddess is a true masterpiece that makes me feel empowered and effortlessly glamorous. If you're looking for a fragrance that embodies sophistication and allure, this is a must-have for your collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, I don’t love this and won’t be wearing it. I like vanilla notes, but something about this is too sweet for me and gives me a bit of a headache. But I am very sensitive to smells, so if you like very sweet vanilla perfumes I could see you liking it. For reference, other perfumes with vanilla I tend to like are Clean Reserve Skin, Commodity Gold and Nest Madagascar Vanilla. I received product this free for testing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very sexy smelling product. At first, I thought it was too strong for my liking but after a little while it settled and the smell is amazing. I received so many compliments athappy hour. It definitely gives a boost of confidence and is long lasting. I would recommend wearing this at night due to it being a stronger scent and maybe too much for work but I am 100% adding this to my rotation. Buy it! You won’t regret it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Spoiler alert, I love this. It isn't your typical vanilla, though its top, middle, and base note are all vanilla. There is a lavendar note that makes this perfume different. More fresh at first. Its blended beautifully, because normally im not a fan of lavendar. As far as throw and longevity, i was getting compliments from friends and family all day. Definitely reccomend giving this a sniff/try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Before I even took the bottle out of the box, I could smell this perfume! That smell had me very eager to get the box open, it smells amazing! It’s pretty strong so you don’t need much but this will make a great date night perfume. And the bottle is really cute! 😁 strong smells of vanilla, lavender, maybe a little musk. I got a lot of compliments! Incentivized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My first impression of this fragrance was that it was an expensive, upgraded version of more basic vanilla scents. It instantly reminded me of Bath and Body Works' warm vanilla sugar scent. That said, after wearing it for a couple weeks, I've grown to appreciate the complexities and nuances of the vanillas. It does smell expensive and elegant.   For such a warm scent, I found that it didn't last as long as I expected. If I spray it on the in morning, it's usually not noticeable by the mid-afternoon.  For me, the warmness/spiciness makes it more appropriate for a fall/winter scent and I look forward to wearing it during the holidays.   The bottle design is elegant and beautiful on my vanity. This would make a wonderful gift for anyone who loves a strong vanilla scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent what with the three vanilla sources and lavender! Everything compliments it wonderfully. I don't understand the low ratings! It is a treat and so yummy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I wore this around my boyfriend, he immediately noticed and said I smelled really good. Then it happened three times in a row! Lol so yeah, I think we have a winner! It is a subtlety sweet vanilla scent that I would describe as warm but not too food-y. I don’t really pick up on the lavender base myself, but overall it smells wonderful. The bottle is also gorgeous. I love the gold label and cap. I’d definitely recommend this scent to others!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely ONE of the best perfums I've ever had. The essence is very sophisticated and a little sweet. Its also soft but really stay lomg in your body. I love it soo much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great perfume lasts long I love it. After an hour the scent is more mellow with sweet notes thank you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange of my honest opinion. I must say It is truly a gem! When I read base note was vanilla I was afraid it might be excessively sweet but it is definitely not. It has another floral notes that balance perfectly and a lasting romantic vanilla notes. The name feels really appropriate, I would use it for a date night or a big important day when my confidence needs a boost. Fragrance bottle is designed to be refilled and that is something I love, and vegan formula? I’ll definitely be purchasing this later on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is very sweet! If you like vanilla you will love the scent. It also lasts all day which is nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I instantly fell in love with this scent. I was afraid the vanilla would be too much but it’s a great balance with the lavender. The bottle design is also quite elegant. I think this would be a great fall fragrance and I can’t wait to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was thrilled when getting this as I love Burberry products. The packaging is Devine and very aesthetically pleasing with the shiny gold. As soon as I sprayed it I knew that I was quite displeased. This smells so ridiculously sweet. There doesn’t seem like much hints of anything. I honestly had a smell flashback to a carebear perfume I got from hot topic 20 years ago. Overall, this feels very juvenile as I don’t know many adult women who would choose to smell like candy. I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a big fragrance fan, but this one doesn’t hurt my head! The main notes I pick up are warm va nella and fresh scent. It is light enough to wear in a professional setting, and doesn’t smell like grandma. The bottle is beautiful, and would make a great gift!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells like a basic vanilla lavender perfume. It smells like it’s for ages 30 and up maybe mid 20s. Personally not for my age but I like how it smells still and also love mixing it with my other perfumes. Lasts pretty long from my experience and the longer it wears the better it smelled.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this frangrance. It’s sensual and intense. The reason I gave 4 stars is because I found it very similar to other well known perfumes. Once I sprayed I had a familiar feeling like I have owned before. I would say good perfume but nothing original.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised by this scent, as I'm not typically a gal who gravitates toward vanilla. Using this fragrance is a rich, luxurious experience. The initial vibe is warm and woodsy. It dries down to a scent that's more clearly vanilla. The bottle is gorgeous. I wish the staying power was a bit longer--it lasts about 3-4 hours on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so happy with this perfume! It reminds me a little of YSL Libre, but with a stronger lavender note. I think it would be a good year-round scent, but maybe best in the late summer/early fall. The warm vanilla dry down is so cozy! And it doesn’t hurt that the bottle is pretty!  !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you like vanilla and prefer warm, musky scents, this will probably be your jam. It boasts 3 layers of vanilla, with a hint of lavender - but the vanilla is so overpowering that I don’t get anything else. To sum it up: It’s a one-note vanilla musk. Perhaps if you layer it with other more complex scents, it would up its game. I would not wear it alone, personally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great product and smells amazing!! Warm, vanilla features but not too strong or overpowering

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best smelling perfume I have ever had. It doesn’t have a smell that is too strong it’s perfect. It is also the first perfume I have found that doesn’t make my allergies act up. The first time I used it I got a lot of compliments from friends and they all asked what it was.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume so much. It’s just the perfect amount of scent without being too overwhelming. The bottle is thick and feels luxurious and I love the way you can refill it! The scent is a perfect blend of vanilla and just a hint of amber.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. I immediately fell in love! This is such a sexy perfume. Perfect for date night. I sprayed it on early in the morning and just got home and can still smell smell it! So many people at work asked what I was wearing 🤩 this will be a must have for every woman’s collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this perfume! Definitely added to one of my go to scents. The bottle is beautiful, simple and classy. Upon the first spray I could smell the lavender, a bit woodsy with a touch of vanilla.  As product dried down it develops a stronger touch of vanilla mixed with lavender. Wearing this perfume was beautiful and got a lot of compliments while wearing which gives you confidence. The fragrance had good staying power on my skin and I could smell it through out my day. Well worth the price for a new scent, very feminine and lovely to wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Burberry in exchange for my honest review. This smells like an elevated warm vanilla sugar with a slight floral smell. It has a strong lasting power and my fiancé loves it on me! If you don’t like vanilla this defintely isn’t for you. I love it though! 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not sugary sweet. Not juvenile sweet. Classy multilayered fragrance sweet, well in keeping with the respected branding of Burberry. Think cashmere and silk on an autumn day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite fragrance! Warm with soft hints of vanilla. The name Goddess is perfect because that’s what you feel and smell like while wearing this fragrance. The scent isn’t to strong and last a long time. Even after a dove into the pool you can still smell the perfume. I will be giving this as gifts for people this year. I had so many compliments. It feels like being wrapped in a snuggly blanket on a crisp fall night. Again this is one of the best perfumes I have tried and will definitely be my fall and winter signature scent. The size and shape of the bottle are perfect and easy to handle and definitely one to put up and save .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have the hardest time finding a perfume that doesn’t give me a headache and still smells amazing and I finally found it with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite Burberry fragrance! This is such an sweet and sexy scent. It dries down to an intoxicating vanilla that lasts ALL day. It is intense without being overpowering. The packaging is a classic glass & gold that looks gorgeous on my vanity. This is a perfect scent to wear on a date night as it will having you feeling yourself a. Ii received this product from Influenster for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay my husband never notices perfume, and he couldn’t stop smelling me with this on. Honestly it’s such a transitional scent that it can be used summer, autumn and throughout the year. I’ve genuinely never enjoyed a scent more than this. And it stays on all day. I get nose numb to so many scents and this one just stays! Great perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this fragrance for free to give my honest opinion about it. If you are a vanilla lover, you will love this fragrance. It is made up of 3 different vanillas. I received it in the EDP presentation in a 50 ml size, it was great for me to be able to try this perfume in winter It belongs to the Gourmand spacy, ideal for cold climates, its aroma is captivating, it has a touch of lavender, I love it, it is not invasive, an extremely delicate sweet and woody vanilla, the bottle of this perfume is elegant, animalistic, heavy, I really recommend it, I look forward to using it in the winter season, because in summer it is very soft, its aroma evaporates, the heat of summer fades it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume was great. It had a nice strong vanilla and lavender scent, very unique and lasted over 12 hours on me! It’s definitely one of my new favorites, worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells amazing! I got so many compliments

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Vanilla is the star here - it's rich, comforting, and super luxurious. It has this elegant vibe to it but still feels modern, and honestly, it leaves a lasting impression. Definitely perfect for anyone who loves a bit of sweetness in their scents. All in all, Goddess is a new staple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first perfume from Burberry and the smell is incredible. The vanilla is warm without being too overpowering (which is something i worry about when it comes to vanilla scents). It also lasted throughout the day and I received so many compliments on the scent! The packaging is gorgeous and it feels very luxurious (both in packaging and scent) and I love that it’s refillable. I’d definitely recommend giving this one a try if you like vanilla focused scents!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful warm vanilla scent. On me, the vanilla definitely is the primary scent here and has a beautiful lasting effect.

reviews.review_title: Goddess smells amazing! She fades to fast.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest review, with all that out of the way this perfume is amazing! Top notes are vanilla and lavender, and you get that right away.  Middle note is vanilla caviar, which is the pulp from the Madagascar bean. The bottom note is absolute vanilla, which is an extract. Another good thing about this perfume is that it is a vegan formula. Now I wanted to give this perfume five stars, but she disappears fast like I maybe could smell it for an hour, and then it was gone. I still feel like it’s a great perfume to have just layer so it’ll last longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am always looking for a good heavenly smelling perfume, that last a while. This product smells heavenly. I can smell the warm smell of vanilla in this product. The bottle is beautiful too. The smells lasts all day long, and it smells just as strong at the end of the day. This scent reminds me of a night out on a fall evening. I absolutely love this product and I am sure you will too.

If you are reading this review you need this guys.! It’s so lovely vanilla, love it at first smell, so much sexy here.  If you like vanilla you cannot go wrong with this one Burberry Goddess, You Need This!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a new favorite! This perfume has a nice vanilla note, while also still having a light feel and not being too sweet. The scent lasts all day, even when I am out in the heat. I am constantly getting compliments and being asked what I am wearing. I will forever recommend this perfume to anyone who asks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is a vanilla scented perfume with top notes of vanilla and lavender, middle notes of vanilla caviar and base notes of vanilla absolute.  I generally am not super fond of vanilla based perfume solely on the fact that my step mother wore it most of the time so it feels a little mature to me.  That said this perfume does smell very different than your Grandma’s vanilla perfume.  The vanilla and lavender mixed together make it not as sweet and more of a warm vanilla bean smell.  It’s almost like I can smell toasted marshmallows in it too.  I think it would be great to wear on a date with my boyfriend or a night on the town.  It smells luxurious and fancy, like I would imagine a bronzed Egyptian Goddess would smell while she’s sunbathing on her balcony overlooking the pyramids.  The bottle is absolutely gorgeous, I love the Gold and glass combined together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first impression is the packaging, the bottle is beautiful and sturdy. The first note is a strong vanilla smell with a hint of powdery scent. Even it’s simple, it brings a luxurious feeling. The smell was at its best is after 30 mins of spraying, nice and fresh. After 8 hours, the vanilla smell is very subtle. the sillage isn’t strong. I used tried 4 sprays but after 6-8 hrs, I can’t smell it.

reviews.review_title: It is definitely a must have in every women's coll
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume as simple from infllenster and I cant find Word to express how sassy I feel when I use it. The Vanilla-Jasmin scent is so remarcable. I love how this perfume last on my skin and even next Day.. I used it for and event and everyone was asking me about the fragance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honest review after being given a sample to try before the launch- this one is amazing. The fragrance hits strong with the sweetness of the vanilla and the spice undertones, and then settles into an alluring, feminine sweet fragrance. I have been using it every day since last Friday and continue to like the scent more and more. The most amazing thing about it though is the staying power. I dab on my wrists and neck at 6 am, and when I come home at 5 pm you can still smell it. I have never had a perfume last this long before. The bottle looks stunning on my counter top also, as it’s a simple and elegant design. Burberry really crafted a winner here. This would make an excellent gift, and I think because it’s so vanilla forward that it could be universally worn by younger and more mature women alike.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum as a complimentary gift from Influenster for testing purposes.I’m absolutely obsessed . My new favorite scent. This perfume smells amazing  vanilla tones +lavender. It’s lasts all day on my skin . Already wore it and people around me ask what fragrance  wearing. I get compliments on it all the time. It’s perfect for any occasion. Lovely packaging designer and the bottle is adorable and luxurious and spray nicely . I am very pleased with this fragrance. I think it would be a fantastic gift for all your favorite people. Thank you so much for the opportunity Influenster. I love it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unexpectedly it becomes my new favorite perfume. I thought it would be too sweet and monotonous, but it is a unique multi-level fragrance! The vanilla is very soft and spicy, with a deep woody undertone. I can smell the lavender and even the Christmas cookies my parents bake for the holidays. I am in awe of the beauty of the bottle. The design is luxurious! It's not an obtrusive smell at all. It is not overwhelming. It is a gentle and pleasant aroma that lasts about six hours. Then the fragrance becomes less perceptible but remains on the skin. That is absolutely a feminine fragrance. But I highly recommend trying it even if you don't like a sweet perfume. You will be surprised. Goddess perfume is incentivized product that I have received from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. And this is my favorite for the year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you live a good sweet scented perfume, this will be your new go to. This perfume has the perfect amount of sweet! The west of this perfume is also great! I can still smell it on myself after several hours of wear. The packaging/ bottle is so beautiful and sleek.

This is gorgeous! It reminds me a bit of Alien Goddess, but sweeter. This scent is a nice, sweet/gourmand - heavy on the sweeter vanilla notes, but not overwhelmingly so. This is a grown up vanilla. I’ve received several compliments wearing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: “I received these products for free from Influenster and brand(s) for my honest review in exchange for my honest review.”  First sniff, I can smell the lavender. Then it’s backed by all this vanilla which smells heavenly in the dry down. The projection is there, I would say an arms length at the most, so it gives a nice scent bubble. I haven’t gotten any compliments yet, but it sure has gotten positive attention even if the people around me didn’t know it was me lol. I personally love it, and I hope whoever decides to seek this out will enjoy it as well!  I will say though, this reminds me of Mon Guerlain. This is definitely sweeter though because of the vanilla which is what I like most about this fragrance! This is a love for me! 😊👍🏽  I love how elegant and sturdy the bottle is. It definitely exudes goddess vibes and makes me feel like one when I wear it. 🥰  I get 9hrs+ wear out of this fragrance. It also has calming qualities because of the lavender. Could also work as a bed time scent, my husband enjoyed it and it put him to sleep! Lol needless to say he loves lavender.  #incentivized

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t know what to expect from the perfume. Personally i’ve never considered myself a vanilla scent girlie. But this perfume has changed my mind! It is so light and the little touch of floral makes this scent perfect to wear alone or layer (personally I love layering it) The only downside I found was it doesn’t wear as long as i’d like but I find that tends to be the pattern for most higher end perfumes in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What's your first impression of the fragrance? Well, the fragrance itself is sweet enough.  What notes did you pick up in this scent? Again, it has vanilla so it’s sweet-scented. •Was it long-lasting? How did wearing the perfume make you feel? It smells good but it doesn’t last long. Like 1-2 hours only. Wearing it makes me feel so good! But again, it doesn’t last long.  •What do you think of the bottle design? Would it make a good gift? Yes, it is a good gift. The bottle design is all-Gold, very classy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is the perfect mix of sweet and sophisticated. It reminds me a lot of the Bethany Mota perfume which was my favorite perfume. I've been wearing this everyday since receiving it. This is now my favorite perfume! I definitely recommend giving this perfume a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: seems to have a good staying power, too. This is perfect as a good fall scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have received this product for free in exchange for my honest review and here it is! I absolutely LOVE this perfume! This perfume has a soft, warm, sweet vanilla scent with a hint of lavender. It's definitely channeling confidence, sensuality, sophistication, and perfect for igniting your inner feminine goddess! I would say that this perfume is more suitable for formal occasions and date nights. I'm amazed at the longevity of the scent and I'm very pleased that it doesn't have an alcohol smell. The packaging doesn’t stand out too much. It is simple yet feminine and sleek.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a perfume obsessed gal with several other Burberry scents, I’m not surprised that I’m enjoying this one. I am, however, surprised at how much Im enjoying it.I received this product as a free sample and I am often hesitant to wear vanilla forward scents ( strange Warm Vanilla body spray memories) but this scent seems to have so much depth, that the vanilla is secondary to a very light woodsy, slightly floral fragrance.  It’s sophisticated, warm, and sexy. Love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love vanilla scents, so I definitely loved the smell. The bottle is so cute. Simple, classy, and elegant. Definitely felt like a goddess after putting this perfume on. I highly recommend if you love vanilla and if you don’t, you’ll love this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you love vanilla this is for you. Sweet but a grown woman sweet. The more you smell it the better it gets. I absolutely love Burberry scents but this one right here!! I can’t get over it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this fragrance free from Influenster for my honest opinion. This fragrance is a Vanilla BABE! The simplicity of this fragrance makes its dry down nearly identical to its initial spray which I loves because it lasts and It projects well. The lavender is present but it’s just a hint, and fades as the day goes on. It's just enough lavender to balance the sweetness—a well blended formula. I have been wearing it day to day or out and about it’s truly versatile. I noticed that the longer she sits the more creamy and smoothe the  vanilla becomes so I’m very happy to be picked for this campaign. This is plays very well when layered with other fragrances but she’s so good when wearing by herself as well. I would consider this a safe blind-buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great warm vanilla scent it made me think of fall which I love and it lasted all day without being over powering! Cute packaging will make a great holiday stocking stuffer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A very soft vanilla with a hint of feminine musk. Most vanilla scents are too sweet or artificial smelling but this one is just right. It’s a great every day perfume for day or night

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the way it smells. This novelty from Burberry is a real marvel! It has a great vanilla smell.  Once again Burberry seduces with its elegant design and smell. I love it ❤️

reviews.review_title: Smells like an evening in late summer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The fragrance is warm and sweet.  The smell reminds me of those days in late summer when its warm  in the day, and cool at night. It's a very comforting fragrance.  The scent isnt too heavy or strong and would be great for any occasion. It lasted most of the day, maybe need to reapply if going out in the evening. The bottle has a very clean, luxurious feel and is also refillable which is a nice feature.  The only criticism about this perfume would be is I noticed when I first spritzed it, there's was a slight chemical smell, but it went away almost immediately.  Overall, its a delightful fragrance and would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently used this product and really enjoyed the smell. It’s definitely on the sweeter side, but still smells really nice. The bottle is nice and looks luxurious and the scent lingers for a decent amount of time. I would recommend this to anyone who likes a sweet and vanilla smelling perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Going to start this off with I am not a vanilla kinda perfume gal. They’re always too sweet and overwhelming. This is the first I have found that I can tolerate and actually love! It’s a subtle scent, has great depth of floral notes, but has that warm vanilla scent as well. Will likely be one of my winter scents! Lasting power is great too, pleasantly surprised!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Burberry Goddess scent for free in exchange for my honest review. If your looking for a vanilla scented perfume or a seductive scented perfume, this is the winner! I fell in love with this the moment i opened it! Burberry has perfected the warm, delicious, and seductive scent of vanilla and all of its layers. One little sniff will automatically have you rolling your eyes back with desire. I can't stop smelling my own wrists lol. It does however need a mid day renewal spray since it does fade off. I wished it was a little longer lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product through Influenster .  The Burberry Goddess Eau De Parfum is a fragrance that promises a captivating and alluring experience. Upon trying it, I found myself unsure with the overall performance and scent.  Firstly, the longevity of this perfume is quite underwhelming. Within just a few hours of application, the scent fades away completely, leaving no trace behind. This lack of staying power is disappointing considering its relatively high price point.  Moreover, the fragrance itself does not live up to its claims of being captivating and goddess-like. The initial notes are pleasant enough with hints of floral and fruity undertones, but as time goes on, it becomes overwhelmingly sweet and cloying. It lacks complexity and depth that one would expect from a high-end perfume.  Additionally, the packaging feels cheap and uninspired. The bottle design lacks creativity or elegance that one would associate with a luxury brand like Burberry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is honestly my new holy grail! When I tell you this is my new go to I tell you no lie! The smell is to die for! Not over bearing but not to soft! Smells like vanilla paradise!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love vanilla perfumes/scents. This is the perfect combination without smelling like feet. I’m pretty sensitive to fragrances & thankfully have experienced zero headaches & no sneezing while wearing this. The only downside to this perfume in my opinion is the boring presentation. For a perfume named “Goddess”, the box & bottle were awfully boring. I know most people don’t purchase perfume based on the bottle; however, I remember my mom & aunts proudly displaying all of their beautiful perfume bottles on their vanities. Wish they would’ve done something a little more special to attract the eye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells amazing. It has a soft vanilla scent but it's not overpowering. Burberry Goddess can easily transition from a day to night scent. This is a signature sent to have in your perfume collection. Also if you're into layering perfumes this would also work perfect for layering as well. Overall I would give this perfume a 10 out of 10.

reviews.review_title: Oh my goddess. It smell so good
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: thank Influenster for sending me this fragrance box. I am in love with this scent This is such a sexy smelling perfume. I sprayed it on early in the morning and just got home and can still smell it! My client's  at work asked what I was wearing 🤩 this will be a must have for every woman’s collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this perfume by Burberry. The Burberry Goddess perfume is a delightful symphony of fresh lavender and rich lavender notes. Its long-lasting fragrance is perfect for any occasion. My wife (who’s picky with scents) loved it so much she tried to insist the perfume would be hers from now on. Just one spritz of this lasts all day and night which is incredible compared to some other perfumes that barely last a couple of hours. I’m really impressed with this product and would recommend it as a gift to yourself or a loved one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical at first because I’m the past Burberry hasn’t been my favorite but, this GODDESS perfume lives up to the hype. It’s sweet and floral and not to strong. It fades in just the right way that the scent still lingers. 10/10 for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is yummy, warm, and flirty. I have many vanilla perfumes and this one doesn’t necessarily dry down to anything special. I do enjoy the warm scent. If you love vanilla perfume, you will love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Upon first spraying this perfume, I get vanilla with hints of the classic burberry DNA as well as a hint of lavender. As it dries down it becomes a generic vanilla. As a gourmand lover I had higher hopes for this one. Overall it's a pretty, typical perfume counter scent, but nothing groundbreaking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I say it smells amazing, I mean I smell like a goddess. I love vanilla so much and to me it a sexy scent. My husband kept smelling me lol. The bottle is so pretty and sleek and its worth the money. I will be purchasing this for me and a gift for my love ones.

reviews.review_title: Such a warm sultry Devine fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely love the packaging and the fragrance is beautiful, warm and feminine. Burberry always has amazing products and this fragrance smells amazing and lasts all day. love the vanilla notes and would highly recommend. Beautiful scent overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the sweetest scents I’ve ever worn. The best way I can describe it is a candied vanilla. It still has a sophistication to it, and it is a highly feminine scent. It lasts for several hours. I am most interested in layering a scent like this with something like tobacco - to balance its sweetness. The bottle is elegant and looks nice on display.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got my parfum! It smells soooo good sweet and subtle. It last sooooo long. It’s a very warm sweet scent it gives, I could not stop smelling the bottle it’s just so good! I sprayed it head to toe!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you are a vanilla scent girly, you need this in your collection. I absolutely love this perfume, it's vanilla with an underlying smell of floral-so you definitely pick up that lavender note. It's sexy, a little mysterious, sweet, and feminine. I don't think you're limited to only wearing it for date night but I can see myself wearing it for such an occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess is like a dream come true in a bottle! You've got to experience the mesmerizing blend of lavender and vanilla – it's got this subtly sweet scent that's beyond amazing. And don't worry, it won't knock you out with its strength! This beauty lasts so long, it's practically my new trademark smell. Oh, and get this – my hubby is just as crazy about it as I am! It's like the stars aligned for us with this fragrance – talk about a double win! If you want something truly unique and captivating, this is the one you've been waiting for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been grabbing for this perfume everyday the past few weeks. The scent is long lasting and smells good. I noticed that the scent smells a little different each time I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume bottle and scent screams Luxe.  The vanilla note in this is not at all overpowering at all. While the overall smell reacted very well with my body chemistry and lasted for hours. NOTE:I received this perfume to provide my honest and unbiased review after trying it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My husband isn’t a fan of perfumes but he actually said this one smells good without being too overpowering. I will say upon spray, I do detect a bit of an alcohol scent but that wears off quickly to leave the nice vanilla tones. Overall, I think the product is great and the bottle is a good compact size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was shocked at how much I liked this perfume! I’m not a warm and spicy fan. The vanilla scent was potent but not overpowering. My only con is the longevity. The little scent that did linger was nothing compared to first spritz. However, the bottle was gorgeous and the scent was so delicious that I would purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster and Burberry for free in exchange for honest review.  Burberry Goddess smells wonderful. Floral and woody notes gently fade into juicy peach and delicate jasmine. I typically get a headache with strong sweet perfume, but this beautiful subtle scent is very gentle and just perfect for me. This fragrance can be worn for any occasion, from daytime gatherings to glamorous evenings out. The longevity of this Eau de Parfum is impressive. I get many compliments asking what I am wearing. The elegant bottle design adds a touch of luxury to the overall experience. A must-have addition to any perfume collection. Thank you Influenster and Burberry for the opportunity to get acquainted with such an amazing product. I would definitely recommend Burberry Goddess and will be purchasing it in the future.

reviews.review_title: My go to and perfumes for now on
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for free to review and I thought it was amazing. it smells so good and fresh. It is classy and it screams date night. It’s always ago to it has a very sleek perfume bottle and it’s very long lasting. I’ll say it will last all night so it is a showstopper so when you walk past people people will be asking you what you have on you want to be disappointed getting this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you love vanilla this is a must try! The vanilla is very prominent and gourmand leaning however it does not feel too heavy to wear year round. It also projects quite nicely. It lasts all day on my skin so you don't need to spray a lot, one or two sprays is enough. It seemed to get sweeter after a few hours on my skin. I could also still smell the lavender after a few hours however it did seem to slightly fade over time. I am a vanilla lover so I was very happy to receive this in my VoxBox. It is probably a safe blind buy if you are also a vanilla lover, but if possible,  I would definitely recommend testing it first. As a comparison, it reminds me of Mon Gerlain but with more vanilla and freshness and less lavender.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this parfum!! It is long lasting and smells amazing. Just a few sprays and it’s on for the day. I highly recommend this parfum!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging and bottle are so eye catching and beautiful! It had a soft vanilla scent that lasted me throughout my entire evening, a total plus for me! I received this perfume in exchange for my honest review and honestly would purchase it again with my own money, totally one of my new favs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing scent! If you are a vanilla lover, this is definitely the perfume for you. It is not strong but it does last long enough for a night out. I love layering it with the sol de janeiro 68 for extra hold

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this products in exchange for my honest review. I want to start off by saying this packaging on this perfume is gorgeous. The bottle is simple but high quality. When I initially sprayed it, I picked up notes of lavender but after it dried down I could smell a soft vanilla. I sprayed it on my wrist and can still smell it 7 hours later. Vanillas are my go to scent and I love how this scent pairs lavender and vanilla. It’s a more mature vanilla scent and great for the workplace. This will definitely be part of my regular fragrance rotation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfume for me! It’s perfectly balanced with vanilla and lavender — a bit sweet, warm, and soft. It lasts about 6-7 hours on me, and can be layered with other fragrances (like in lotions). It isn’t too heavy and I can see myself using it all year round. The packaging is gorgeous and looks beautiful on my vanity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this perfume. This perfume is something incredible. I love sweet perfumes. I feel special when I wear this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is very light and sweet smelling. Some spice and vanilla accents that are great for everyday were. The bottle is sleek and signature to the Burberry brand. I would recommend this to women who need a simple yet long lasting scent for daily use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for free to review and I thought it was amazing. it smells so good and fresh. It is classy and fresh. I would recommend it to all my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my perfect type of scent, super creamy and soft. No hard alcohol smells which a lot of perfumes unfortunately have. It is a strong smell but with that also lasts a long time so for someone like myself, out and about all day, that is a major plus. Overall I’m excited to keep using this scent day to day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very luxe packaging and a pretty bottle. The scent is warm, clean, almost comforting. You definitely pick up on the strong notes of vanilla, with the lavender mixed in. It’s different from any perfumes that I own. Smells very good, but it is really overpowering and strong. If you’re sensitive to scent, this may be too much for you. It was a bit too much for me when first sprayed. You can smell it in the room. Very long lasting staying power. I still smelled it the next day. It is much more pleasant and enjoyable after it’s had time to settle down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i’m a huge fan of warm scents and this one is no different. warm vanilla immediately hits you at the spray and it dries down to a soft, wearable, everyday scent that I can’t put down since I received it. the lavender is very subtle, but creates a unique difference to other vanilla fragrances i’ve tried. it’s sweet, but not in a bakery way, and musky in a sensual way. i’m very pleased by how long this lasted on my clothes and in my hair and the packaging is so beautiful, it would make a great gift!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item from Influenster in exchange of my honest review. The scent is so strong that I can smell it through the package! The scent is a mix of vanilla and musk kind of and it gives off a luxurious and sweet, sexy vibe. I tried a little on my wrist and it stayed all day. I received a lot of compliment from wearing this. It does gives me headache sometimes, I think it's because of the sweet scent because its key note is woody vanilla. So just use a little and it goes a long way. I highly recommend this product. It's perfect for everyday use as well as date night.

reviews.review_title: Must To have if You Vanilla Lover
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: (Vanilla Heaven) its my first impression. The packaging is really Luxury, I really Love it , its smells like an expensive niche brand parfume , the second important thing is its long Lasting

reviews.review_title: Best perfume I have ever used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in free for review. This perfume is 10/10. Smells great and work perfect on day out or in office use. It is very long lasting. Package look mesmerizing. All my family members love. Great for daily use. Looks luxurious. Perfect for giving gift. Best perfume I have ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry-Goddess didn't disappoint at all&boy did they deliver! The combination of vanilla and lavender is one that I like but had not found quite like this. The scent is long lasting, pleasantly fragrant and soothing. I feel confident and sexy with this scent! I love being able to smell the perfume I am wearing&this hit the nail on the head. I'm obsessed! 😍

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you so very much Influenster and Burberry for my free perfume to review yes absolutely free!!! Inside of the box was a beautiful bottle of 1.6oz Burberry Goddess perfume. Fun Fact, it hits store shelves today (Aug 1st, 2023) so be one of the first to go grab a bottle. Trust me, you will be so sad if you don't, because the smell is absolutely amazing. The packaging is high end and so beautiful. The scent notes used in this beautiful smelling perfume are vanilla with a touch of lavender. There are 3 different vanilla notes in there. One is vanilla caviar- it has a sweet rich and animalic vanilla scent. The second is vanilla absolute- this is a darker and richer scent, enhancing the fragrance with a mysterious milky aspect. The 3rd vanilla note is a vanilla infusion- It's the brightest woody vanilla scent. There are also touches of cocoa and ginger. The note that is the strongest is the vanilla notes. The first inital sprays are on the stronger side but as it settles and dissipates a bit, the smells are heavenly!!! to say the least. I was running a few errands yesterday and so many people (men and women) kept stopping me to ask what scent I was wearing. Ladies, the smeel drew them in. I live in Vegas so it is extremely hot here. I was worried that the scent wouldn't last throughout the day in the heat, because we all know that sweat has a Tendency to wash away even the finest scent. To my excitement, the scent lasted all day long, well into the evening. I love Burberry Goddess and will absolutely repurchase again and again. Thank you Burberry and Influenster. I found my new signature scent. Also on a side note, if you like layering scents, I have paired the Burberry Goddess perfume with the Sol Janerio Brazilian Crush *62* spray, and omg, the mix of the 2 is an intoxicating scent. The smell of the 2 is like nothing you have smelled before. Warning ⚠️ you will literally be addicted lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very creamy scent and doesn’t smell like a generic vanilla despite the notes being somewhat simple. I think if you have a perfume collection this is a welcome addition for layering. It lasts much longer on clothes than skin, around 5 days!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
