reviews.review_text: The perfect ethereal scent of vanilla and warm spices. Long wearing but light scent. Perfect for any season!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i cannot get enough of this scent. like i am absolutely obsessed. i spray it CONSTANTLY i cant help myself. it has that amazing burberry base with a vanilla overlay but its unlike every other vanilla scent ive ever smelled because of that burberry-ish base layer (think rhythm or brit sheer with a matching vanilla-ish scent on top). i am SO GRATEFUL to have been gifted this from influenster- now i go right to reviews from ppl who actually bought the product themselves but i swear on my life this review is true. you need to try it. its an investment yea, but if youre gonna indulge in something might as well be on this glorious sexy scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum is seriously divine! The packaging looks so classy, and the spray vaporisateur makes it easy to use. The scent is like a dream, mixing flowery and woody vibes. It starts with a zesty kick and then gets all soft and floral, with a warm touch of sandalwood and musk. And guess what? It stays on for ages! I wear it everywhere, from lazy days to glam nights, and it always gets compliments. Totally in love with this perfume, feels like my secret weapon! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry is a versatile perfume that adapts to any occasion, from formal meetings to casual outings. Its longevity and projection are excellent, ensuring that the scent remains present throughout the day. Ultimately, Burberry is a classic and elegant choice for those seeking a sophisticated and distinctive fragrance.

reviews.review_title: Light fragrance for a fresh spritz
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This this fragrance is light and floral and vanilla notes. The packaging is very luxe and the bottle is classic; it’s a bottle I’d leave on display in my bathroom or my guest bathroom. I think the scent notes are sophisticated, but the only downside is that the fragrance isn’t too powerful. After a couple of hours of wear, you can only smell it if you get SUPER close to the point of application. I did find it was perfect for layering scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess is a warm and sultry vanilla dream! If Burberry Her is a bit fruity for your taste, or you want something equally as amazing but a different vibe - I definitely recommend to try out goddess! It is seductive and in charge. The staying power is a 10 out of 10 as well. I feel so sexy wearing it, and my boyfriend commented on how much he liked it without being asked! Rave review from him! I can still smell it on my clothes, even after a long day of errands or shopping. This is an incentivized review in exchange for my honest opinion, and I do wholeheartedly love the scent! Another wonderful fragrance by Burberry💛

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best smelling perfumes I've bought! I wore it one evening and my husband walked near me and asked what is that smell? I told him and he started man I would wear that too it smells amazing! I highly recommend this! It has a mild floral smell which is not overpowering and perfect for work or a night out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely Love This! it smells so warm and delious. Sucha a grown up vanilla smell. Will definately repurchase my family always asks what im wearing when i am wearing this! Beautiful luxury packaging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I can definitely pick up on the varying vanilla notes in this fragrance. It definitely gives sultry seductive grown woman vibes. This is one you reach for on date night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When you think of a vanilla based scent, you think of rich, dense, and sweet. I love vanilla based fragrances. This Burberry Goddess fragrance exceeded my expectations. This is not your basic vanilla fragrance. You get the warm, rich, characteristics of the vanilla caviar with the faint bitter and chocolate undertones of the vanilla absolute. Paired with this rich sweetness is the elegant notes of lavender that tone down the sweetness of the vanilla and add depth and curiosity. The lavender really give this fragrance some mystery. I have worn this every day since receivingit and have had many compliments. The scent profile is an elegant, classy daytime fragrance that lasts all day into the night. I am very pleased with this fragrance by Burberry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the product for free in exchange for an honest review. I’m a fragrance lover and wow I really hit the jackpot with receiving this. It is so perfect for me. A sweet vanilla that is more mature than your typical vanilla fragrances, but not overly sweet at all. It’s deep, warm, and sexy, perfect for mid to late 20s. The addition of the lavender note rounds out the scent beautifully. I’ve been wearing it every day since I received it. A perfect signature scent for me. If you love smelling beautiful, ethereal, and scrumptious, you’ll love this. You really cannot go wrong! Burberry did so so good with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first glance it was the bottle that captured me. I then took a wiff and was captured even more. So where’s the problem you ask…this scent doesn’t last long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. I absolutely love this scent! It has a strong vanilla scent with a hint of floral. I put it on in the morning and could still smell it on my clothes in the afternoon. The bottle is elegant but a little plain.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great, long-lasting scent that is perfect for date night or a gift for your bestie. It’s warm, vanilla scent gets many complements.

reviews.review_title: A lovely and long-lasting vanilla scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The vanilla scent in the Burberry Goddess perfume is simply divine. It's not too overpowering, but it definitely leaves a lasting impression. I love how versatile it is - I can wear it to work or out on a date. Plus, the bottle is absolutely gorgeous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying a Burberry fragrance and I must say it smells very luxurious. It is a very heavily vanilla scent and as for someone who enjoys fruity scents this is not over powering. The lasting power is good too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is absolutely beautiful. Usually I will not buy a vanilla scent because they're typically sickingly sweet but this is balanced and smells SO SO SO good. I have actually been wearing this exclusively since receiving it as a VoxBox item and it's become my favorite warm scent. The ONLY reason I gave it 4-stars (and I considered giving it 3 actually) is that the scent lasts about a half day and then it becomes so light that you'd have to put your nose on your skin to smell it. So, for the price, it definitely need more lasting power. Maybe spraying on clothes would let it linger longer, but I don't want to risk damaging the fabrics I'm wearing. By far the scent of this is a 5-star scent though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Burberry ,this perfume smell amazing sexy feminine,a must have Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum  is sophisticated delicate love it thanks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product through a promotion from Influenster. I really, really wanted to like Burberry Goddess. The packaging and bottle is beautiful. I sprayed it on me and instantly got a headache. It is strong, sweet, but did not last long. I feel this is a cooler weather fragrance, so this winter I may grow to like it. Today i tried again, this time i am wearing with Tom Ford Lost cherry. The combo is great, and so far no headache. It is a beautiful date night fragrance aside from it being not for me.

reviews.review_title: I Am loving it so far
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got burberry GOddess from influenster app as free gift to give an honest review i used it for 4 days and now i can say its long lasting smells so good and refreshing its rich lavenders and vanilla gives me perfect balance nozzel is very smooth evenly distributed so good and totally justfies the price .

reviews.review_title: Lovely sweet smell, wish it lasted longer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. A nice sleek bottle, pretty but somewhat generic/standard for perfumes. The scent is originally a very strong woody vanilla then fads to a vanilla with jasmine (smelled mildly soapy to me at first). After a few more hours, it is a very subtle standard vanilla smell. It lasted for most of my work day, so not as long as some perfumes unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful warm, cozy vanilla with a mild lavender note. Sweet like warm vanilla pudding. Longevity is good with moderate sillage. This is going to be a great scent for fall. I feel it can be used for daytime or evening and would be perfect for layering with a heavier scent. The bottle is sturdy with a beautiful golden cap. Received for free for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is perfect for summer! It’s a warm, sexy, and vanilla scent with hints of lavender. It definitely makes me feel like a goddess while wearing it and boosts my confidence. I get lots of compliments! The one complaint is that I wish it lasted a bit longer on the skin.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product for free (Influenster) in exchange for my honest review. I was able to try this for a week or so and it’s amazing! It has a vanilla scent (I do enjoy that) and one spray goes a long way. The scent will last all day so you’ll feel like a goddess 360 days! The packaging is so cute a luxurious. The bottle known is 50ml (good for 36M) and it’s vegan formula which is perfect, also the fragrance  bottle  is designed to be refilled. I recived so many complements when I use this Parfum. I feel very thankful for being able to test product and glad I love it. I’m very picky about what scent I like for perfumes or lotions. Give it a try and you’ll enjoy it

reviews.review_title: Smelling and Feeling like a Goddess!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so as of current this is a new fav I wasn't expecting. For my perfume prefer musky or earthy scents, not a huge fan of anything too floral or overtly sweet. When I saw that there was vanilla in the ingredients I was positive I was gonna hate it. However! To my surprise the vanilla is not overpowering it graces the overall scent with lace blanket of vanilla giving it a hint but not taking over as the the star of the show. Its a great blend of the vanilla and whatever else is in it. Perhaps lavender I'll have to check later. Either way, this perfume gives me a pep in my step, and really makes me feel like woman, a goddess. I move different when I wear it, I feel like a literal ethereal baddie thats in her peace and unbothered. My partner loves the scent too. Personally, this will definitely be a go to for me in fav perfumes along with YSL Opium. If you do like that you'll probably love this.  Update: I see its mainly vanilla/ Im surprised   and I love it.

reviews.review_title: Sweet, elegant smell that last all day!
reviews.review_text: The bottle and box are simple but classy perfect for gifting. The smell was sweet but not overpowering. It's the perfect scent for any occasion. I put on 2 pumps and it lasted me all day long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest review. I am not a person that traditionally would go for a vanilla perfume and prefer more floral scents, but this is really lovely. It has base notes that are almost woodsy and amber adjacent with a floral top note among the vanilla. I was worried it would smell like VS vanilla body spray but it has an extremely elegant scent that I have been wearing daily to work that reminds you of vanilla doesn’t smell like a cookie! One spray is still lingering by 4 pm so it has a long wear, but isn’t overpowering all day. The bottle is also so beautiful and feels extremely high end. I love that it is also refillable so I can continue to use the bottle for years to come.

reviews.review_title: You'll want to indulge in this sweet aroma incessa
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging ....gorgeous! At first application your hit with an almost fruit like scent that simmers into a soft, warm , alluring aroma.  I spent 5 hrs outside in 100° weather for a picnic by the lake, and on the way home I could still faintly detect it. I highly recommend this perfume , and I think it would be a great gift. Just make sure that person likes the scent of vanilla .  Wear Tip ..spray on your clothing or apply over lotion so the scent last longer.  Every morning I look forward to splashing some on as part of my daily essential.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Burberry Goddess perfume smells very prominently of vanilla. It's very warm, sweet and inviting. Long-lasting! The packaging is luxe and high-end. I love that the bottle is refillable. However, it's much too sweet for me - I prefer cleaner, earthier scents. Someone who loves sweet vanilla scents, this is definitely for you.

reviews.review_title: Must add this to your perfume repertoire!!
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free for my honest feedback, and let me tell you, I am so happy I did! I never would have purchased this based on the scent profile, I figured that it would be way too vanilla heavy for me and too sweet. I was WRONG!! Goddess by Burberry is the perfect blend of sweet and spice for every day wear. It offers rich notes of vanilla and lavender. Goddess perfume is so luxurious and distinctly feminine, and so am so happy to have been able add it to my perfume repertoire. Not only is the scent intoxicating, the bottle is refillable!! Burberry did an amazing job with this perfume, I will definitely be purchasing in the future!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While I love the scent of vanilla, it can feel a little childish wearing it sometimes, but not with this scent! Smells sexy and playful, and my partner is obsessed with the scent on me. I plan to wear thisyear-round, I don’t think it’s exclusively a summer scent. I received this perfume in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells gorgeous and expensive. I’ve never come across a vanilla fragrance that I would describe as refreshing—but this one is. The vanilla notes are beautiful, clear and deep in a way that reminds me of vanilla extract, or the vanilla notes in spiritueuse double vanille by Guerlain. But in Goddess the vanilla is balanced out by lavender, which makes it smell fresh and unique. You don’t need to worry about this being too sweet to wear in the summer heat. And the bottle is beautiful too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume it makes me feel sweet and sexy all day with its soft and strong touch that gives you a touch of elegance and freshness!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this incentivized free product from Influenster and Burberry in exchange for my honest review. This perfume has a lovely vanilla scent with subtle notes of  lavender. It smells sophisticated and has great longevity! It is not overpowering but just right. I feel that the sweet scent can also easily be for winter or summer wear. I find myself reaching for this perfume each day since I have received it! It is my new go to scent. It would make a lovely gift for any age!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite perfume! The notes of vanilla are perfect! I HIGHLY recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my ! Where do I start ?! I didn’t have high hopes with this fragrance only because vanilla scents usually don’t smell the best on me . However , after a couple days of trying this fragrance out I FELL IN LOVE ! I get a little hint of vanilla / floral and  it is also a mature scent . I wore it to work to test it out since I do work in a warehouse and it lasted my whole 6 hour shift . I was also able to smell it the next day on my sweater that I had worn the night before . I received many compliments from my coworker and was also told that I smelled sweet like a bakery so that is something to also keep in mind. I will be purchasing this fragrance once my bottle runs out. It is my new favorite and I definitely recommend trying it 🥰

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a MUST HAVE! A nice warm sexy vanilla smell but also sweet. In the past two days I’ve received more compliments on my perfume than I have ever before. Once this runs out I will be purchasing more. Do yourself a favor and get it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very feminine. Sweet and lightly scent which feels very arrogant. The package is minimalist and arrogant.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful scent that fades after 5 hours
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: * Initial fragrance: Strong woodsy smell, notes of vanilla and lavender * Skin irritations: None, neither on wrist nor neck * Fragrance after a few hours: Sweet vanilla scent remains, very faint woodsy smell. Can't smell any lavender. The perfume starts to really fade after 5 hours. * Bottle design: stunning gold accents caught my eye right away, gives the effect of real gold * Buy if you like: Gucci Bloom, CH Good Girl Supreme, Armani My Way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is divine! I love a sweeter smelling scent and this one is amazing. The vanilla really comes through which is a favorite for me. The scent lasts all day! The bottle is very well made and you can tell it is higher end. It has a nice weight too it so you can tell it is great quality.

reviews.review_title: FOR SWEET PERFUME AND VANILLA LOVERS
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you love vanilla fragrances, this one is worth checking out - it’s not a cheap cupcake vanilla but authentic and quality one. It also looks luxurious: I love the color palette, the matte nude box, and the bottle itself is solid with yellow gold accents. Even better, this bottle is refillable and the box is obviously recyclable, and this gives me even more respect for the Burberry brand. As for the fragrance, it smells like vanilla absolute for me, as I haven't picked up any lavender notes. Although it's too sweet for me personally, I do have friends who will genuinely enjoy this perfume and be happy to receive it as a gift. It is long-lasting to me, I smelled a little bit of it even after showering (I prefer niche perfume, so I’m usually okay with the fact that I don’t smell the same intensity 24/7).  Overall, it feels like this perfume is for women who are super feminine and ready to bask in the attention. I mean, Goddess is the name! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it, smells amazing, long lasting and does not have an overpowering scent , it’s light and last all day. 100% recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells gorgeous and very long lasting. It has notes of floral, chocolate, and vanilla. The after note is like, cake. Beautiful bottle with gold cap, and the spray was of a good amount. It would be a great wardrobe staple for those who love sweet and floral scents.

reviews.review_title: One spray goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised how distinct this smell was. You only need to spray it once to leave a lasting spray. This is not my typical go-to scent but I surprisingly came to love it! It reminds me of walking through a department store

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using Burberry Goddess for a little over a week everyday and I really love it.  I’ve never been a huge vanilla fan but this has such a nice scent. It smells very feminine with deep but soft vanilla notes and slightly sweet . The scent on me lasts about 4 hours which is why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5. I’ve received a few compliments from strangers since I’ve been wearing it and my husband says it’s his favorite new scent on me ( and I have a lot of fragrances.). The bottle is also really pretty.

reviews.review_title: Basic lovable vanilla smell, pretty bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging & bottle is so cute. Used one spray & overall it's strong, not too overpowering. The sweet vanilla smell stands out & lasted a couple hours. Perfect for a date or when you want to smell flirty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new go to summer/ fall fragrance. I absolutely love it. The vanilla undertones with hints of spices and woody finish. It’s long lasting and a must have

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess perfume smells very good and lasts for a very long time!! It has a wonderful warm vanilla scent! I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because it is a little too sweet for my liking, it reminds me of a sugar cookie. But that is just personal preference. The smell lasted the entire day without fading which is incredible! I also loved the bottle, the packaging, and that it has been designed to be refilled.

reviews.review_title: A truly long lasting Goddess fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As soon as I sprayed this fragrance I instantly could smell the vanilla and was in love! By far my favorite perfume! I sprayed it on in the morning and received compliments all throughout the day into the evening! I could not stop smelling myself because it is truly that good. I will be keeping this perfume as my #1.
I am obsessed with this! A new favorite! The vanilla smells amazing and makes me feel very feminine. Lasts all day long! Definitely the best smelling I have ever worn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks to Sephora and Influenster I was able to try a bottle for free of the new Burberry Goddess Perfume. When I first tested it out I wanted to know two things… Does it smell too Vanilla since it has a triple Vanilla combination and if the scent lasts. If you want to know that as well I am here to tell you that the woody and lavender notes balance out the vanilla perfectly and with just a few sprays it lasts all day. Burberry Goddess is very elegant in the scent and bottle design. The vanilla caviar and warm vanilla make a light beautiful blend that lasts. One great thing to mention is the bottle is refillable! This is a must have. It’s hard for me to give a perfume 5 stars but Burberry Goddess deserves all 5 for this Royal combination.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I am a HUGE fan of Burberry fragrances and this one has made it to the TOP of my favorites. It has a soft, very feminine smell. It is warm and a bit powdery. It pairs nicely with my Fenty Vanilla Buttadrop. Don’t walk, RUN to grab this fragrance. You will not regret it

reviews.review_title: Rich warm vanilla with a hint of lavender
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A smell of rich Vanilla and a hint of lavender, this fragrance smells like wealth. It has a warm rich scent, not the fake vanilla bean type. Perfect for a winters night out, layered with a body oil. Or even a light summer scent for a quick sprotz. The packaging is beautiful, very luxurious.  The throw is a 1m and I have tested it out in the summer heat, and so far I can still smell it 6 hours later.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice light scent for summer. It’s not overly vanilla or sweet. The lavender is subtle once it dries down. It’s a good every day scent. The only con I see is that it doesn’t last long

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is heaven in a bottle! It’s warm and sweet without being heavy and has notes of vanilla and almond. The scent lasts for hours, too! I’ve worn it through hot weather and high-intensity workouts and can smell it hours later. It’s become one of my absolute favorites!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume in exchange for my honest review and I feel so lucky to have been chosen to take part in this campaign. I absolutely love this perfume and I’m very big on scents. This is probably one of my favorites now, it smells girly and expensive. It’s also a very long lasting fragrance & my husband approves. I would not be disappointed to get gifted this or even but it myself.  BUY THIS PERFUME!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The scent lasts for a long time, from 6 to 8 hours without being too strong, leaving only a faint scent on the skin. The modern design with a glass jar. Along with that is the bottle cap very luxurious

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the packaging and the fragrance is beautiful. Burberry always has amazing products and this fragrance smells amazing and lasts all day. I love the vanilla notes and would highly recommend.  Beautiful scent overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received my Burberry Goddess from Influenster! This is a royal true vanilla while being sort formal! I but I can see this being an office signature scent as well! You can layer it or wear alone! I have been testing for a week now! The drydown is wonderful! Yes this is a full bottle scent! I received many compliments on this one! I can see even non vanilla lovers appreciating this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This Burberry Goddess parfum smell so good if you love vanilla and lavender you're going to love this fragrance the bottle the packaging and smell is so luxe it's long lasting I love everything about this fragrance it's amazing .Burberry Goddess is my new favorite perfume

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best smelling perfume Burberry has released. I love the vanilla and soft powder smell. It lasts all day. And I feel pretty and sweet while wearing it.

reviews.review_title: A must have in your collection!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite! The vanilla and lavender complement each other so well. The scent lasts all day into the evening.  It is the essence of a summer night. I feel such joy when I am wearing it and have had so many compliments. I am also able to display the beautiful bottle as it is adorned with a elegant gold symbol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: wow! I am very impressed with this perfume it  smells sweet and sexy it's a perfect summer scent. sweet and sensual. definitely wearing this to my next date night. I love the sweet scent of vanilla and lavender it smells delicious! definitely worth buying!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This EDP is very heavy in the vanilla family, but also has a hint of something else I can’t quite put my finger on- maybe floral. Definitely part of the gourmand category. It reminds me of HER mixed with Goddess. Don’t think this one suits my skin and overall preference of EDPs, but glad I received it and will use during the fall season.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Burberry Goddess for free for testing purposes. That said, here are my thoughts:  The packaging is very pretty, with a gold label with black lettering. It looks high end. The bottle is elegant and classic. It’s well made, and fits in beautifully to my perfume collection. Outside the cold top and center, the bottle is transparent, which works nicely as the perfume itself is a pretty amber. From a sustainability standpoint, I appreciate that it’s reusable.  The scent is a warm, heady smell at first sprit, with vanilla and woodiness forward. As it wears, it fades more into a softer, sweeter vanilla scent. The woodiness gets subtler, but keeps the smell from being saccharine. It sort of reminds me of a grown-up, luxe version of a vanilla body spray I used as a teenager—it’s nostalgic for me, so I see that as a plus. The lavender notes are not particularly strong, so if you want a lavender-forward perfume, this may not be the best pick.  The scent is not overpowering at all. It gets fairly subtle after the top notes wear off, but lingers nicely. It’s pretty much gone after 5-6 hours, so you may want to reapply. I have pretty nasty allergies, and it doesn’t trigger them either which is a plus. About two spritzes on pulse points is plenty.  I have gotten multiple compliments on this one, which doesn’t happen to me too often—a guy who I was passing on my way into work told me I smelled amazing, so that’s a win!  I think this would make a nice gift, especially for someone whose scent preferences you aren’t familiar with, given how much of a crowdpleaser vanilla is generally.

Love love love. This smells absolutely amazing. The packages is sickening. I think this is my new everyday scent. I believe that the value of this product is fair. The scent last pretty long. This is so great for me because I love vanilla scents to this was right up my alley.

reviews.review_title: OMG! Exactly the scent I was looking for!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Burberry Goddess Eau de Parfum is the first refillable perfume by Burberry (eco-friendly!), it's elegantly designed with its packaging absolutely breathtaking. The scent this fragrance embodies is a combination of a powerful trio of vanillas, enriched with luminous lavender. Absolutely perfect for any occasion!

reviews.review_title: My most favorite perfum by far
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a sample to give my honest review on it. All i can say its a 10/10 for me i will be purchasing for sure. The smell is sweet vanilla but not over powering sweet, love that it last a long time. I noticwd that even after washing my clothes they still had a small amount of after smell from the perfum. The name of the perfum says it all Goddess, you will be feeling like a true goddess with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this! I've never had Burberry perfume before so I don't know if they are all like this, but this scent stays with me all day! Normally I spray my perfume and don't smell it again for the rest of the day. Not this one! I spray it and throughout the day I get whiffs of the beautiful scent. It's warm and sensual yet also clean smelling. New favorite,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Influenster and Burberry for the complementary product, and the chance to share my honest thoughts about it! Vanilla is such a classic scent and this Eau De Parfum is anything but usual! It’s lovely soft musk is still bright enough for summer but warm enough for fall and winter too! I’m a season fragrance lover and look forward to changing my fragrance with the seasons, but this one could easily carry you through all of them! The bottle is gorgeous with gold accents and the creamy vanilla color of the perfume. It does say that there is a hint of lavender but I don’t smell that at all which I actually am glad for!  The only thing I have to say about it is I wish the soft, elegant fragrance lasted a touch longer for me. Other than that, I’ve found myself reaching for Burberry Goddess every day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this perfume! First impressions was how sexy it smelt and with a touch of sweet! You can smell the vanilla notes.  Definitely a must wear for a date night with someone you love!   This would be a great gift for a best friend or a significant other! My husband loved the smell and said I smelt like caramel.   The bottle is beautiful! So classy and elegant for a perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I always have choose flower perfumes, at first I was like the box itself smells amazing than I tried it and the smells was kind sweet which is not my favorite but I waited few second and I fell in love with it is a combination of sweet and flowers is just perfect. Don’t need to apply much like other perfumes one spray was more than enough. ♥️
